descriptionHTML:
Er du træt af de gammeldags brugergrænseflader i ordlege?
Har du lyst til at opleve en ordleg på en helt ny måde?
★★★ Nu kan du downloade Ord Kryds og spille GRATIS på BRÆT! ★★★
 
Ord Kryds er en kreativ ordleg som udfordrer din hjerne. Spillet har alt hvad en ordleg skal have og er fuldstændigt VANEDANNENDE & UNDERHOLDENDE.
 
➤ Nyt & Friskt Look: Hvis du kan lide at spille brætspil og puslespil, vil du elske den rene og friske BRÆT-GRÆNSEFLADE ved første øjekast.
 
➤ Praktisk & Nemt at Spille: Du kan let swipe bogstaverne for at danne et specifikt skjult ord. Det er nemt at spille og sjovt at mestre for alle. 

➤ Overraskende Bonus: Log ind hver dag og få daglig bonus. Optjen mønter når du har fundet de Ekstra Ord, som ikke findes på brættet.

➤ Over 3.000 Spændende Udfordringer: Det er nemt i begyndelsen og bliver hurtigt udfordrende. Test hvor mange ord du kender. Flere baner er på vej.

➤ 100% Vanedannende Ordleg: Du vil aldrig opleve et kedeligt øjeblik! Spil dette krydsordsspil én gang og du vil ikke kunne lægge det fra dig!
 

☆ HVORDAN MAN SPILLER ☆

- Swipe bogstaverne, sæt dem i række og fyld de blanke felter lodret og vandret på brættet
- Tryk på knappen “Bland” for at ændre rækkefølgen af bogstaver
- Tryk på knappen “Tips” for at få hjælp


★ FUNKTIONER ★

• Flot & Rent BRÆT til dig (Følg med for personliggjorte designs)
• Find ekstra ord for at indsamle mønter
• 3000+ BANER som du kan spille
• GRATIS at få Daglig Bonus mønter
• Passende for både børn og voksne til at træne ordsøgningsevner
• Ingen netværksforbindelse påkrævet og du kan nyde ordsøgning når som helst
• Enkelt og nemt at spille, udfordrende gameplay
• Helt GRATIS for alle spillere
 

DOWNLOAD nu, træn din hjerne og bliv en ægte mester i ordleg på BRÆT!

★ KONTAKT ★

comments: Needs way more bats i beat this in 3 days and can't get the ball any farther. Add more bats and I'll give 5 stars.  Update: need to make the bats harder to get i already had all the new ones unlocked when i opened the app after the update. Litterally took one swing with the now highest bat and now there is no point to play.  You should make it like 5,000 km for the next update or something.

Great game! I really love it and its great to play when you want to pass through time. My only issue i have is that my upgrades are so high that i go over the side barrier almost every time. I feel it would be awsome if, like bats, you could unlock new balls. Also, online leaderboards would be awesome, so we can see who holds the current record.

One thing is bombarding everyone with ads, another is: 1. There is no sound whatsoever. 2. The whole purpose of the game is getting a new bat.  3. There is no point of hitting it down the middle because it will hit something and bounce back thousands of feet.  Overall this game sucks! About the ads?  I've learned 1 thing: If you see a game on an ad? When you download that game, it will be flooded with ads. That's just how that works...

The game is awesome but there are way to many ads between pitches. Cmon man!! I get it u want to make money.. So how much does it cost to have an ad free Baseball Boy? I feel like 99 cents would reasonable. Cause everyone would buy it just to not be annoyed by the stupid ads!! 😘

To get the most power you have to also hit it in the same direction every time. Not a hole lot of fun in that. Its a grinding game that every two swings it's a 15second ad if you are lucky. If not expect to spend just as much time playing as you do watching ads, if not less.

Bloody adds. Relax with the adds. There way way way way way way way you too many adds. Every time you play you gotta wait for an add to finish. It's disgusting. Whats the world coming too. Rather pay a dollar and have no adds. You guys messed up big time by making this an add flogging game. Hang your self's from a tree by your throat. Hope you get cancer.

comments: This app is quite addictive and fun! Not to mention how much of a time killer it is! It's cool to see how far you can get, upgrading and collecting money until you can reset for fame! I like the whole concept of the resetting for fame but it doesn't really make sense.. but don't mind that, it's just a game after all! I am having fun with the app so far, but I might get bored of it later. We'll see I guess! :-)

I love who you added as the workers! I not good with comics or super heros but i think thats stanley? And i love how you added chef Gordon Ramsay! If you update this game i have 1 question, can the tech manager of the second floor be steve jobs?

Latest update messed up the game. Went to black screen that says debug. Uninstall/reinstall fixed it but now it says to update the game. When I click ok, it brings me to the game store, but no update is available.

Tap your screen. Wait. Tap some more. Wait. Watch some ads and hope they don't freeze for a minute. More waiting. You're going to delete it eventually, just don't bother.  Reply: If real life were as banal and buggy as this game, I would have drunk a bleach smoothie by now.

Was fine until the event will no longer load and keeps telling me there's an issue, asking me to send an email and reload... which doesnt fix anything... just repeats the process... so guess another game being uninstalled cuz it doesn't work right smh
For 20 minutes all it would let me do was press a button to build cash. No game what so ever. This is the stupidest app ever. Don't waste your time.

comments: I hope you take the time to read.   This game is amazing, and it just keeps getting better. I do wish you would change the video knives to apples or video. Now I have nothing to spend apples on.  But here is what i really wanted to say i really like this company and the games you put out to your users. I'm newly paralyzed and I been well adapting to my new life and because my hands dont work like they used to these games kept my mind busy and has helped me. I own alot of your games and have spent alot trying to help. I wish I had more to unlock things in time. But Thank you very much.

The game sucks it's alwful. It's gliching non stop for your bad. There are ADS everywhere! Ketchapp you getting worse and worse. There are ads of stupid games everywhere. What a game maker will pay to another game to show them in ADS! That makes the game in the ad even worse. Please ketchapp I was a big fan of you but you made your games so STUPIT. PLEASE FIX YOUR GAMES!

This skill-based time waster would be better without the hyper-agressive advertising. First you have the constant banner ad at the bottom of the screen. That's forgiveable because it's out of the way and doesn't really affect gameplay. It's the fail-state adevertisements that constantly interrupt retrys that will irritate even the most casual of gamers.   The only people writing good reviews for this game are bot accounts.

I like the game, BUT it is glitchy. Most of the time when I hit "continue" to watch an ad for longer gameplay it freezes, so I have to close the app and start over. When I open the app and start playing the first round, an ad pops up and I inevitably click on it because I'm in the middle of playing the round. Please fix these issues, and I'll try to remember to rate this higher once they're fixed.

Ads interrupt gameplay and are extremely aggravating. The video that you have to watch to continue your gameplay never works. The game crashes when xp increases. I personally dislike this game, and it would be better if these issues were resolved. Thank you for taking time out of your day to read this review.

Deleted all my data with no reason. Had a bunch of Legendaries and Rares that have now been deleted. I put a lot of time into this game, and even bought the ad-free package. If you don't want a load of wasted time, don't download this app.  Edit- Updated the app and levelled up a bit. The game crashes every time I get a free revive. Still a massive waste of time.

comments: On the advert it looks like the best game and I get two disco balls each time and merge them together and you've completed the level. Then you get the game and that rarely even happens! It's only happened once to me and I'm on level 41. Now that's saying something. It gives you a super good promise and nope it's gone out the window as soon as you get the game

I have been playing for a while now, I like almost all of the game, not too impressed that "the piggy bank " is basically held to ransom until you buy it... find another way to entice spending... reduce number of coins won or something but as the levels get hard if you dont spend money you get stuck even with team helps.. it gets disheartening and reduces interest after a while.. to the gamemakers: keep the game playable..the money will come

Update...as I go though the levels Ill get stuck for a day or two...even 3 on a level. Gameplay FUN has Dropped significantly. Moved to 3 stars as a result. If it does not change I'll continue to move to 1 star. Games are many to be played...not just stuck on a level forever!  Other issue with the game is that there's so much clicking and waiting once you win. I wish that it would just go right to the next level and it wouldn't have to wait for the splash screen. I just spend so much time wasted versus playing

Oh my gosh, this game is so much fun! I have a dentist appointment coming up, so I got this game to settle my nerves. I'm having such a good time playing, I know this will be just the thing to help me out! 😀 Thank you 😄

Don't waste your time playing this game.  I got too 300 + levels but you get 100 coins for completing each level.  Unfortunately it goes in a piggy bank, which you need to pay to break starting from £1.99, then next piggy bank was £4.99.  It's a con!
It is now my favorite game. It's second only to toy blast. You have the best two games ever. I never get around to any of my other games I'm stuck on these two.

description: Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.Features✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuckMore features- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakesHighlights• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles• 9x9 grid• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert• Support both phones and tablets• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets• Simple and intuitive designTrain your brain anywhere, anytime!
descriptionHTML:
Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.

Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.

Features
✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies
✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features
- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes

Highlights
• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles
• 9x9 grid
• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert
• Support both phones and tablets
• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
• Simple and intuitive design

Train your brain anywhere, anytime!

comments: Its a nice game! But it just takes forever to open a new level. Sometimes your on one for days. That's just to long. That's why I pay farm inland. You can play for hours with out bring stopped no lives. . I want a game that's fun and relaxing. No hard or extra hard ones. I really like cleaning and fixing thing. Be nice if you could do more area and less puzzle.

I love decorating the rooms but I am having to pay too much to get enough points to do it.   I also don't like that each room requires more points to do the tasks than the previous room.  I have changed my rating to low because you end up spending too much of your own money to get powerful to get your stars to complete the tasks.  They also lose your purchases.  I bought a desk chair yesterday and now it is missing and the task is gone too.  Rip off.

This game is awesome. But the stars, please increase the amount of star not just 1. Make it 2 for the Hard Level. And lastly, it's hard to download new rooms when it always appear the Technical Error. Better if you do not require to download it and the user can open it without connecting to internet. However, the game is great for relaxing. Keep up the good work!

Never thought it would be this addictive! At first i thought "Oh, its THAT game that always pops up in advertisements." but after deciding to give it a try, i am hooked!   I introduced homescapes to my mom as well and downloaded it for her and she finds it adorable and fun as well. We both take time to chill out and have fun with the puzzles occasionally when we are together.   I cant find a single flaw or critique for this game, its amazing :)

Veeery enjoyable game! I feel like it's advertised too much, but it's definitely worth playing. Especially if you love games like Bejeweled!  Some of the levels are unnecessarily difficult to get by. You have to either get lucky, or be some type of strategic genius to pass them within a good time frame. That's slightly disappounting. Its too much of an encouragement to use money.

Homescapes is an awesome game, combining the relaxation (and frustration!) of match 3 games with the joy of renovating a fabulous mansion. Throw in the fascinating story line, lovable characters lovely music and stunning graphics (except the kitchen wallpaper lol), I'll be playing this for a long time! I'm working on the living room right now, getting close to level 600. Can't wait to see what the new character, Jerry, has in store for us! Thank you Playrix!
description: Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in—adventures await you from the moment you walk in the door! Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home! The game features:● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!● Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!● A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!● Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.● A cute pet: meet а naughty and fluffy cat.● Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house! Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu. Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homescapes/Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/ Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to homescapes@playrix.com
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in—adventures await you from the moment you walk in the door!

Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!

The game features:

● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!
● Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.
● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!
● A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!
● Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.
● A cute pet: meet а naughty and fluffy cat.
● Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house!

Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!

Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.

Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!

description: Love puzzle games, but want something a bit more creative? Then look no further! Play fun puzzle games on Paint Tower!, the newest title from Gram Games!Simple puzzle game with a twist! It’s your job to stack a tower of pieces, but it’s up to you to paint the pieces’ shapes. Match the number you’re given and paint a puzzle piece made of that many blocks!Be careful, each puzzle piece will affect the tower’s balance. Make sure all none of the pieces fall off or it’s game over! Draw strategically, and do your best to keep everything standing in the new game Paint Tower!PAINT TOWER! FEATURES:Create a Tower• Get creative! Draw different shaped puzzle pieces that matches the number you’re given• Make sure you place the piece in a good spot or it can affect the tower’s balance• Be careful where you stack your pieces or the entire tower could topple!Tons of Challenging Puzzles• Challenge your mind and complete as many puzzles as you can• Each puzzle is more challenging than the last – stack your pieces and keep the tower balanced• Go into the next puzzle thinking of what pieces you can paint!Stack your puzzle pieces in just the right way so your tower stays balanced. Draw different shaped puzzle pieces and match the exact numbers you’re given. Complete challenging puzzles in Paint Tower!, the newest puzzle game from Gram Games!Download Paint Tower! and try it out today!
descriptionHTML:
Love puzzle games, but want something a bit more creative? Then look no further! Play fun puzzle games on Paint Tower!, the newest title from Gram Games!

Simple puzzle game with a twist! It’s your job to stack a tower of pieces, but it’s up to you to paint the pieces’ shapes. Match the number you’re given and paint a puzzle piece made of that many blocks!

Be careful, each puzzle piece will affect the tower’s balance. Make sure all none of the pieces fall off or it’s game over! Draw strategically, and do your best to keep everything standing in the new game Paint Tower!

PAINT TOWER! FEATURES:

Create a Tower
• Get creative! Draw different shaped puzzle pieces that matches the number you’re given
• Make sure you place the piece in a good spot or it can affect the tower’s balance
• Be careful where you stack your pieces or the entire tower could topple!

Tons of Challenging Puzzles
• Challenge your mind and complete as many puzzles as you can
• Each puzzle is more challenging than the last – stack your pieces and keep the tower balanced
• Go into the next puzzle thinking of what pieces you can paint!

Stack your puzzle pieces in just the right way so your tower stays balanced. Draw different shaped puzzle pieces and match the exact numbers you’re given. Complete challenging puzzles in Paint Tower!, the newest puzzle game from Gram Games!

Download Paint Tower! and try it out today!

description: RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive! You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.This is how you do it:🤔  Draw routes for your truck drivers🎁  Make sure that every house receives the correct package▶️  Press play🚚💨  Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!Features:✓ 400 FREE levels✓ Easy gameplay suitable for all ages✓ Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans✓ Beautiful graphics✓ Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effectsThe game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★Available In-App purchases: PREMIUM 💎 KING TRUCK 👑★ The premium version of RGB Express★ Removes ads★ Supports game development and future updatesHINTS 🤯★ The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.Please note:★ Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video★ TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).
descriptionHTML:
RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive!

You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.


This is how you do it:

🤔 Draw routes for your truck drivers
🎁 Make sure that every house receives the correct package
▶️ Press play
🚚💨 Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!


Features:

✓ 400 FREE levels
✓ Easy gameplay suitable for all ages
✓ Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans
✓ Beautiful graphics
✓ Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effects

The game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!


★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★
★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★


Available In-App purchases:

PREMIUM 💎 KING TRUCK 👑
★ The premium version of RGB Express
★ Removes ads
★ Supports game development and future updates

HINTS 🤯
★ The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.


Please note:
★ Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video
★ TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).

comments: I paid the 2 odd dollars to remove the ads since i really enjoyed the game. If you are thinking about doing the same DON'T. Paying the money removes ZERO ads. It simply allows you to skip most of them after 5 to 10 seconds rather than watching the whole 20 to 30 second ad. They still pop up just as often and are just as annoying. Personally I would wait for another developer to make a good clone of the game, shouldn't take long it's a simple engine.

I paid the price to get the ads removed, because I like to support developers and because there were a LOT of ads. The ads were never removed. I have contacted the developers more than once and received no response. Then I contacted the Play Store and they rejected my claim. Now I have paid for the ads to be removed and they are still there at a level that makes the game unplayable. Worst customer service ever; what a waste of money. I will remember this developer and never download another of their apps.

Terrible game. I can't pay twice without having to sit through a full 30 second add. I found it faster to exit out the app and go back in to avoid adds. But there are just too many adds that it made it not fun after the first few goes.

WAY TOO MANY ADS! Its so frustrating that after three failures an ad plays for 30 seconds. Also, why are you asking for access to my storage and location and the ability to make and receive calls? As a developer, get with what your customers want. Then I'll consider buying something.

Far too many ads. One here and there is understandable but after every single try, you get an add. Definitely uninstalled for that reason. As far as the game itself, it's really fun and could be addicting but I spent more time trying to get through the ads than I did playing the game.

EDIT TO PREVIOUS REVIEW: I PAYED FOR AD FREE AND REINSTALLED IT AND NO LONGER HAVE AD FREE!  I loved basically all of it except... If you don't buy ad free the game is completely unbearable with how many ads there are. Also I absolutely hate how it kicks me out of the challenges after I die if I tap too many times or I hold the screen while waiting for it to load.

description: Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, spins and raids to build your viking village to the top! Do you have what it takes to be the next Coin Master? Can you travel through time and magical lands to battle it out to be the best Pirate, Hippie, King, Warrior or VIKING of them of all!Spin to earn your lootSpin the wheel to fall on your fortune, be it attack time, loot, shields or raids. descriptionHTML:
Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, spins and raids to build your viking village to the top!

Do you have what it takes to be the next Coin Master? Can you travel through time and magical lands to battle it out to be the best Pirate, Hippie, King, Warrior or VIKING of them of all!

Spin to earn your loot
Spin the wheel to fall on your fortune, be it attack time, loot, shields or raids. Win your loot by landing on coins or gold sacks so you can build strong villages through the game and move up in levels. Win shields to guard your village from other vikings trying to attack you. Become the Coin Master with the strongest village and the most loot!

Attack and Raid fellow vikings!
Earning coins through the slot machine isn't the only way to get loot, you can steal it too! Attack or raid friend and foe to save enough loot to build your village. No need to break the piggy bank! Fight back and come out victorious against your enemies. Boom! Take revenge on those who have attacked your village and take whats rightfully yours! Bring your Coin Dozer and get rich again! You never know what treasures you can find in someone else's village!

Collect all the Cards!
It's not always about the loot, it's about the treasure too! Collect cards to complete sets and move on to the next village. With every village you conquer your wins will be greater

Play with friends!
Trade your cards with our online community to collect them all! Join our fast growing interactive Facebook community to meet new viking friends, earn big rewards, and trade treasures!

★ Battle your way to be the next Coin Master with your friends by your side.

comments: The game is good, but the multiplayer needs to be fixed.  It hangs on load and results in the player losing money or gems with no recourse.  It randomly drops ships, and when one player immediatlely gets the best ship and the other player doesn't receive any ship until 10 rounds later, it is impossible to catch up.  Fix the multiplayer, then you get your 5 stars.

I was trying to take advantage of the first time deal. I purchased a deal and for some reason Google play didn't allow me to  complete the charge. The next day I look in my bank account and I have been charged for what Google play said I couldn't do and I was charged another $4 when I didn't even click on anything. I want my money back. That is real shady that you would charge someone for a service that didn't even go through. And where did a $4 charge come from. And there is no way to ask through support to get that back so I'm taking this here where others can see. Don't spend money here or there will be random charged in your bank account.  Update: I do not want a thank you, i want my money back. There's no way to contact the developers except through Google play which already seems shady.

Definitely not worth it. Was fun at first, but after the updated quests, the game took a serious nosedive in quality. Now you HAVE to beat the opponent in order to get anything, otherwise you're out 1000 gold. Before, you would get something just for playing. The new PvP just sucks.

I got a new phone and I installed this game on it and it put me on level 5. I was on level 32. I had 56 stars and my combat power was on 72000. If it don't update the game with my current data I don't think I am going to play it anymore. I don't want to star all over again.

Pretty decent game, shame you need to pay gems for the second last ship. The PvP is fun but half the time reduces my gold when I win. Cannot see the devs replying to any messages so unsure if they care

Th game is fun and addicting. Way to many ads!!! Ahhhh My gold counter doesnt always register after endless mode is over. Gives me dble gold if i watch ad but doesnt register after endless battle sometimes. Would gave better review but that sux when it happens. Fix!!!!

comments: This is a great game but the bottom line is the developers want you to spend money upgrading. You get along so far upgrading with coins, which can be earned. Then they want tokens, which you must buy, to go further. The deals on weapons that are offered are always just out of reach. You can earn diamonds watching videos but I would rather play a game than waste time watching stupid add so I can play a game. It was fun but no more. Deleting.

It is far too difficult to advance in this game without spending money. The developers get money from ads, and I'm willing to watch them, but not for 1 diamond every 30 seconds, when the smallest upgrade in weapons is 360. They must not want people to keep playing an otherwise good game.

This is the most grindy game I have ever played. To get anywhere close to a smooth play through, you have to spend obscene amounts of money. It'd be just as much money to buy a PlayStation 3 and fallout 3, and you'd have better graphics, better shooting, and shorter load times. Plus, every level and every gun has to be downloaded separately. It's over 200 mb for me, and I only played for a day and got to level 2!
After the update on 2nd Mar-18, Spec ops not loading. Game simply terminate itself while trying to load spec ops Level 16. Everything else is working fine. I'm stuck 😓😪

What's wrong with the "FREE TRIAL" in PREMIUM ".??  It's "FREE" but I need to submit a billing transaction card or whatever it is !!! You said it "FREE" so after 7 days cut off the trial. You just want to make money in the word "FREE" 😑😑😑

There are always connection errors during PvP (internet connection was stable) and since the last update PvP is such worse. I don't know why, but there are just 4-5 other players each game and  the game is over after a few seconds

description: Moto Rider GO: Highway Traffic brings to you one of the most compelling and satisfying traffic dodging experience in the world!Features:- Choose from the fastest high-performance motorcycles!- Enjoy extreme 3D visuals!- Prove your skills in hardcore challenges!- Upgrade your speed, breaking level and add extra lives!- Select your favorite motorbike category: chopper, cross or superbike!- Make near traffic misses discovering 4 unique locations: Suburbs, Desert, Snow and Night City- Explore 4 unique locations in 4 different modes!- Ride your motorcycle on a highway, interstate, or the autobahn!- Dominate online leaderboards!- Unlock 23 achievements!- Discover plenty of bike tuning options!ENDLESS GAMEPLAYHead out and race as fast as you can to become the best new moto rider in the world! Race the traffic and complete the challenges to get real among the competition. Jump on your racing bike and ride in the endless busy roads and highways! Make near traffic misses discovering 4 unique locations: Suburbs, Desert, Snow and Night City in 4 different modes! Ride your motorcycle on a highway, interstate, or the autobahn. Never forget that riding a motorcycle can be fun, but it can also be dangerous! Roads and highways are full of speeding cars – they can bother you!SELECTION OF HIGH-PERFORMANCE MOTORBIKESHave you ever wanted to ride a motorcycle in real life? Great! It's about time to test your skills and decide on the motorcycle category you would choose – extremely fast superbike, epic chopper motorcycles or modified high-performance versions of off-road motorcycles! Every bike has its own individual extras: total lives, near miss bonus, high-speed bonus or wrong way bonus.A TON OF TUNING AND CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONSGo to the garage and select one of the high-performance motorbikes. Tune your vehicle and customize its appearance. Choose your favorite body color and slap on some well-designed decals! Give your rides your own style. Increase your motorbike's speed, breaking level and add extra lives – these will all have a definite impact on your bike's performance.CLIMB TO THE TOP OF THE LEADERBOARDSTake part in a selection of hardcore challenges and become the fastest moto rider on the streets. Millions of other players will compete for the top rank. Join them and work your way up the weekly leaderboards rankings. Race the traffic and complete the challenges to get real among the competition. Nobody said that traffic driving would be easy - but the prize is well worth it.RICH ROAD ENVIRONMENTSGO Moto Rider: Highway Traffic is setting the new standard within traffic racing genre. Enjoy extremely impressive graphics and experience high-octane racing! Discover well-designed and full animated dash and speedometer! It will be fun and compelling, we guarantee!Prove your skills as tenacious bike rider! comments: One way to check how much products I have left is by touching the machine and thr corresponding product but sometimes the game will assume  that you are putting the product into production hence it will put the product into production whether you want it or not so it will waste production time. Sometimes the touch is too sensitive. Sometimes the touch is not sensitive enough which forces me to drag the product into the production slot up to 10 ten times just to start production. I know this feedback is not much but maybe an undo button will help. It makes the gameplay million times difference if you  put your players comfort a priority.

They keep taking my diamonds and telling me I spent them somewhere. Like I spent 19 on fast tracking 1 Coco tree while I have Tom for 6 days and 102 Coco's in my silo then tell me they can't refund it because I'm a liar! They took 50 from my husband and only refunded him 30!! Super cell is ripping players off!!

I buy an axe it will last forever same thing with other tools but here I have to keep buying tools to do the job. An if I need more crop I get the land ready for more seeding get the water. This you have to bring in more people that never show up to do the work. That's why if I'm going to farm I count on one person me. Here you need others. It not for me.

Long time player returning to the game after taking a break. I leveled up to level 41 today. Before leveling up it showed I should get 1 white and 1 black rabbit with the new level but I didn't get either of them. I would also like to see it a bit easier to get wildlife refuge animals. 36 puzzle pieces seems a bit much.

Good game. I initially wrote a one star review because this game was very dependant on microtransactions but it's actually pretty fun if you have the patience. Right off the bat you have to wait upwards to 30 minutes or an hour for basic production and warming but as you grow your farm it gets easier to deal with. This definitely isn't a game you can play for, like, an hour, consecutively, which kinda sucks but it's great for the 10-20 minites you pop in now and then.

It is an amazing game. Our entire family is hooked and i love the idea of neighbourhood chat on hay day it is awesome!!! Continue making this game as cool as it is👍. However it would be nice to have private chat on hayday where the entire neighbourhood does not see your conversation. There is also a glitch where i cannot open my daily videos.

comments: It's a good game but having an add after every puzzle is a bit much. Yake a bit too much time and easyy to lose interest. Maybe every 5 puzzles wo ups be better I know y'all gotta make your money but the constant ads make me want to uninstall.

SenseLess pictures to form words. Game is designed in a way that you not find words. So you spend on coins. And after revealing, there was no way such words can be formed. For example : Heir(picture of prince) + few buffaloes=? plain =AIRPLANE. what???
It's ok, I wish the words were harder. The pop ups are far less than many other apps and I like games like this, even more so when they are challenging. I give it 3 stars.
Someone always tries to help me-- out loud. And an AD every game (but I chose this free version, and it only takes a second to X out), otherwise great game.

Really fun game! Just a couple of itsy bitsy things that get on my nerves. The coins you win are miniscule compared with how many you need when you use the Help function (even bumping it up to 5 coins for each correct answer would be better) & the other thing...I get that you need ads to keep these games free but does there need to be an ad after EVERY SINGLE PUZZLE??

Ads, ads, and more annoying Ada that can only be removed by using "coin". While I have no issue paying for apps or occasional chunks of content, this was annoying AF. I also didn't find it particularly challenging.

comments: I think it's a good game but sometimes the ball would go in but then it bounces out you should also add modes, one like there are walls all around and I like the game keep making these addictive games:D also all you guys stop with the adds just turn off your WiFi let them have some money after hard work on many game's like would you want to make a game and not get money and just get  ALL YOUR COMMENTS WITH ADDS! ohhh that would be soo annoying.

I love the game it is so simple yet super fun. Just the only down side is that there are WAY to many ads. I stared playing a round and then an ad pops up.. Like really. At least put a 15 second ad up after the round is finished where you can choose to wat h and ad to continue after you have missed and your time is up. If that person skips the chance then put up and ad. Or just remove them. Thank you dev for the lovely game though ¶:

Don't get me wrong this app is addicting and fun. The thing that ruins this app is ads. For a game were it is meant to be played in quick bursts and you aren't meant to succeed for long periods of time, i don't understand how you can put an ad after every attempt. Sure one per 3 to 5 games and the another 30 second ad, but at the rate they come this game isn't fun anymore. The craziest thing to me is that i can't find a way to invest a few cents into the app to perma-block the ads. Come on dev i know you can do better than this. I will adjust the rating when i am offered a solution. Until then this 4 to 5 star app has 1 to 2 star potential.

Ya hate ads? Turn off wifi and play. Stupid phone/gaming noobs. Its a good game and dont hate on it for ads. The ads make the people who made the game MONEY. Give then a break. Let them have money while u watch something u might want. If u wanna turn it off, like i said, turn off wifi.
Would pay for the game to remove ads. I get you can turn off WiFi/data but it shouldn't be necessary, and is unfair to the company itself. Please offer a paid ad-free version!

I genuinely liked the game it was fun and addictive but the ads is what kills it. Ad pop up like almost everytime you lose.. other than that its a grest game. The ads make me want to delete it. I hated giving this game a 1 star..

description: Sniper! Enter the arena and become the #1 SHARPSHOOTER in this thrilling ‘sniper vs. sniper’ LIVE COMBAT game! description: In this game you have to do different kinds of work.You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them  on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.Download "Chop It" for free!Have a good game!
descriptionHTML:
In this game you have to do different kinds of work.
You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!

You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.

Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.

Download "Chop It" for free!
Have a good game!

descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: I Love Gardenscapes and It Is Fun Way to Be Creative.  A Recent Update has Made it Definitely Better.  The Support Team Has Been Exceptional With Quick Responses and Answers!  There is Room for Improvement in the Amount of Coins Obtained in Completing Tasks, as Well as Eliminating Repetitious Tasks Requiring More Moves.

Should make the money in higher value as it is very hard to accumulate.  Poor marks because it takes so much of your hard earned levels and drops you down the ranks if you don't solve immediately.  I was at ruby level and have so many points taken away now I am back to silver....uninstalling thanks for nothing.

I really enjoy this game, its quite addictive but i find it very satisfying. The only problem with it is that once you get into higher levels (i'm at 300) you start needing tons of stars for small things and for instance to get rid of one stump takes like 8 stars. Anyway I like the game and am going to keep playing it.

I use the love this game and have played it for months, but the lasted update ruined it for me. Every time you don't finish a level it asked you a second time if your sure to want to lose this or  that. I don't apreciate the guilt trip to try and get money out of me. It's dispicable and unethical!

If I could give it 0 stars I would. There is no way to contact support and you can't restart the game. I got a bad download and now I'm stuck with it. My personal information should not be part of playing a match 3 game anyhow. Game crashes at least once a day and my controls only work about 60% of the time. Horrible experience! Playrix should be ashamed of their programming here.

The game is awfully hard for what is essentially a match 3 game. For a game that is supposed to be as much about the storyline as it is about the matching, it sure doesn't want you to advance that storyline. It's more about the very obvious money grab than it is about game play. Do yourself a favor and don't waste the space downloading this game. There are much more enjoyable match 3 games on Play. There's a reason it's the #3 grossing game on Google play. It's all about how much you are willing to spend, not about the actual play.
description: Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory. Embark on an adventurous journey: beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the garden, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters, including Austin, your butler, and a funny dog! What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some gardening and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream garden for free! The game features:● Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!● Hundreds of unique match-3 levels● Dozens of in-game characters you can make friends with● An adorable puppy who is always there to cheer you up● An in-game social network you can use to keep tabs on everything● Different areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, an old mansion, and much more● A community that comes first — be neighbors with your Facebook friends!● A super addicting game you can even play offline! Gardenscapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Gardenscapes? Learn more about the game!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GardenscapesInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/gardenscapes_mobile/Twitter: https://twitter.com/garden_scapes Questions? comments: It's a simple little game that allows you to unplug your brain and allow the white noise of the universe wash over you. Not as challenging as Dark Souls. It's not even as challenging as peeling a potato. It does the job of distracting me from the stuff I should be doing.

Can't get the first fight to load. Game just freezes. Uninstalled and reinstalled 4 times now...and I still can't even get the very first fight to load. Pretty lame really...I thought this might be a cool game.
I have an issue, any time I tap the battle button it sends me to an empty background where nothing loads but the music so I can't even get past the tutorial... Any way to fix this?

Downloaded today cause it looks pretty cool. Well, everything works except the battle. Went to battle and all I get is the field background and music. Cant do anything until this is fixed. Will update review when this major bug is fixed.
Game is too simple no interaction in combat some taps for menus not fun to play at all. Also had a lot of ads play I put maybe 30 min in and saw 7 or 8 ads play
Fun game. Entertaining and easy to play. Glad I can walk away while it's running so I don't feel stuck starring at the screen.

comments: The controls are more difficult than the last time I played this game, which was a year or so ago. I don't know whether it is because of my phone or if it is in the app. Nevertheless good job, game is very addictive, keep up the good work 👌

this game is a thousand times better than agar.io in my opinion! It's so much easier to get onto the leader board. Every time I play I get onto the leader board. It's just so addicting and I can't get enough. Everyone in my family loves it too. Creating your own skin is a great option as well. It would be really cool if in addition to building your own you could create your own list of worms youve made and name if you want.

description: SkidStorm is a global multiplayer realtime racing game, free of charge and with simple graphics. You can challenge others online or play alone offline. It offers the smooth control which is really easy to get the hang of! In the game, you may drive the cars and drift though all kinds of tracks, swipe your fingers to experience the thrilling races. You may also fill up nitro tanks to speed up or overtake in the corner to become the champion.How to play:- Simply click the button “Left”, “Right” to control where the car goes, and fill up nitro tanks to speed up, and overtake in the corner to win the game.Feature:- 24 tracks for you to choose from and enjoy the multiplayer realtime racing to the limit- 17 different types of cars- 12 skins to customize your cars as you want- 5 upgradeable parts: engine, turbo, motor, nitrous and tires- Form a clan to play with your friends and share the glory- Leaderboard: win the trophies and get on the top of the chart- Various game modes: global multiplayer realtime matching mode, single player mode, Career mode, AI mode...- New content coming soon!Tips:- Carefully maintain your drifts to fill up nitro tanks and earn more chances to speed up- Chicane is the key of how you overtake the others- Use your nitro wisely: straight paths or the home stretch is the bestThe most latest drift racing game made by Cheetah Mobile. Go give it a try!We’d love to hear your thoughts and suggestions on our game. You are invited to join us to improve it together. More updates and surprises are coming soon. descriptionHTML:
SkidStorm is a global multiplayer realtime racing game, free of charge and with simple graphics. You can challenge others online or play alone offline. It offers the smooth control which is really easy to get the hang of! In the game, you may drive the cars and drift though all kinds of tracks, swipe your fingers to experience the thrilling races. You may also fill up nitro tanks to speed up or overtake in the corner to become the champion.

How to play:
- Simply click the button “Left”, “Right” to control where the car goes, and fill up nitro tanks to speed up, and overtake in the corner to win the game.

Feature:
- 24 tracks for you to choose from and enjoy the multiplayer realtime racing to the limit
- 17 different types of cars
- 12 skins to customize your cars as you want
- 5 upgradeable parts: engine, turbo, motor, nitrous and tires
- Form a clan to play with your friends and share the glory
- Leaderboard: win the trophies and get on the top of the chart
- Various game modes: global multiplayer realtime matching mode, single player mode, Career mode, AI mode...
- New content coming soon!

Tips:
- Carefully maintain your drifts to fill up nitro tanks and earn more chances to speed up
- Chicane is the key of how you overtake the others
- Use your nitro wisely: straight paths or the home stretch is the best

The most latest drift racing game made by Cheetah Mobile. Go give it a try!

We’d love to hear your thoughts and suggestions on our game. You are invited to join us to improve it together. More updates and surprises are coming soon. Stay tuned!

comments: Excellent brain exercise. This game is extremely addictive if you play the right way. It can help millions of your brain  cells  stay alive. If you want to be a great player, you must master with 2-letters word and 3-letters word. If you are not good  at it, then you'll be struggling against your opponent.

description: Play against 30 million opponents!Wordfeud is a multiplayer puzzle game where you can challenge friends and random opponents and play in up to 30 separate games simultaneously!Create and place words on the 15 by 15 tile board and earn points for creativity and placing letters on the high scoring Double Letter, Double Word, Triple Letter and Triple Word tiles.Search for friends to play against or allow Wordfeud to match you up with an opponent. Even chat with them - smack talk or praise - it's your choice!Tired of the same standard board each game? Choose the option to randomize the board and change up where the DL, TL, DW, TW tiles are placed - giving the classic game a new twist!Features:- Choose to play with friends or be matched up against random opponents- Play in 30 simultaneous games!- Random board option to mix up the DL, DW, TL, TW tiles- Push notifications informing you of opponent's latest move- Uses English, German, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish and Finnish dictionaries- Chat with your opponentsFor more information on Wordfeud, visit us at Wordfeud.com and follow on Twitter @wordfeud. Also check out the Facebook fan page at http://www.facebook.com/WordfeudGame
descriptionHTML:
Play against 30 million opponents!

Wordfeud is a multiplayer puzzle game where you can challenge friends and random opponents and play in up to 30 separate games simultaneously!

Create and place words on the 15 by 15 tile board and earn points for creativity and placing letters on the high scoring Double Letter, Double Word, Triple Letter and Triple Word tiles.

Search for friends to play against or allow Wordfeud to match you up with an opponent. Even chat with them - smack talk or praise - it's your choice!

Tired of the same standard board each game? Choose the option to randomize the board and change up where the DL, TL, DW, TW tiles are placed - giving the classic game a new twist!

Features:
- Choose to play with friends or be matched up against random opponents
- Play in 30 simultaneous games!
- Random board option to mix up the DL, DW, TL, TW tiles
- Push notifications informing you of opponent's latest move
- Uses English, German, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish and Finnish dictionaries
- Chat with your opponents

comments: I love it very much. I also have some sugjestons to make. I think you should make categories for Thu pictures (animals,people,food,ect) and also have a daily challenge where you have to finish a picture (that you say) and we have to finish it. You would get a prize of a amount of coins and you could save them up to buy new pictures or tools like the bomb. But i really like this game. So even if you don't do my sugjestons I will still love it. ❤❤❤

In my humble opinion, this game is truly a work of art and talent. This game can be used by people of all skill levels, due to the variations of complexity and difficulty within each pixel art piece. And it's just bursting and overflowing with hundreds, maybe even thousands of art pieces. There are hours of fun and relaxation awaiting you, and what a way it is to pass the time. Even better, it is appropriate for ages of all kind, including small children.Overall, I recommend this to anyone willing, for this is truly glorious.

AMAZING GAME! I am SOOOOOO HAPPY with this game! ITS SOO ADDICTIVE TO PLAY! SOOO MANY PICTURES TO CHOOSE FROM! THERE'S EVEN A TRUMP ONE(which is EXTREMELY funny)! THIS IS THE-BEST-GAME-EVER THAT I HAVE PLAYED!I LOVE THIS GAME SOOO MUCH THAT YOU, YES YOU, SHOULD GO DOWNLOAD PIXEL  ART RIGHT NOW! YES RIGHT NOW! SO GO AHEAD AND DOWNLOAD IT!!! (also this is the longest thing i have EVER typed on my phone!)

I love this game! There are so many pictures to color! This game will keep me occupied for hours! I just love how creative they are! But one question...Why do more pictures come by and take the place of my new colored ones? Like, why do more pictures come by everyday? It's kind of frustrating to color the new ones and then more appear the next day. Please fix, or stop the glitch. Overall, great game.☺

Awesome app, its oddly satisfying and can either be really challenging ir really easy. Its constantly update with new pictures to do, and already contains probably hundreds lol, if dont 75+ and in saving the really detailed ones for last. If there even is such a thing. But, i think a counter for how many blocks of each color are left would be a really awesome alteration. There are many strategies to use when you do a color by number. So a counter for how many blocks of the selected number are left, it would be such a life save.this game has taken enough of my life already as is lmao

Way to many ads, was hard to enjoy. Would have been more bearable If the ads weren't 30 seconds each, and played everytime I open/close a drawing. And, to prevent any ads you have to pay. I just want an easy, accessible, relaxing game. And by either making one pay, or making them suffer is not really my idea of "Relaxing". Thank you for your consideration.

comments: Addicting and a good time killer, but there are a lot of ads, and every time I downloaded it, it gave my phone a virus. If you have a new and protected phone, get the game, but if you have an old phone, do not get this game. IT WILL GIVE YOUR PHONE A VIRUS AND YOU CAN LOSE EVERYTHING ON IT!!!!!!!!

I really like playing the game, it's fun with all the different character mechanics, but after the last update there has been a huge increase in ads that take me away from the game and open up play store or chrome. It does this in the middle of a round, so obviously it screws up my gameplay. Makes me consider paying for no ads, but also makes me want to delete.

I would give all 5 stars if the game would work. I played it yesterday on two different devices with no issues and today it is just not responsive. DO NOT DL THIS GAME. TOO MANY SPAM ADS SAYING MY SYSTEM HAS A VIRUS ALONG WITH ADS SAYING I WON A GIFT CARD.....JUST HAVE TO REGISTER ONLINE ETC... DO NOT D.L

It's an amazing concept and idea that is very entertaining. The bad thing is that the ads interrupt the game so constantly that it messes up your shots and your online games too.  If that can be fixed so they appear after a match not in the middle of one that redirects you to a page full of ads and false notifications, then it will be a very awesome experience.

Fun, but will not let me "watch video" to collect chests or continue ongoing game. Always says "failed to connect" or something. It crashes mid game sometimes or when I'm choosing a character. It's fun but needs work.

I WANT to like this game. It's fun. The problem is the ads (I'm fine with ads. It's a free game) but mid game it randomly opens ads. I'm talking the kind that take you to a whole new window and tell you your phone is infected and won't let you go back without closing that tab. It screws up your shots and it's just NOT ok. Please fix this mess and I'll redownload and give the game a better review. Ads are one thing but when they make the game unplayable, I have to delete the game.

Fylder (for) meget og kan ikke flyttes til SD.
Virker ikke på min Lenovo tablet. Hænger efter den første Animation...

description: Bemærk: I visse tilfælde virker Ramasjang appen ikke på Android 5.0 og Android 5.01. Dette skyldes ikke en fejl i appen, men en fejl i Android 5.0 og brugerkonto administrationen. Det burde kunne lade sig gøre at afvikle Ramasjang appen fra hovedkontoen på din enhed. Besøg landet Ramasjang – de små børns helt egen legeplads, hvor de kan se tv og spille med de velkendte figurer fra Ramasjang. Her kan dit barn trygt og nemt hoppe fra det seneste afsnit af Lille Nørd til en musikvideo med Rosa fra Rouladegade og lege med sjove spil i Ramasjang. Ramasjangs app er rettet mod børn i alderen 3 til 6 år. Den er gratis, fordi den er finansieret via din medielicens.Indhold:- Thomas på tur (spil)- Luk op Luk i (spil)- Robot værkstedet (spil)- Mini-værkstedet (spil)- Cykelræs (spil)- Cirkusspil- Sprinter (spil)- I bad med Onkel Reje (spil)- Robot værkstedet (spil)- Ramasjang hospitalet (spil)- Olines Ø (spil)- Skæg i rummet (spil)- Rosa fra Rouladegade (spil)- Onkel Rejes Smadremaskine og Karatetornado (spil)- Bamse (spil)- Hr. Skæg (spil)- Skæg med matematik (spil)- Oline – Rend og hop (spil)- Ramasjang Mysteriet (spil)- Prutteklaveret (musik)- Tv og musikvideoer fra DR Ramasjang- Æggeur (sæt en tid på hvor lang tid dit barn må bruge ramasjang app'en)- Kodelås til Ramasjangs web-tvRigtig god fornøjelse!

Besøg landet Ramasjang – de små børns helt egen legeplads, hvor de kan se tv og spille med de velkendte figurer fra Ramasjang. Her kan dit barn trygt og nemt hoppe fra det seneste afsnit af Lille Nørd til en musikvideo med Rosa fra Rouladegade og lege med sjove spil i Ramasjang.

comments: Awesome Game!! Really I like this game. I dont even have words to describe it. Totally Fantastic... Whatever you say, this is totally cool. But I have a request...please add a column of legendary bikes. Like there is Common, Rares, Epics, and Specials , there should be a column of legendary. Waiting eagerly for the next update. Thanks a lot of making this fabulous game. And I would also like to appreciate the colours and graphics of this game. Thanks to the team for making this game. I advice this game to those who are looking for cool new games. Please install it and have FUN!!!! Dont just look at the pics, install and you'll be amazed.

Unless you have 16 hrs a day to put into this game to learn the track you will never have a very high score. Sometimes your vehicle doesnt respond the same as other runs also you may land on your tail and survive and the next time you die its up and down with the control if you keep going or die. And sometimes it tries to flip when you try to take off resulting in a quick death

Would and will give 5 star. But would like to see a gem counter. It gets rather tough keeping count.  Also I noticed sometimes that when come across the areas that have the 4-5 flat spiked walls that you have to time just right. When I die and revive they all seem to sync up together making it impossible to go under. I'll try and screenshot it next time. All in all great job and awesome game. Maybe a custom map feature for future. Possibly added to the no ads fee. Would be worth it then.

This game is my favorite game ever. The graphics are amazing, the controls are great. I can't seem to find anything wrong with this game. Me and my brother love playing it. I also like that it is available on Google Play Store and the Appstore on iPhones. My old phone was an iPhone, and when I got my new phone I was worried that I wouldn't be able to play it, but thanks to Ketchapp and Google Play Store, I can still play it!! Also, I would like to suggest that you add a feature that allows you to create your own level, but it's not something you have to add, it's just something I think would make the game absolutely perfect for me. Then again, you may already have that feature and I haven't seen it/gotten to it yet. Anyway, it's an amazing game, and I hope Ketchapp keeps making amazing games like this!!! (BTW, Ketchapp games are my absolute FAV.) Thank you!! 🚘😊🚘

This game would be great if it wasn't so laggy. Usually I would think it was an issue with phone storage or something, but I am on a new phone (note 8) and have only added a few apps in total. The game was smooth the first day or two but now the speed changes throughout play. The levels become impossible because the clock doesn't slow down even though the movement of the bike does.   Great concept and design. Hopefully that can be figured out if it is an issue on their side.

The game is great fun. I have been playing it for a few months and actually still play it. The only problem i seem to have with it. Is the laggish performance when i am connected to internet. The moment the internet is off then game runs more smoothly other than that. Still enjoy playing it. Though I must say it would be nice if there was a gem counter for each ride so i know how many I have collected. Otherwise great game

comments: Solid mahjong solitaire.   Lots of boards, and daily puzzles to play.  A little heavy on the ads if you want to play days in the month you've already passed.  And ads in between each lvl.  You can pay 2 bucks to remove the ads, but isn't necessarily going to make the experience better.  The ads are short, for the most part, but still can get annoying if you've played 10 puzzles in a row.  And considering you can complete a puzzle under or around the 2 min mark, those ads add up.  Worth a dl if you enjoy this type of game.

Love this game...not many ads! I get frustrated in other mahjong games because you have to win all the treasure or pay to go further..this one so far I haven't had too..I can just continue to play as long as I want.... recommend this mahjong game.

Graphics are beautifully presented, you can play for hours without getting bored. Plus, for those like me who loves a good challenge, there's the "three star" achievement for every level. Makes it even more challenging!
I find myself sitting down and just playing this. It's a good way to pass the time and keep entertained. My only complaint is a lack of variety in the soundtrack, but for free, can't be to picky.
I recently had a stroke. Using this game I can tell a difference in how fast I am putting my thoughts together. Plus it is plane odd fun. Thanks.
The app all the sudden has Google ads right in the middle of the screen preventing me from playing.

comments: It's an amazing game, but the only problem I have with it is how many levels there are... I mean when I first downloaded it there was only 6 levels XD  I know that should be a good thing but I can't seem to finish them all lol. GREAT GAME!!! DOWNLOAD RIGHT NOW!!! LIKE... RIGHT NOW!!! This game is fun but one problem.  My ball keeps randomly rolling off the edge for no reason. Plz fix this then u will get 5 stars.

This game is great. The levels are challenging and fun but personally I think this game could be a lot better if you added a level editor so you could make levels and post them online for others to try. This would totally make your game a lot more exciting and fun.

It's a great game, but after about 5 or 6 months it doesn't load probably get it but be aware that sometimes it won't load I have it and it is terrible that after a short time it won't load the game!Please fix this!
I like this game. Just a few complaints. Massif should still be the first level and the head song of the game with the exception of the new level song playing. Please!!!!

comments: Honestly i really enjoy the game thus far thank you for all the recent updates niantic... but there is one thing that has been bothering me and that is 1v1 with friends and trading... both features were shown in the original trailer... yet again i love the care your giving the game niantic i truly praise it but i would like to know whats happening with my 2 listed thoughts

Simply just needs more events. I get why trading isnt available yet, which is to prevent RMT and if you have RMT that's just the end of the game. But hope you could soon add the 1v1 battle feature, BUT WITH MOVES LIKE THE REAL GAME NOT JUST TAP AND USING THE SPECIAL SKILL.   Overall love it tho, been walking 2km/day for 2 whole weeks now. (Lookin for a gastly xD)

Please have more legendary raid events with gen 1 and 2 Pokemon for new and returning players who want to collect everything. With regards to using GPS and joystick cheats you guys actually benefit by getting more players from rural areas or dangerous areas playing and spending money. Besides you still have to do all the hard work minus the walking so it technically isn't that unfair to others especially since everyone is level 40 these days with legendary Pokemon. The game is already balanced just needs more events. Please consider a premium service to pay for where we can use a joystick in game. We can pay monthly or something so everyone benefits.

I love this game! Been just playing on my wife's account. Just recently decided to make my own, and it will not let me get past choosing my first Pokemon. They all spawn in the same spot and it quickly shows error 11 or whatever and won't even register me moving. I've tried everything to toubleshoot and fix it. Nothings working. Really sucks because I love playing. Can someone fix this or tell me what's going on?

thx for niantic that always listened our sugesttion, but i wish we can trade or battling with other player around the world by staying at poke center or else... - and btw you should update the new gym and new pokestop... since when i was on holiday in Indonesia theres not so much pokestop and gym around :( even there are many landmark in there - another suggestion plz maked some item that can be used to summon legendary/raid battle in location that we want, so its much easier  for the communities to do raid battle in specific location

Can you developers make it so people can trade pokemon and other things like items? Itll make the game sooooo much better if teamates could trade items and Pokemon. People did it with cards, atleast to trade Pokemon. My bf and i play along with his friend David and when one of them need something that i got and visa versa, we should be able to trade. If you guys can make it happen, ill give this 5 stars instead of 4.
description: Join Trainers across the globe who are discovering Pokémon as they explore the world around them. The newest update to Pokémon GO, the global gaming sensation that has been downloaded over 750 million times and named “Best Mobile Game” by The Game Developers Choice Awards and “Best App of the Year” by TechCrunch, introduced a dynamic weather system that recognizes real-world weather, impacting the gameplay experience in a variety of ways, from changing the Pokémon encountered to increasing their effectiveness in combat.Venusaur, Charizard, Blastoise, Pikachu, and many other Pokémon have been discovered!Pokémon are out there, and you need to find them. As you walk around a neighborhood, your smartphone will vibrate when there’s a Pokémon nearby. Take aim and throw a Poké Ball… You’ll have to stay alert, or it might get away! Search far and wide for Pokémon and itemsCertain Pokémon appear near their native environment—look for Water-type Pokémon by lakes and oceans. Visit PokéStops and Gyms—found at interesting places like museums, art installations, historical markers, and monuments—to stock up on Poké Balls and helpful items. Catching, hatching, evolving, and moreAs you level up, you’ll be able to catch more-powerful Pokémon to complete your Pokédex. You can add to your collection by hatching Pokémon Eggs based on the distances you walk. Help your Pokémon evolve by catching many of the same kind. Choose a Buddy Pokémon to walk with and earn Candy that will help you make your Pokémon stronger. Compete in epic Gym battlesYou’ll join one of three teams and battle for the ownership of Gyms with your Pokémon at your side. As your Charmander evolves to Charmeleon and then Charizard, you can battle together to defeat a Gym and assign your Pokémon to defend it against all comers. Team up to defeat powerful Raid BossesA Raid Battle is a cooperative gameplay experience that encourages you to work with up to 20 other Trainers to defeat an extremely powerful Pokémon known as the Raid Boss. If you succeed in defeating it in battle, you’ll have the chance to catch an extra powerful Pokémon of your own! It’s time to get moving—your real-life adventures await!Note: - This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. It is optimized for smartphones, not tablets.- Compatible with Android devices that have 2GB RAM or more and have Android Version 4.4–7.0+ installed.- Compatibility is not guaranteed for devices without GPS capabilities or devices that are connected only to Wi-Fi networks.- Compatibility with tablet devices is not guaranteed.- Application may not run on certain devices even if they have compatible OS versions installed.- It is recommended to play while connected to a network in order to obtain accurate location information.- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.- Please visit www.PokemonGO.com for additional compatibility information. - Information current as of December 6, 2017.
descriptionHTML:
Join Trainers across the globe who are discovering Pokémon as they explore the world around them. The newest update to Pokémon GO, the global gaming sensation that has been downloaded over 750 million times and named “Best Mobile Game” by The Game Developers Choice Awards and “Best App of the Year” by TechCrunch, introduced a dynamic weather system that recognizes real-world weather, impacting the gameplay experience in a variety of ways, from changing the Pokémon encountered to increasing their effectiveness in combat.

Venusaur, Charizard, Blastoise, Pikachu, and many other Pokémon have been discovered!
Pokémon are out there, and you need to find them. As you walk around a neighborhood, your smartphone will vibrate when there’s a Pokémon nearby. Take aim and throw a Poké Ball… You’ll have to stay alert, or it might get away!

Search far and wide for Pokémon and items
Certain Pokémon appear near their native environment—look for Water-type Pokémon by lakes and oceans. Visit PokéStops and Gyms—found at interesting places like museums, art installations, historical markers, and monuments—to stock up on Poké Balls and helpful items.

Catching, hatching, evolving, and more
As you level up, you’ll be able to catch more-powerful Pokémon to complete your Pokédex. You can add to your collection by hatching Pokémon Eggs based on the distances you walk. Help your Pokémon evolve by catching many of the same kind. Choose a Buddy Pokémon to walk with and earn Candy that will help you make your Pokémon stronger.

Compete in epic Gym battles
You’ll join one of three teams and battle for the ownership of Gyms with your Pokémon at your side. As your Charmander evolves to Charmeleon and then Charizard, you can battle together to defeat a Gym and assign your Pokémon to defend it against all comers.

Team up to defeat powerful Raid Bosses
A Raid Battle is a cooperative gameplay experience that encourages you to work with up to 20 other Trainers to defeat an extremely powerful Pokémon known as the Raid Boss. If you succeed in defeating it in battle, you’ll have the chance to catch an extra powerful Pokémon of your own!

It’s time to get moving—your real-life adventures await!

Note:

- This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. It is optimized for smartphones, not tablets.
- Compatible with Android devices that have 2GB RAM or more and have Android Version 4.4–7.0+ installed.
- Compatibility is not guaranteed for devices without GPS capabilities or devices that are connected only to Wi-Fi networks.
- Compatibility with tablet devices is not guaranteed.
- Application may not run on certain devices even if they have compatible OS versions installed.
- It is recommended to play while connected to a network in order to obtain accurate location information.
- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.
- Please visit www.PokemonGO.com for additional compatibility information.
- Information current as of December 6, 2017.

summary: Step outside and catch Pokémon in the real world! Collect & battle with others.
title: Pokémon GO
