comments: Although the game is simple, it has the charm needed to be an app game. The animation follows this rule too, as it is simple and effective. I also love the art of all the snakes; watching them evolve into huge monsters! My only complaint is that choosing custom coats of paints for the snakes can be teddious, as some of the spots are really small. Also, adding more customizable hats would be nice, though not needed. All in all it's a really fun, addicting game. Good job!!

I love this game adds really get annoying sometimes but the game makes up for it snakes are cute and adorable and this just makes it better thank you for making such an amazing game
Simply, I think this game is the  best thing ever! Tapps evolution games are everything, especially this one. Keep up the good work, tapps!
I think its very addicting and keeps you from boredom. What i like about it is where you can evolve the snakes and customize them :)
description: Yes, snakes are venomous, slithering and hissing creatures that love to dance the Mambo, but if you want to take over the world, you’ve gotta side with them.Create new mutant serpent species by entangling different snakes and start scheming your viperous total domination plot right away!Just be prepared for lots of hissy fits.SNAKE FEATURES🐍Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery🐍Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the snakes.HOW TO PLAY🐍Drag and drop similar snakes to create new mysterious creatures🐍Use snake eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money🐍Alternatively, fiercely tap a snake to make coins pop from their eggsHIGHLIGHTS🐍Different stages and many snake species to discover🐍A mind-blowing story with viperous twists!🐍The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker games🐍Doodle-like illustrations🐍Open ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!🐍No snakes were harmed in the making of this game, only developersSnake? Snake? SNAAAAAAAAKE!Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionHTML:
Yes, snakes are venomous, slithering and hissing creatures that love to dance the Mambo, but if you want to take over the world, you’ve gotta side with them.

Create new mutant serpent species by entangling different snakes and start scheming your viperous total domination plot right away!

Just be prepared for lots of hissy fits.

SNAKE FEATURES
🐍Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
🐍Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the snakes.

HOW TO PLAY
🐍Drag and drop similar snakes to create new mysterious creatures
🐍Use snake eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
🐍Alternatively, fiercely tap a snake to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS
🐍Different stages and many snake species to discover
🐍A mind-blowing story with viperous twists!
🐍The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker games
🐍Doodle-like illustrations
🐍Open ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!
🐍No snakes were harmed in the making of this game, only developers

Snake? Snake? SNAAAAAAAAKE!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: Look, I understand that you have to make money somehow, and ads are how you make money on a free game. But these ads are way too frequent and obnoxious. I listen to podcasts while playing games and every minute or so my sound cuts out completely to prioritize the ad. Earn the ad by giving me a decent amount of playtime before it and stop overriding my audio.

Well i would give this five stars but you cant watch an add to get a power up! And you should lower the ad mount of adds i cant go in for 10 seconds without an add popping up!! Overall good great game
Way too many ads after every time I lose or go onto another level an advert pops up. Verry annoying. But the gameplay is decent.

I like the game itself but when you have 3 adds coming up after one game you hardly can enjoy the game. Super annoying, so if you download it for free be prepared to buy it otherwise it will drive you crazy!
What's with the annoying adverts? Why they seem to go on forever? FFS way too many.. Uninstalled... Get rid of the fcukin' ads and I'd play this game til the end! I really would.

comments: Game is good as all just dance video games. Daughter enjoyed it until noticed that she had only a few dances then had to wait. There should be at least a shorter time to wait. Or some sort of option to earn more coins. Because 2 videos weren't enough. And one of them didn't work because the connection was lost. Again game was okay as for game play. But not sure its a keeper.

I like it, I use it to exercise and have fun with my sister. Only question I have is: How accurate is the kcal Burned counter? I played for over an hour and I am told I burnt 1,252 KCals. I question the accuracy of this. You update the game often, so can you put in the game somewhere the average calories the song the user is choosing to play burns? That is my biggest concern. Otherwise, no issues. Fun, easy to use. Great way to get exercise in all the while enjoying it with family and friends.

It's fun to do and this game is perfect for me because I love to dance. Dancing is my favorite thing to go when I'm bored. I love the songs and dance moves it's awesome to play and do. Thx for making this game cause now I can do more dancing and dance moves. You guys should download this game for you new people cause it's awesome to learn but in a fun way. So if you suck and don't know how to dance then you should download this game it's perfect for you if you want to know how to do simple but hard dancing moves.

It's a good game overall but the songs that are supposedly meant to be free aren't. I would rate it 5 stars but I can on play 3 songs every 24 hours. I'm trying to workout while doing this but a workout isn't a very good workout if it's only for 6 minutes. Please give us a higher coin  limit and cut the wait time down some. Then and only then will I rate it 5 stars.

Honestly, the game is great. It loads good, has amazing graphics and is easy to play. However the credits situation is absolutely retarded. I feel as if we shouldn't have to wait twenty-four hours to play ONE dance then wait again or pay $2.99 per DAY just to dance. You should at least have a page of good free dances for when someone has nothing to do!

I really enjoyed playing this... Or at least the two songs I was able to play based on the coins that I had. My only criticism so far is that there should be ways to earn coins other than waiting so long for refills, watching ads, or buying coins. This strict control on earning coins doesn't make this a great game to play with a group of friends (though I know that you can buy VIP passes which are valid for a limited amount of time). It would add to the game play (as well as the overall experience of the game) if coins could be earned during the game in power ups or when you get perfect scores. This would give incentive to keep playing, let the games potentially last longer, and add to the competitiveness between players to enhance gaming fun.

descriptionHTML:
Unleash your inner Dancer with Just Dance Now!

Enjoy Just Dance's greatest choreographies without a video game console! You simply need your smartphone as a controller and an internet-connected screen (computer, iPad, Apple TV, Chromecast or Smart TV). (1)
More info on www.justdancenow.com

Dance to your favorite hits among more than 300 available songs including 42 songs from the latest installment available only on video game consoles, Just Dance 2017!

Enjoy the Just Dance experience:
• Instant: you can dance to your favorite songs in just a few taps!
• Social: party with 10, 100, or 1000 players if you want! You can dance with the entire world!
• Fresh: new songs and exclusive content are added every month!
• Customize: create your own playlists with your favorite songs and earn coins to unlock new ones!

(1) Internet connection required

While the game will work great with any connection, we recommend connecting with Wi-Fi or 4G for the best experience.

description: Integrate yourself into a world of high stakes deception and heart pumping action when you download, Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break. It's time to run, shoot and dodge fellow inmates and vicious prison guards. Feel the danger as you blast through three intense landscapes and enjoy amazing 3D graphics and pixel game animations. Download for FREE today and experience a classic block game for the ages.The Underbelly of the Justice System...Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man has been locked away behind bars at a super-max penitentiary, his termination imminent. He insists he's innocent, but there is no proof or ounce of human-compassion to support his claim. This man, is you. Meanwhile, his absence from the capitol has opened up the seat to a demonical politician whose corrupt beliefs have the capability of upturning a nation. Time is of the Essence... It's time to take drastic measures and claim your own freedom and prove your innocence before the government is overtaken by double crossing politicians and the nation as you know it is turned upside-down. Think Strategically, Fight for Survival...When the time is right, you make a break for it, knowing the inner workings of the system. Understanding this will be no easy task, but an exhausting feat of brute and intelligence, you begin the fight for your life. Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break is a challenging first person shooter action game that is a thrill a minute experience. From the collection of hidden melee and firearm weapons and the scattering of helpful pickups to the mobs of savage enemies and the tricky landscapes, this game is ripe with intense play. Enjoy intuitive controls and massive levels that boast dangerous battles that will require quick thinking and fast reflexes. Fight your way against dozens of foes and take control over the justice system as you battle your way to freedom. The fight starts now. Characteristics: Hidden melee & firearm weapons. Collect health and ammo pickups as you explore your surroundings. Prepare for enemies to increase as levels progress. Interactive map. Choose from a variety of weapons. Expansive levels to explore.

comments: Meget god app men små justeringer skulle tilføjes og flere små præmier  som kunne får på selve spillepladen
Syns det er en meget sjov app, men efter at have factory reset min telefon kan jeg ikke længere logge ind, den siger jeg kan kun logge ind et sted, men er ikke logget ind nogen steder.
God app. Har givet en grund til at se reklamer.

God ide, men dårlig udførelse. I en digital verden hvor mit gammeldags TV abonnement for længest er udskiftet med TV2 Play er det simpelthen ikke holdbart at man ikke har en udgave som "synkronisere med TV2 Play" (forsinkelse på ca 1 minut). Det gør app'en fuldstændig ubrugelig og man er efterladt i en situation hvor det eneste man kan gøre er at sidde og klikke på alle muligheder på skift, konstant i de minutter reklamerne kører.  Jeg forstår hvordan det kan være vanskeligt. En nøjagtige synkronisering er umulig når reklamerne (TV2 Play) afspiller er en anden device (fx Smart TV) end den Reklame Bingo kører på. Men så lad folk gætte en rækkefølge af reklamer og få point efter hvor mange rigtige de har. Eller sørg for brugeren kun kan gætte en gang per reklame (så når brugeren starter sit første gæt, betyder det reklame blokken er startet hus brugeren) eller hvad ved jeg.  I mangler dygtige udviklere som løser sådan nogle problemer. Forstår ikke i kan stille jer tilfredse med den løsning i har nu.
Sjovt koncept, men dårlig udførelse. Som flere siger, så er signalet bagud på Play, og halvdelen af gangene kan jeg ikke indløse brikkerne, selvom jeg har set reklamen.

Som andre nævner det..hvis du har TV2 PLAY, så er signalet 2 min bagud i forhold til kabel tv.. og når ens egen service ikke kan matche med en konkurrence man selv kører, virker det i min optik meget useriøst. Håber på at det kan løses med et lille if statement ved at blandt andet at tjekke om en bruger har TV2 PLAY og tillade delay på input
description: TV 2 gør det endnu sjovere at se reklamer. Med ReklameBingo kan du, når du vil, spille med om lækre præmier, mens du sidder foran fjernsynet – helt gratis!ReklameBingo fungerer som en interaktion mellem din smartphone og det der sker live på din tv-skærm.I stedet for de traditionelle tal på bingopladen er der logoer fra virksomheder, som du kender bl.a. fra reklamerne i fjernsynet. Når der vises en reklame, som matcher et logo på spillepladen, markerer du feltet. Spil med: Download ReklameBingo og log ind. Du får derefter automatisk en bingoplade og kan begynde at spille. Det er nemt og ligetil. Ved hver reklameblok på TV 2s hovedkanal kan du spille med og dermed indsamle logoer til din bingoplade. Vind: Du har bingo, når du på din bingoplade har markeret alle 16 felter. Hver gang du får bingo, udløser det et lod i lodtrækningen om ”Ugens Præmier” samt ”Månedspræmien”. Du kan have lige så mange lodder i puljen som du vil. Ligesom ved traditionelt bingo, bliver du også belønnet ved 1. række, 2. række m.m.Bonusfeltet: Når du markerer et felt og der vises en stjerne, vil du modtage en speciel bonuspræmie fra den annoncør, hvis logo er vist på feltet.Der kommer en pop-up på din mobilskærm, hvor du kan se præcist, hvad bonusfeltet indeholder.  Herefter gemmes din bonus automatisk i app’ens underside ”Bonuspræmier”, hvor alle dine bonuspræmier er samlet. Guldmønt: Guldmønten er en slags joker.  Med en guldmønt kan du markere et valgfrit felt på din spilleplade. Guldmønten kan bruges på tværs af alle felter og kan dermed hjælpe dig til hurtigere at få bingo!Du belønnes eksempelvis med en guldmønt ved 1. række, 2. række og 3. række, eller når du udfylder din profil samt svarer på ekstra spørgsmål under ”Tjen Guldmønter”.Præmier: Præmierne varierer uge for uge, og du kan se på undersiden ”Præmier”, hvilke præmier der er i spil i den pågældende uge samt måned.SKRIV ANMELDELSE AF APP`EN I APP STORE Synes du godt om ReklameBingo, så skriv en anmeldelse af app'en  i App Store og giv app`en stjerner fra 1 til 5. Send også gerne feedback direkte til kundeservice@tv2.dk, så vi kan få dit input, og du kan være med til at forbedre ReklameBingo.
descriptionHTML:
TV 2 gør det endnu sjovere at se reklamer.
Med ReklameBingo kan du, når du vil, spille med om lækre præmier, mens du sidder foran fjernsynet – helt gratis!
ReklameBingo fungerer som en interaktion mellem din smartphone og det der sker live på din tv-skærm.
I stedet for de traditionelle tal på bingopladen er der logoer fra virksomheder, som du kender bl.a. fra reklamerne i fjernsynet. Når der vises en reklame, som matcher et logo på spillepladen, markerer du feltet.

Spil med:
Download ReklameBingo og log ind. Du får derefter automatisk en bingoplade og kan begynde at spille. Det er nemt og ligetil. Ved hver reklameblok på TV 2s hovedkanal kan du spille med og dermed indsamle logoer til din bingoplade.

Vind:
Du har bingo, når du på din bingoplade har markeret alle 16 felter. Hver gang du får bingo, udløser det et lod i lodtrækningen om ”Ugens Præmier” samt ”Månedspræmien”. Du kan have lige så mange lodder i puljen som du vil. Ligesom ved traditionelt bingo, bliver du også belønnet ved 1. række, 2. række m.m.

Bonusfeltet:
Når du markerer et felt og der vises en stjerne, vil du modtage en speciel bonuspræmie fra den annoncør, hvis logo er vist på feltet.
Der kommer en pop-up på din mobilskærm, hvor du kan se præcist, hvad bonusfeltet indeholder. Herefter gemmes din bonus automatisk i app’ens underside ”Bonuspræmier”, hvor alle dine bonuspræmier er samlet.

Guldmønt:
Guldmønten er en slags joker. Med en guldmønt kan du markere et valgfrit felt på din spilleplade.
Guldmønten kan bruges på tværs af alle felter og kan dermed hjælpe dig til hurtigere at få bingo!
Du belønnes eksempelvis med en guldmønt ved 1. række, 2. række og 3. række, eller når du udfylder din profil samt svarer på ekstra spørgsmål under ”Tjen Guldmønter”.

Præmier:
Præmierne varierer uge for uge, og du kan se på undersiden ”Præmier”, hvilke præmier der er i spil i den pågældende uge samt måned.

SKRIV ANMELDELSE AF APP`EN I APP STORE
Synes du godt om ReklameBingo, så skriv en anmeldelse af app'en i App Store og giv app`en stjerner fra 1 til 5. Send også gerne feedback direkte til kundeservice@tv2.dk, så vi kan få dit input, og du kan være med til at forbedre ReklameBingo.

Great graphics and realistic feel to the lanes. Controls are a bit wonky, however, and purists won't like being being able to steer the ball after it leaves your "hand." LOTS of attempted upsells, but its free to play features ain't too bad on their own, either. All in all, a decent little bowling game.

It's a  fun game but it's rigged. I think if you have a billion chips you shouldn't be able to play on lower lanes. I thought you were supposed to be matched up with people who are the same or close level. How is it I'm bowling against someone who is level 171 and 8 billion chips and  I'm level 43 .

Amazing.  It's just fun watching the bowling hall whizz by and get a strike.  I've played and uninstalled this game, but the only reason for the uninstall part is storage.  For all of you who are new, try getting the ball between the front pin and either of the pins next to it, it usually gets strikes, but by strikes I mean doubles against level 7 Russians.

This is a fun game however it allows people to cheat or it's rigged. It's no coincidence that the better I play the better my opponent plays. I think half the time we are playing a rigged computer. I spent $50 on this app in a week and I am deleting it now. Sorry crooked people that run this app.

description: Water slide & water park building simulator. Design and build the best theme park with waterslides! Feel the uphill rush when you're racing in a watery roller coaster! Build a fun park like you always wanted! Now with blueprints to help you with the creation of the craziest, most dangerous and fun water slides in the whole world!Have you ever wanted to own a water slide park? Become a water park tycoon and build a place where everyone can enjoy playing among the world's craziest attractions!Construct water park games, test them and unleash them on visitors! Your waterslide park will be bustling with happy clients when you'll stuff it full of crazy attractions. comments: Players are bailing from this game like crazy. My clan has lost nearly all the higher level players, most from leaving the game. So the clan is all low level players who can't contribute as much. Arena player's list shows everyone but the top 3 not playing all week. A ton of other issues that you can find in any ABE forum and even in the comments on posts on the ABE Facebook page. I think Rovio's stock trend shows it all.

This use to be my favorite game. Have spent alot of money playing. Due to the "white out" have not been able to play for 3 months. Even after several updates, nothing. Tech support claims to be on the issue... Very frustrating!!!!

I used to love this game, but the changes make me HATE it now. Like it's so hard to get a premium hatch ticket now, yet y'all still throw two star and three star Birds in there. The Halloween event is impossible with the numbers set so high, and the amount of skulls you receive in a battle is 5-10 max. This game has become a money pit, and I think I'm out. Rovio got greedy, and I don't appreciate it. You ruined the game for sure

OK. So, it started off fun. But, now all I get is lost connection, slow connection or some other BS! I'm not going to be able to get any further because I won't pay for stuff. So, it's going to be uninstalled. Of you must, play for a week, then ditch it
The game keeps closing during play causing player's to loose prizes and money. It's having more problems with every update. Support staff are pretty useless when reporting glitches.

More or less meh, can do with or without. Asks frequently if you enjoy the app, if you say "no" then that's it. However, only if you say "yes" will it ask you to rate it. Pathetic that the developers don't actually want feedback. Needs some smoothing out on a few things, but Rovio doesn't care.

descriptionHTML:
Collect, assemble, and evolve your flock.
100+ crazy new Angry Birds?! We’re gonna need a bigger nest. The flock is bigger and badder than ever before. Build your own team, combine super skills and evolve your birds into their ultimate form.

Embark on an epic adventure.
Something sinister is brewing on Bird Island. Why are there so many pigs around? Who is behind the mysterious Bacon Corp? What’s the Eagle Force? Who lost the dungeon keys? Find the answers – only in Angry Birds Evolution.

Crush the pigs in explosive battles.
What’s worse than egg-stealing pigs? Over 90 different varieties of egg-stealing Pigs, that's what. Pirates, ninjas, tourists – someone has to clean this place up. Let the feathers fly in full contact battles and send the pigs packing.

Join weekly events.
Earn awesome rewards, and get a chance to add extra rare birds to your team by taking part in weekly events. Join by yourself or assemble a clan of buddies to compete with other clans. Build the strongest, most awesome clan on Bird Island and rule the roost!

Compete against other players.
The Oinktagon: two teams enter – only one leaves (victorious). Challenge other players in PVP tournaments of the Bird Island pastime, Pigball, and dominate the leagues for even more awesome rewards.


FEATURES:
– Over 100 colorful new characters to hatch and collect.
– Assemble the ultimate flock of birds and take down the pigs with ease.
– 5 Classes of birds with unique abilities.
– Evolve your feathery heroes into unstoppable super birds.
– Explore the island and stop the Bacon Corp.
– Climb up the Eagle Mountain and win ultimate eggs.
– Battle other players in the Oinktagon.
– Join clans to unlock perks, compete with other clans, and chat with clanmates.
– Send out scouts for rewards & challenges.


This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
- This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may include data charges.

comments: The game is great. But there are more ads in this game than any other game I've ever played. The amount of coins you make is little and everything is really expensive. Then one you buy an upgrade it's only for an extremely short amount of time before it breaks or you run out of ammo. Fix these issues and the star rating goes up.

Average Game not bad but, not for youth group only for kids's (3+ in game mention) Time pass. All stages are same no creativity no regards no bonus even 1st update want 50,000 points (how can kids earn 50,000 point) & no diamond given by game. Only Purchase - Purchase - Purchase  Greedy Developer...

Too many ads. And game takes way too long to be able to make any money organically. The developers are greedy, and ruin the game by throwing too many ads at you(after every level!), and then by making the levels almost impossible without purchasing items with real money.

3 days worth of playing, reached level 26 and gathered almost 10,000 coins..  went to the store only to find out the next slingshot costs like 500,000 coins! Wow maybe in another 3 MONTHS of playing this I'll be able to afford something from the store!
Very good. Could be a little more crazy with distractions like planes flying in the distance, people arguing in the background, trash/dirt blowing around, etc.
I clearly won a game and it gave it to my opponent.... not kool.

comments: Game is fun until you get so far and can no longer upgrade to compete.  I have all stars in amateur league, yet on achievement rewards it shows I only have 1 star.  This is a problem to try to earn stars to purchase higher end cars, you can't without spending money.  Should be anle to earn all cars if you play regularly withput spending money.

Nice game at first, my gf got angry at some point because I played it the whole time. However, I soon started playing less and less, because winning just became impossible. I respect the developers, but I wont pay to max out a cars modifications just to race that same car which is twice as fast. How does that work? Are the AI cars getting modifications from a different game?

It would br better if you could exchange coins for diamonds, not just diamonds for coins. I also have a screen shot which shows that I should be the 1 place, yet another car which was behind me and crossed the line 1 sec later got the first place :/

So many ad's, there back to back ad's. When I am finally able to select a race, guess what...another ad pops up and takes me to the play store to download it. I go back to the game and I gotta start all over again from the first screen. Ad's ad's ad's I was only able to play on the first day I downloaded it, after that..... Ad's ad's ad's                    "AD'S!!!".... But i did like the game when I played it

Good time waster. Especially well made in the beginning levels, but quickly becomes pay to win, as diamonds are not easily attainable and neither are coins, not to mention that later cars are very high prices and require much dedication to acquire. Controls are nice, but like with money, get worse with time. Maps are not optimized for later leveled cars, making some corners physically impossible to make even when drifting at full tilt, forcing the player to adapt to a combination of drifting, boosting and then braking to get around a bend without crashing. Otherwise, it is a very nice game for being free, although there are many ads, but that's excusable as it is a free game. I would recommend it, just not as a long term type of game.

I one stared it because it has good graphics and what not but the only problem is this is a complete knock off of "Asphalt 8" features and everything. I'd say it's so much alike I'd call it plagiarizing but that's just my opinion.  Good game overall but no respect for not being something differebt in a better way .

comments: To many ads, even if they make the game free.. Pathetic. Conflicts with game when trying to back out of them and even crashes. Inconsistent game play, twitchy controls at times. Unplayable shots where one number on power scale is to hard the next one down is to soft.  Multi player has a feel of being rigged at times.  Potential for a good game but not yet in my books.

Used to be so much better. Cameras are now not fluid, it doesn't show the hole prior to shot anymore. Truthfully, it was awesome before you made changes... It goes back to the old saying, "why fix it if it isn't broken?"

Super fun game, but WAY TOO MANY crashes. I've been struggling with a level several times only for the game to crash mid-level and I lose all my progress getting booted back to the beginning. Infuriating!
Awful controls, heavily focused on buying coins & watching ads just to play matches. Not recommended!
This game is good. You should try to make it a lot more like golf with friends (the Steam game). Try to make the graphics look more detailed and better. Add more maps too.

Some observations: ball does not rebound off rails as they should, especially the back and side rails near the hole, where the ball hits the rail and stops dead. Part of miniature golf mastery is using the rails but not in this game. And when the ball is against a rail a shot is allowed as if the rail was not present. After a shot the screen should automatically rotate close to what the next shot would be expected so as to minimize manual rotation. I was making a long swipe to rotate almost 180° and my finger hit the power slide and an errant shot was made. Most hills are not smoothly sloped but instead very angular. Hitting the bottom of the slope causes the ball to jump in ways unanticipated rather than roll. This is golf, not basketball. I uninstalled the game because it just wasn't as fun and realistic as I had hoped.

comments: Really fun.  But crashes constantly on my Galaxy S5.  Then I have to force stop the app, and restart my phone to get it working, for about 5 minutes....  All have to do to avoid ads is not restart until the respawn timer clears, so they aren't that bad, and it's really cheap to turn the ads off.  I would happily do so, it the app would run for more than 5 minutes.  If it wasn't for the crashing, I would rate it 4 stars at least.

Love playing this game...very addictive! I would rate it 5* if there was a reason for why you level up and why you keep spinning for little lightening bolts when you do level up  as once you have bought the small amount on offer they are no longer needed. Add more things to buy and give the game a reason for levelling up 🤘🏼

Smooth game. Plenty of fire ball options and endless level options but after every death you have to watch  15 second ad. EVERY DEATH. Which just spoils the experience and all. I understand ads but like after 3 deaths that's fine. But after every death and some are unskippable. So download of you have patience. It's worth it of you have time to spend

One of the most glitchy apps. The ads don't bother me, if you hate the ads so much pay the money to get rid of them. But this game constantly crashes and freezes. And half the time you will click to change your ball or rings and it won't load or do anything. This game is full of glitches. Would be an amazing game if this was attended to

A wonderful aesthetically pleasing game.  Get as far as you can, with as many points as you can while unlocking different fireballs and portals. I would love to see how this game evolves in the future and i have not seen as many ad's as people claim so perhaps that issue has been resolved? Working perfectly on S8+

TOO MANY ADS, every time you die you get an ad and that's just being money hungry what ever happened to games without long ads what's the point if you're gonna make a game and 1/3 of the gameplay being ads. Perhaps every 10 or 20 games, or just have those small popup ads, but don't ruin the gameplay because you want money. I'm uninstalling and I'm sure other people are as well.

comments: Being named the end of game's title "io" is just wrong... this was completely an offline game, so in other words you're playing completely with bots. But still though, it is kinda fun would be MUCH more if there was a real online gameplay...

The game is boring, all you do is try to make your base bigger and the screen only gets bigger like one time. It's really easy to become number one on the leaderboard and eventually you just want to die, this game sucks compared to any other game ending in io
Filled with bots, there are very few real people I face, its far to easy because of this. I've taken the whole arena 5+ times with ease. At least have the bots use bot as part of their name.
Liked playing this until it started giving me a messenger pop up. Happens many times each day and it doesn't matter what you're doing at the time. How can I stop it? Deleting for sure if it keeps up.

I love this io game! I usually find a few problems with any io game I try but this one is in my top three. It's easy to control which is very important and the graphics are awesome. If you like io games, I've it a try. 😀
Too many bots and the game keeps asking me to give it more access to my phone than it really needs to run.   Other than that it is fun.  If they fixed these issues it would be 5 stars.

comments: All you do is watch ads. Start the game, you get an ad. Play one round (rounds last about 30 seconds), watch an ad. Play two rounds, watch an ad. Want to double your earnings from last round? Watch an ad. Play a round. Game crashes. Open the game. Watch an ad. The game itself would be ok but the constant bombardment of ads is just too much. Literally half of the time spent in the game is just watching ads.

When I play I have my Wi-Fi on for multiplier please turn off Ad's! from turning on every time I enter the level and die( it's enough for me to watch Ad's  to get bonus credit please turn them off for free it slows down very badly my speed of progress! Only rated the best! "For you guys to remove AD'S...

Can't disable or lower sound in game. Seems like such a basic mechanism to be missing. Overall feels incomplete, with an unbalanced economy based on advertisements with no real progression coming from play time. Decent concept, poorly executed.
There seem to be way more ads than in earlier versions. it's getting a little ridiculous, especially early on where a round might only last a minute or two with a 30 second ad between each round.

Tried playing, but you want permissions you don't need and the self advertising of your other products is complete garbage. Oh not to mention the buttons don't work correctly because of where you register the button pushes on a pixel 2. Also you don't respect the Android device flow, back keys should dismiss your stupid pop up ads not close the game

Great game, but the ads would never work. They just stopped, and would never go back on. So it would randomly pop up an ad then stop it so you had to exit the app. It also happened when you optionally watched an add. Pls fix!

comments: I recommend not to install. You can get banned anytime even without a warning or any explanation, and when u contact support you will get auto response. Bad customer support. I got banned a second after reporting two cheaters or bots idk and they took my 12 billions.

I've found it very disappointing when  other user's connection is bad and their counter time takes forever while they're not even active. IMO if it happens twice they should be kicked. No one likes slow poker, especially when the player isn't even playing.  Other than that everything else is pretty awesome.

Had trouble restarting sit and go. Returning to lobby and reentering addressed problem. Pretty good app. Challenges are obviously based on bankroll making it more of a player's game instead of a winner's game because poker is not a winner's game. Long play on shootout can be annoying but why you buying in at 2k? You get to play daily if you like to play for free and can even complete challenges when you went bust.

Hands dont seem to be computer greedy to take your chips. Nor give higher level players generated wins with getting obvious flop or river cards giving them a win on a ridiculous hand they go all in on.

I do think the games are rigged, how the hell do I loss over 100million chips in a 24hr span. Any time I played I couldn't win a hand, no matter how damn good my hand was, someone else would have an amazing hand. Something fishy man!

today i have 1b and 500m. and then i play with my friend i get banned why ? because i dont do anything wrong and i love this game all the time. i get banned and i dont stop play but today. i will stop play this thank you zynga and also i buy alot of chips from zynga and u give me banned all the time thank you.

description: Ski, shoot and win!More than 1,000,000 players from all over the world have already experienced the exciting life of a professional biathlete. Do you have what it takes to ski fast and then shoot down all the targets? It is time you joined the other players in the only game of its kind. In Biathlon Mania you can even compete against real biathletes from the World Cup circuit.Biathlon Mania is an action sports game with RPG elements and the most successful and most played biathlon game of all time. You can control, improve and train your biathlete as you see fit. You decide everything that goes on - improve your attributes, construct new facilities, learn new skills, build up your club, defeat opponents from all across the world, win tournaments and be at the top of the world. Whether you win or become an also-ran is purely down to your skill. Show everyone that you’ve got it! description: All aboard! Driving the colorful LEGO® DUPLO® Train from station to station is any toddler’s dream. Your child will play the role of the train driver, load cargo, build bridges, stop at crossings, help passengers, refuel, and lay new tracks to steer the train safely around obstacles.Copying grown-ups and their activities is important to your 2-year-old toddler’s development - and few things are as ‘grown-up’ as driving a huge steam train through the scenic countryside, full speed ahead, horns tooting.If your toddler is fascinated by trains, this simple game will provide new inspiration for hours of creative play - with or without a LEGO DUPLO train set.Features:*Bright, fun, and toddler-friendly animations and sound effects*Intuitive icons and navigation for easy game play*Cute, interactive DUPLO landscape with lots of building fun and surprises*Based on the DUPLO My First Train set and familiar animals and characters*No in-app purchases*No third party advertising*Parental gate to information about other LEGO DUPLO apps and productsAbout LEGO® DUPLO®A preschool building toy specifically designed for children ages 1 ½ - 5 – small hands and big imaginations! Preschoolers can learn about shapes and colors hands-on. When the chewing-the-bricks phase fades out, the building experience phase takes over, helping to stimulate and improve fine motor skills development. (And yes, bricks-poured-onto-hard-surface noises stimulate other senses, too.)BEST GAME FOR TODDLERS 	This educational app for toddlers helps them develop their skills in a playful manner. We believe it is one of the best educational game for toddlers produced by LEGO which focuses on their development. This is also a great educational game for older kids because they can play with the LEGO® DUPLO Train. EDUCATIONAL GAME FOR 2 YEAR OLD KIDSThis is the best first app for your kid. It was developed in order to teach digital skills, develop creativity through play and build motoric skills for your child. This is an educational app for 2 year old kids which will contribute to their development.  BEST FIRST GAME FOR KIDSIs your kid just starting to play on digital devices? Are you looking for an app which will help him develop his mind and understanding of the surroundings? LEGO® DUPLO® Train is the best app for kids 2-4 years old. CREATIVE GAMES FOR TODDLERSThis is a great creative app for toddlers which will help them develop their creativity. LEGO® DUPLO Train is one of the best role-play apps for toddlers in 2017 and allows your toddler to be the train conductor and drive the train through a kids safe environment. DRIVE, BUILD AND HAVE FUNBeing able to have so many role-play possibilities, your toddler will be able to play the app in endless ways which will allow him to put his imagination into action. FREE TODDLER GAMESAll the LEGO® DUPLO® apps are free to play and offer no in app purchases. This is one of the best free educational game for kids under 4 and it is an app your kid will enjoy. Visit the parents section in all the LEGO® DUPLO® apps for more information about the LEGO® DUPLO brand.Visit LEGO.com/family for more build & play inspiration. Visit LEGO.com/duplo/apps to find out more about other DUPLO apps.For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service.For contact details refer to http://service.lego.com/contactusOur privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app. Read more on http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-appsLEGO, the LEGO logo and DUPLO are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2016 The LEGO Group.

description: Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resistDo you dream of coaching a team of eleven stars hungry to be champions? New, free soccer club sim Top Soccer Manager puts sports fans like you in charge! Bid on and scout for top players, build and train a team with special skills, test tactics and formations against real opponents from around the world, and watch the match in live 3D simulation.BEAUTIFUL GAMEPLAYTop Soccer Manager's immersive 3D graphics and a powerful game engine bring your coaching fantasy to life. Watch stunning games play out in real time as you command your eleven players or bet on other matches in your league. Every goal is a step further on your journey to victory.MANAGE & TRAIN YOUR SQUADAs club head, you will test different formations, adjusting player line-up and tactics during play in response to your opponent. Pick a promising player to groom into a hero with special skills to score in the ultimate showdown. descriptionHTML:
Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resist

Do you dream of coaching a team of eleven stars hungry to be champions? New, free soccer club sim Top Soccer Manager puts sports fans like you in charge! Bid on and scout for top players, build and train a team with special skills, test tactics and formations against real opponents from around the world, and watch the match in live 3D simulation.

BEAUTIFUL GAMEPLAY
Top Soccer Manager's immersive 3D graphics and a powerful game engine bring your coaching fantasy to life. Watch stunning games play out in real time as you command your eleven players or bet on other matches in your league. Every goal is a step further on your journey to victory.

MANAGE & TRAIN YOUR SQUAD
As club head, you will test different formations, adjusting player line-up and tactics during play in response to your opponent. Pick a promising player to groom into a hero with special skills to score in the ultimate showdown. Build a team of champs to climb the leader board.

HUNT FOR STAR PLAYERS
Hunt for players to meet your team’s needs. Bid against other soccer managers to win golden boys in the market, recruit all-stars with an agent, or use scouts to find young hopefuls you can make into tomorrow’s legends. Transfer players who no longer fit your strategy.

RICH MULTIPLAYER EXPERIENCE
Face off against real opponents from around the world in league games. Give your team unique style with officially-authorized jerseys from Premier League, La Liga，Primeira Liga, Bundesliga, MLS. Grow your network of friends, exchange gifts, and grow team experience through friendly matches. Create or join a Soccer Association to gain more rewards.

For any issues or suggestions please contact us at https://gamegou.helpshift.com

description: Search for hidden treasures, solve puzzles, fulfil godly quests and reveal the greatest mysteries of the past in Diggy’s Adventure. Diggy's Adventure Features:- #1 Rated Adventure Game- 1000+ Riddles & Puzzles to solve- 500+ Labyrinths to escape from- 100+ Funny characters to interact with- 5 Mythological locations with loads of forgotten treasures- Regular weekly updates full of fun events- 18 languages to play in- Dedicated team working tirelessly to tease your brain and challenge your skillsJoin the family of Diggy, Professor, Linda and Rusty on their journey to explore the world full of ancient civilizations and mysteries.No secret may remain hidden!Diggy's Adventure is a perfect game for all types of players. Get ready for a greatly written story full of plot twists while progressing through thousands of brain-teasers and beautiful locations as Egypt, Scandinavia, China or Atlantis. Enjoy the creative side of the game - craft items and match various ingredients to help you digging, build your camp or decorate it. Developing your camp is vital since each maze and riddle require energy to get through the blocks and advance into the other location or mine.Solve riddles & puzzles to gain rewardsGain rewards and experience points to improve rate of energy regeneration or maximum energy capacity by digging through the mines and fulfilling in-game quests assigned by Gods and other characters. Each special event brings you a big content update as well as a lot of tiny improvements to make the game even more challenging and entertaining.Note: A network connection is required to playNote: Diggy's Adventure is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money.Do you have any suggestions or problems? We would love to hear from you!Contact us at support@pixelfederation.com!
descriptionHTML:
Search for hidden treasures, solve puzzles, fulfil godly quests and reveal the greatest mysteries of the past in Diggy’s Adventure.

Diggy's Adventure Features:
- #1 Rated Adventure Game
- 1000+ Riddles & Puzzles to solve
- 500+ Labyrinths to escape from
- 100+ Funny characters to interact with
- 5 Mythological locations with loads of forgotten treasures
- Regular weekly updates full of fun events
- 18 languages to play in
- Dedicated team working tirelessly to tease your brain and challenge your skills

Join the family of Diggy, Professor, Linda and Rusty on their journey to explore the world full of ancient civilizations and mysteries.

No secret may remain hidden!
Diggy's Adventure is a perfect game for all types of players. Get ready for a greatly written story full of plot twists while progressing through thousands of brain-teasers and beautiful locations as Egypt, Scandinavia, China or Atlantis.

Enjoy the creative side of the game - craft items and match various ingredients to help you digging, build your camp or decorate it. Developing your camp is vital since each maze and riddle require energy to get through the blocks and advance into the other location or mine.

Solve riddles & puzzles to gain rewards
Gain rewards and experience points to improve rate of energy regeneration or maximum energy capacity by digging through the mines and fulfilling in-game quests assigned by Gods and other characters. Each special event brings you a big content update as well as a lot of tiny improvements to make the game even more challenging and entertaining.

Note: A network connection is required to play
Note: Diggy's Adventure is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money.

Do you have any suggestions or problems? We would love to hear from you!
Contact us at support@pixelfederation.com!

summary: Explore world's biggest mysteries in our addictive puzzle solving game!
title: Diggy's Adventure

comments: This game is amazing, it really helps with stress, anxiety and just any and all negative emotions. With its calm, relaxing music and adorible graphics, this well thought out game is the perfect way to releave stress. I really recommend downloading this game, trust me, you'll love it!!!😁

Very relaxing. I fell asleep playing this game. Though it's a bit addictive, so I don't like playing during the day. Another problem is that saving and loading the game between devices from the cloud are a bit confusing. There is no explanation and I haven't gotten it to work.

PLEASE DON'T IGNORE...I need help, there appears to be a glitched achievement and it's driving me insane. I wish not to be intrusive  about it but my Ocd's  preventing me from continuing on thinking I will not be getting the other achievements. It's the Disiplined V, which is the 4000 for the virtues, I unlocked the virtue but not the achievement . I even reset my oasis twice and nothing

Honestly I am quite disgusted at how many 1 star ratings there are. I agree it's boring, HOWEVER, only in some cases. I don't play for fun like I guess what most of the 1 star ratings are for. Its not meant to be played for fun but meant to try to calm down or relieve stress for anyone playing it. If you're playing for the sake of fun then yes it will be boring. DO NOT download this game if you are seeking something to entertain you. It is boring for me when I play like that. However if you play to try to find a way to calm yourself down, say you need something to distract you, it will really work. The game really works for me when I am in a mental breakdown or feeling extremely suicidal. Playing My Oasis in those state of minds has helped me to calm down instead of acting on suicidal thoughts. This game has also helped my older brother when he has a breakdowns as well because of his depression. This game IS a tap game but it is not pointless if you play the game for the reason you're supposed to play it for, which is to relax/calm down.

So, I really enjoyed oasis for a while, at least until they rolled out this new update. One of ly favorite things was unlocking the animals and I had three. The movement was nice.   Now, with the update, you can only have one and choose to upgrade the amount you can have with diamonds. Do you know how irritating it is to have something suddenly locked that you already had unlocked through previous game play? Very.   I don't suspect I'll keep in installed much longer.

I really like this game, but I'm giving it one star until they fix it. I have the auto cumulation for all the traits, but it's about a 30% chance it works. If I don't go in within the 24 hour mark (or I upgrade anything a good amount), it cuts my gains and makes it like I earned nothing. So, love this game, but until the bug is fixed, it's getting 1 star. It's really irritating I need to go through this after also sending them an email on what's going on.
description: Taking a break can be difficult when there are so many things to do, and you have so little time to spend for yourself. My Oasis is a game app created for people who need a break from life.My Oasis does not focus solely on the gameplay and it contains no content that can stress you out. Let your Oasis gradually expand while you interact with the surrounding life in a relaxing atmosphere. It will calm your mind before you know it.* Deleting this app will also delete its data. Make sure to save your data on the cloud server before deleting the app.* Please write a review. We will read every comment and try to make the app better!
descriptionHTML:
Taking a break can be difficult when there are so many things to do, and you have so little time to spend for yourself. My Oasis is a game app created for people who need a break from life.

My Oasis does not focus solely on the gameplay and it contains no content that can stress you out. Let your Oasis gradually expand while you interact with the surrounding life in a relaxing atmosphere. It will calm your mind before you know it.

* Deleting this app will also delete its data. Make sure to save your data on the cloud server before deleting the app.

* Please write a review. We will read every comment and try to make the app better!

comments: Bought all the babies when I first downloaded the app. Everything was working great. So when the most recent (3) babies were available for purchase I bought them, but now those babies don't work!.... I'll give five stars when you get them to work. In the meantime, I think I should get a refund on my money.

My daughter loves this game and plays it all the time. I just bought her all of the last babies today for her to have them all and the bottle freezes and she can't play with her new babies. If someone could fix this for me or refund me that would be great. I just got 6 new babies and she can't use any of them which is ashame cause she loves this game.

Bought the game early on, then after an update with new babies they mixed the new babies in.  So you are left with a child constantly wanting the new babies.  A horrible money grab.  Otherwise a fun game.  Shoyld not show the locked babies mixed in with purchased ones.

Dang, I wish the purchases I made on 6 more babies for my daughter would just work! She loves the app, but gets frustrated that the whole app freezes when she clicks to play one of the other babies. Wouldn't recommend this app because of that... it's just stealing my money..

Downloaded this game for my daughter and we never got to play because the game will not load. It gets stuck on the bottle screen and then has a black screen after that. She has Nabi tablet, so I will keep the app for now and just disable it. Please fix soon!!!
Would like my money back too..or fix the app! Wish I had read the reviews before I spent money to buy my daughter the other dolls. We're both very disappointed!
description: Play along in Doc McStuffins: Baby Nursery, the first free-to-download Doc McStuffins app. There’s so much you can do to take care of your very own adorable baby dolls, with the help of Doc McStuffins herself! •	CeCe and Bunny baby dolls are ready for you to bring home, name, and accessorize.Zebra, Penguin, Butterfly, Bumblebee, Ladybug, Turtle, Panda, Puppy, Kitty and Lobster baby dolls are also available through in-app purchase.     •	Care for your baby dolls by bathing, feeding, napping, and playing fun, interactive games with them. •	You can even capture their special moments and earn stickers in your very own customizable baby book.So much to do!  •       12 baby dolls: Collect all nine—each with a unique theme, nursery, outfits & accessories•	Meal time: Feed your baby doll different yummy meals•	Play time: Bond with ticklish laughs and giggles•	Peek-a-boo: Surprise and delight to watch their silly responses •	Bath time: Give a soothing bath with lots of bubbles and fun•	Change station: Change diapers and play dress up with adorable outfits •	Nap time: Soothe your baby doll to sleep with different sights & sounds •	Baby Book: Capture your baby dolls’ special moments in your very own, customizable baby book•	Bouncer: Play with many activities like the xylophone, twirly flower and more•	Birthday Party: Decorate and celebrate with fun party themes, including your very own cake•	Doc McStuffins and Lambie are on-call to lend a helping hand!Like us on Facebook for cool games tips & the latest news: www.Facebook.com/DisneyGames.Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content, as well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies and some third parties. descriptionHTML:
Play along in Doc McStuffins: Baby Nursery, the first free-to-download Doc McStuffins app. There’s so much you can do to take care of your very own adorable baby dolls, with the help of Doc McStuffins herself!


• CeCe and Bunny baby dolls are ready for you to bring home, name, and accessorize.
Zebra, Penguin, Butterfly, Bumblebee, Ladybug, Turtle, Panda, Puppy, Kitty and Lobster baby dolls are also available through in-app purchase.

comments: Really fun and adictingl but for samsung galaxy core prime this game has A LOT of bugs and glitches. Tried to play for more than five minutes is making the phone first freeze the screen then restart itself. Some cabs never arrive. Need a lot of bugfixes right now. Other than that it is a good game that i like.

For a game so heavily reliant on ads to deliver benefits to the player, it is a gamble sometimes whether or not those ads will crash the game and therefore cost you the prizes. The game itself is all right, but this gamble drags down the experience when it doesn't work.

It's like owning your own transportation service like Uber or Lyft, but in arcade Crazy Taxi meets Monopoly. If you hire drivers to your service, you not only make more money, but you expand your  territory. I love the diversity of the characters, how you have new with the classic arcade characters like Axel, Gus and Gena. And I also love the concept is modern, but has the classic arcade concept and feel with the scratch cards, gems, and money. Bonuses are earned through accomplishing objectives, and of course, ads. Thanks Sega. 👌👍❤

Outstanding game. My only fuss is cars get trapped in some buildings during attempts to retrieve funds. Going back to another stage and returning to the stage I'm engaged in usually resets game play. Otherwise, great game.

It's a chilled game to play. There are a bit too many ads. And it because it is just tapping, it can be a bit boring after a while. It takes long before you get somewhere new. But all by all it's a free easy game to kill time perfectly.

Only game that has not begged for money and really is fun to play if you can keep up with all the fares driver's n cabs. Just try it yourself. It can be addicting if you don't take your eyes from it haha

description: Krydsord.dk’s nyeste app på markedet fokuserer på lette kryds & tværs opgaver. ‘Den Lette’ er til dig, som ønsker at få et dagligt fix af krydsordsopgaver, som kan løses på ganske kort tid.Som det er tilfældet med alle de andre apps fra Krydsord.dk, er ‘Den Lette’ 100% gratis at benytte. Betragt det som endnu en gave fra os til jer. Og som med de øvrige apps, finder du ligeledes altid mindst 30 opgaver i app’en. Og der lægges en ny opgave online hver dag.Opgaverne er udover at være populære hos voksne, velegnede til børn og unge der ønsker at styrke deres sproglige færdigheder.Afhængigt af dit niveau, så kan opgaverne normalt klares på helt ned til et par minutter - netop derfor har efterspørgslen på disse nemme krydsord været høj. De passer helt perfekt ind i en travl hverdag, hvor vi af og til har brug for et øjebliks fravær fra vores daglige gøremål.Krydsord.dk ønsker dig rigtig god fornøjelse med ‘Den Lette’ - husk også at holde øje med vores øvrige apps: Krydsord.dk XL (designet til tablets) samt vores ‘Den Lille Daglige’ som er mest velegnet til smartphones - nøjagtig som det er tilfældet med ‘Den Lette’.   Hvis du oplever problemer eller har spørgsmål til nogle af kryds og tværs opgaverne hører vi meget gerne fra dig på gert@krydsord.dk.

I do very well when I play as guest! Not so well with my FB account! It would be wonderful if you would loosen up a little and offer the 1 item I need in several map rooms! But I do love playibg Bingo Blitz xx

Will will not get a bingo with a 2x power up playing in legendary boost. The company knows, this was brought to their attention. They resolved it by blocking everyone from commenting on their FB page who publicly spoke out about the rigging. Do not buy credits, do not get sucked into this game. You will regret it.

comments: You're just plain fun! You really understand the right amount of challenge to keep it fun but not aggravating. Have to admit I did use some hints. May I make a teeny weeny suggestion. Make a link at end to "rate the game," I wanted to, looked around, in end clicked link to play red then find yellow to do this rating... that's cuz I like yah... thanks for the smile!

This is as simple as it can be, yet perfect in every way. Relaxing music that doesn't distract you from your game, smooth gameplay, easy controls. I liked the fact that you are tossed into the game without any tutorials, left on your own. I am not really into puzzle games but I completed this game in a single afternoon and it had me asking for more.

Just finished this one less than 5 minutes ago, I'd definitely have to say I enjoyed red more. yellow had some more difficult puzzles. Some of them were (kinda?) reused in red. I overall enjoyed it a lot!   I'm really looking forward to the next one!

It's so captivating I finished it in a single morning! I love how challenging the puzzles are at the same time they are fun. The level 49 made me go crazy because I couldn't get it right, I had to draw the squares  so I wouldn't press the wrong one. I totally loved it and I'm so going to download red!

I love Bonte  games. As always, beautiful graphics and just the right level of difficulty. Looking forward to the next one. Thanks Bart. I just have to edit this to add that I don't understand why people are complaining about ads. You only need to watch them for a hint, and only briefly. It's a free game, and the developer has to make a living. You can pay to get them removed, but they really aren't obtrusive at all.

To be honest, I was like this is going to be boring 💤, but within minutes, I was totally hooked. Absolutely amazing, love it. If fact, I went straight back online and got red. I've not heard of this Bart Bonte before, but he's a bit magic.

comments: I used to enjoy this app until the ramp up in ads. Now the ad banner obscures a third of the thread colours at the bottom of the screen. You're then left with the choice to remove the banner for ease of playing (by spending 500 coins or paying actual money to subscribe) or accidentally clicking on ads. What used to be a pleasant and relaxing experience is now fraught with unnecessary frustration.

I'm taking back 3 stars for the pain in the ass coins at the top, that interrupts my game play! It was great before you did that, now I have to click coin icons to get rid of it, or back out of he game, it's really annoying! Not to mention the ad at bottom covers part of the letters and bring you to the ad when trying to click the letter or number
A good way to pass the time with pretty pictures.
I love this game...
Way TOO MANY AD'S!!!!!!

Waaaaaay too many ads.  I've been playing for about 6 months and the amount of ads has gotten ridiculous.  I just had 5 back to back.  And now a different kind of ad pops up when leaving and opening the picture.  I'm uninstalling and trying cross stitch world.  This was a great app until all the ads.

comments: Nice game but beginner level 45 on Pipe connect does not seem to have a solution. Is this a glitch? I am updating my review. They responded and fixed the issue the next day! Thank you very much!

A good amount of puzzles in one app, but the early stages spam ads. It might be better when you start doing harder puzzles that take more time, but it feels like the ads break the gameplay too often early. Also it asked to rate maybe 3 times in the first 20 minutes I played.

This game at least has some different puzzles then puzzledom has. In fact, some of the puzzles in this one is the same then the ones in puzzledpom. In other words, some puzzles in this one is the same then the ones in puzzledom. This one has some different puzzles and so does puzzledom classic puzzles all in one, if you know what I'm saying. If you don't, that's okay. You  don't have to.

Great time killer and thought provoking. I also like the small animations and effects. This game is enjoyable and has a variety of puzzles to keep you puzzled to help you think of solutions to solve each puzzle. Great job!

I absolutely HATED how often this stupid game asked me to rate it. Give me some time to develop an opinion damn it! ......this game is not stupid. It's really a lot of fun. Hopefully it'll stop pissing me off now that I've left a review.

I adore this game so much, great amount of games, plenty of levels to last forever with a range of levels from begginer to master. Each level has different challenges and although it's simple, it gets more difficult each time.  I adore the graphics and the simple layout so it's not too much in your face and intimidating. I kind of wish there was some sort of music and a different way to delete mistakes because it's so confusing. Pressing the back button leads to the homepage  I'd also say that there should be a different button to find difficulty levels, because I find using an 'X' would say to close the app rather than find the difficulty levels.  Still, one of my favorite apps to use. I will never stop playing it. So well done :)
description: Linedoku is a bundle of the best logic puzzle games all about lines and loops.Enjoy colorful flow games, pipe puzzles, slide puzzles, connect dots, make infinite loops or link numbers - The perfect time killers!Challenge yourself, train your brain and become the puzzle king! ...or just relax and solve some levels.Block Puzzle: LinesA classic Block Puzzle Game interpreted in a new way. Drag and drop the blocks over the board and cover all the dots. Blocks shouldn't overlap and only be placed on the paths they fit into.Number MazeFind a way; Connect the numbers smartly in ascending order and draw puzzling one-line-mazes.Connect all the dots smartly and fill the grid to solve the level.LoopsFun level: Infinity. Loop puzzles about spinning and connecting cells to create infinite loops. Discover all the unique art pieces that unfold themselves.Cross PathTired of Sudoku? Here's a simple alternative. Fill the grid by drawing traces on the board. The number of traces per knot are limited and can only be drawn as straigt lines. The level is completed after every cell in the grid is filled.Color FlowDraw traces between dots of the same color and create a flow of colors. Fill the whole grid and connect all the dots to master the level. Slide The BlocksA classic slide puzzle. Shift and move the blocks and let the colors unroll through the path. Solve the level by connecting all the color sources with each other. The path also has to be a closed flow.Color LoopsLink the cells naturally together to create an endless flow of different colors. Be like a weaver of lines.Game Features* Minimalist and adult design* Play the best logic games all in one app* One touch gameplay - play smoothly one handed* train your brain with 4500 levels completely free to play* no wifi, no problem - playable offline* Clear your mind in the 'relax'- mode* Fill up brain power in the challenge mode* Free content updates* Compare your progress with other players on the leaderboards
descriptionHTML:
Linedoku is a bundle of the best logic puzzle games all about lines and loops.
Enjoy colorful flow games, pipe puzzles, slide puzzles, connect dots, make infinite loops or link numbers - The perfect time killers!
Challenge yourself, train your brain and become the puzzle king! ...or just relax and solve some levels.

Block Puzzle: Lines
A classic Block Puzzle Game interpreted in a new way. Drag and drop the blocks over the board and cover all the dots. Blocks shouldn't overlap and only be placed on the paths they fit into.

Number Maze
Find a way; Connect the numbers smartly in ascending order and draw puzzling one-line-mazes.
Connect all the dots smartly and fill the grid to solve the level.

Loops
Fun level: Infinity. Loop puzzles about spinning and connecting cells to create infinite loops. Discover all the unique art pieces that unfold themselves.

Cross Path
Tired of Sudoku? Here's a simple alternative. Fill the grid by drawing traces on the board. The number of traces per knot are limited and can only be drawn as straigt lines. The level is completed after every cell in the grid is filled.

Color Flow
Draw traces between dots of the same color and create a flow of colors. Fill the whole grid and connect all the dots to master the level.

Slide The Blocks
A classic slide puzzle. Shift and move the blocks and let the colors unroll through the path. Solve the level by connecting all the color sources with each other. The path also has to be a closed flow.

Color Loops
Link the cells naturally together to create an endless flow of different colors. Be like a weaver of lines.

Game Features
* Minimalist and adult design
* Play the best logic games all in one app
* One touch gameplay - play smoothly one handed
* train your brain with 4500 levels completely free to play
* no wifi, no problem - playable offline
* Clear your mind in the 'relax'- mode
* Fill up brain power in the challenge mode
* Free content updates
* Compare your progress with other players on the leaderboards

51688 Wipperfürth

summary: A collection of brain teasing puzzles - Draw lines, slide blocks & rotate pipes.
title: Logic Puzzles: Linedoku

comments: I love this game. Just like other reviews say, it is addicting and because there are constant tasks to complete. Plus!..unlike other games, there is no way you ruin out of coins/money. The cities bring in alot. I can't agree with one reviewer that megabucks are hard not come by.  I began with 25 I believe (now at 32) and some of the tasks to complete give megabucks without spending actual money to even purchase some.  All in all, try this game and you won't run bored of it.

Great, but really needs "sell all" function for dealing with store house and "pecial buildings" components.This is a really quality game, looks amazing, works well and has good timed construction projects. However, as others mention it takes SOOOOOOO long to accrue the assets for construction and the mega bucks for expansion. You have to be VERY patient if you are not willing to part with actual cash. An idea might be to offer a conversion of coins to megabuck, maybe get 1 buck in excahge for eg 5,000,000 coins?

Best game!! Very addictive, Been playing this game for over a year.. although, there are still alot to improve!  I hope the developers will include edit mode in the next update so that the players can rearrange their city..Also, I hope they will also include a 360 rotation of the city and add factories that can also create materials needed in the game like the railroad materials and steels. I am looking forward with this updates!!

lnstaII 'VEARN' App Enterr (CRETA) to Start Earning So far so good.Fun way to get money. Won't make you rich but the extra cash is helpful. It's also the best exchange rate on points. McEarn points equals mc instead of like some of the others where it takes VEarn points to reach vc etc...Also, lnstaII 'TOYOCASH' App Enterr (TRDG) very reliable in paying you when you redeem to toyocash. You can choose assorted giftcards as payment or transfer to Walet for cash. Your choice. I love these guys thanks for addingsome fun to my day.

The new update is great! Really appreciate the chat system. But it could be better... maybe add some functionality to the capital buildings and states.... maybe bonuses to taxes nd pop, loans, and coop science and military missions. The prices of capital building materials is ridiculous. Fixing these will make the state system look more complete.

Been playing for more than 3 years, i lost count. But this is a wonderful game which encourages teamwork and neighbor support. There are barely any paywalls in this game and  if you have hundreds of facebook friends who have this game you can easily get the materials you need to expand your city. No limits so far. I give ★★★★★s

comments: As it is with all BitMango games, there are far too many ads. The controls are way too touchy, such a simple game should never have been executed so poorly.

Its the perfect game for a phoneapp. Their is not much to it, so although is simple, it is also a challenge. Figuring out a challenging level is a good feeling. Absolutely love it. Their needs to be more apps like this one.
Fun game. Great way to use the ol' noodle. Too many ads, but hey we all got bills to pay.
I love this game.and the graphics classic and simple not hurting my eyes.. thank u.
I really liked it. I can't stop playing
Sometimes it's difficult to move some blocks. But you can have a fun while you are waiting for something
description: Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age!"Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" is a simple and addictive sliding block puzzle game.Perfectly solve stages without using hints and get 3 stars and a super crown!HOW TO PLAY• Need to move the red block to the exit.• Horizontal blocks can be moved from side to side• Vertical blocks can be moved up and downFEATURES• Hundreds of levels• Established a hint system helping you to solve puzzles• Reset/Undo buttons to help you figure out each puzzle• Smooth and delicate animation• Great sound effects• Try to enjoy the "Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" using various devices and screen sizes (Phones and Tablets).NOTES• "Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" contains the ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.• "Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like  AD FREE and Hints.E-MAIL• contact@bitmango.comHOMEPAGE• https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=6249013288401661340FACEBOOK• https://www.facebook.com/BitMangoGamesContact us if you have any questions, ideas for improvements or experience any bugs when playing the game: contact@bitmango.comEnjoy "Move the Block : Slide Puzzle"Thank you.
descriptionHTML:
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age!

"Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" is a simple and addictive sliding block puzzle game.
Perfectly solve stages without using hints and get 3 stars and a super crown!

HOW TO PLAY
• Need to move the red block to the exit.
• Horizontal blocks can be moved from side to side
• Vertical blocks can be moved up and down

FEATURES
• Hundreds of levels
• Established a hint system helping you to solve puzzles
• Reset/Undo buttons to help you figure out each puzzle
• Smooth and delicate animation
• Great sound effects
• Try to enjoy the "Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" using various devices and screen sizes (Phones and Tablets).

NOTES
• "Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" contains the ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• "Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and Hints.

E-MAIL
• contact@bitmango.com

HOMEPAGE
• https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=6249013288401661340

FACEBOOK
• https://www.facebook.com/BitMangoGames

Contact us if you have any questions, ideas for improvements or experience any bugs when playing the game: contact@bitmango.com

Enjoy "Move the Block : Slide Puzzle"

Thank you.

comments: I really liked this game when it had only 20 seasons & I uninstalled it after finishing. I again installed it and started from the beginning and after completing 573 games & 1487 stars I am giving you just 2star rating because game lag all the time sometimes the ads got struck or maybe during rewind I lose my $1 but the game didn't rewind back instead crash and auto shutdown and I ahve to start the application again. Before adding 30th season please update your games stability it will be more useful.
Like most other games, there is too much effort to bait you into micro transactions. The older games were so much better. It's a shame the Devs have resorted to such money grabbing standards.

I like the tactic aspect of it, pretty good time waster. Took me a while to beat it, but didn't have to spend a dollar to do it. The story itself is very unrealistic and after 15 seasons I completely stopped following it and focused only on the games.

There should be a full match game like this that isn't scripted. I love it! Should be an energy free mode maybe? As its a bit pay to win\microtransaction heavy.  They've made some changes, if you like ads and Facebook popping up after everything you do, then this is the game for you, dropped my rating 1 star as a result.  Also took out the ability to watch adverts for in game currency, now you have to pay. Even more of a cash grab now.
Really good game but just wish you didn't always have to go back and start from scratch on certain levels. Oh and maybe make buying the boots and haircuts etc a bit cheaper! Otherwise love it.

Basically a pay to win game. Would be more enjoyable with ads rather than forcing people to wait for 15 minutes to gain less than 1 minute of gameplay as a reward. It's an enjoyable game but not enjoyable enough to pay for.

comments: I like this game but there's so much cheating going on. It doesn't resister some of the moves you make or it's lagging and when you smash the minions they should fly away and not stick to the screen for ten seconds so you can't see what's coming next. Just stop cheating! Don't take 20hours to give the necessary tools when doing a double task in the jelly lab.

I have a Xiaomi Redmi 4 mobile with 3 GB RAM, 1.4 GHz Octa Core. Still Game hangs, Speed enhanced with a jerk every time and then it dies. I have reset my mobile and reinstalled it but the problem still there. It's very annoying. Otherwise I love this game. It's very addictive.

I love this kind of games, but this is the most incredible game i've ever played. I-N-C-R-E-D-I-B-L-E !!! I don't know & and l don't care what are u think about this game. I'm sure it's perfect for everyone. Any where, any time. I don't know why, but when l play this game l feel like l am the boss who commands to that minion who runs. I see that wonderful worlds and l feel like l'm doing all that job. When I was a little bit small, l was playing this game with my sister and the minion was ower slave. This game is very funny and, like Janise Palmer said, now l realize that l made a huge mistake. I have instaled it back and it's ok. I'm level 10 now.

The game used to be fun, but not anymore.  More than that, after i did a factory reset on my phone, I've reinstalled the game, but surprise... I couldn't sync the game to my Google account. All my progress in game was lost. All the money invested in this game was lost. I have sent them emails, tickets about it but no answer what so ever. The result is ---> uninstall

Really cool. Its just  too WEIRD. And sometimes when I try to Dodge an obstacle it won't do it. And  when the lanes bend its really Hard for me. And why do you Have to watch an ad to get free revives, get some tokens, refill the Battery for the special Mission and to open the green and blue prize pod AND to Double bananas you collect? GREAT GAME I JUST HATE THE ADS.

This game is awesome and funny I guess. I'm trying to think of something to complain about (I love complaining) but I can't!! Oh wait........... You could make things like characters and stuff less expensive. It's  Ike....I go on SHOP and it says stuff like (random minion) 1234 tokens!!  Dats 2many bro!

***WHAT'S NEW***
