comments: Amazing addictive game. Try it out! Not too many ads, and just the right amount of challenge without pulling your hair out. Sometimes there's a hidden dot in the title, or ones that are almost the same color as the background, but it's not bad enough to lose a star.

Updated with no fix...  problem still persists.  No exit button and controls for the back button are very wonky. Need to add dedicated exit button or fix what happens when you tap / swipe the blank park of the screen. Trying to bring the controls up from their hidden state selects options is frustrating. You end up starting games. Very unpolished controls, imo.

Cool game, only bad thing is that tutorial levels are rated as bronze so you can never have all gold.. I tried doing the same tutorial three times in a row, then it is counted as gold, but when you exit the game and enter again that it is bronze again

Interesting puzzle type game.  Using rope is a bit challenging on small screens.  It used way too much background data which is not have related at all.  My phone gets hot when using the app.  Uninstalling
Different and fun. Not too hard but still challenging.  Daily challenges are impossible to complete though (bug?) , so don't bother with them (hence my only giving 3 stars)

This right here is a work of genius.  My only wish is for an undo button, for when you accidentally touch a part of the screen and it places a spot/cut/bridge in an unwinnable spot.  Especially annoying during daily challenge that you can't re-do.  Also, I would like to be able to retry any level, such as the daily or randoms, even if it wouldn't "count". I'm convinced every so often there is an unwinable level, but you can't even test it or let the devs know because once you fail it goes away permanently.  Still, a great, great game... I really hope there is a V2 some day.
description: Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle is a new Zen puzzle published by the creators of Puzzlerama and Mazes & More. Challenge your brain, draw, cut and erase to find the solution to the 250+ smart levels. Relax, unwind and let the color flow into the labyrinth of lines, in a Zen experience that will let your mind flow free and antistress. Some levels have a perfect symmetry, other are a maze of lines. Can you master all of them? No pencil needed!How to play Lines – Physics Drawing PuzzleDepending on the level, you will need to tap to place a dot over a line, erase and opponent´s dot, cut or draw lines. Then watch the colors unfold and flow!Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle key features include:- 5 different modes: Point, Erase, Cut, Draw and Mix- Daily Challenges- 26 achievements to unlock-250 smart levels- Use your brain and logics to find the solutions- Bronze, Silver and Gold medals for each level.- Infinite fun!Point ModeTap over a line to place a dot. Be smart and choose and strategic and logic position for the dots. Sometimes you need to place one, other two dots.Eraser ModeTap over an opponent´s dot to erase it. Draw ModeDraw a line with your fingers to connect lines to your advantage. Use your brain!Cut Mode Cut a line to stop the flow of your opponent´s color. Hope you all guys enjoy Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle! Created by our Dutch friends from Gamious!
descriptionHTML:
Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle is a new Zen puzzle published by the creators of Puzzlerama and Mazes & More. Challenge your brain, draw, cut and erase to find the solution to the 250+ smart levels. Relax, unwind and let the color flow into the labyrinth of lines, in a Zen experience that will let your mind flow free and antistress. Some levels have a perfect symmetry, other are a maze of lines. Can you master all of them? No pencil needed!
How to play Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle
Depending on the level, you will need to tap to place a dot over a line, erase and opponent´s dot, cut or draw lines. Then watch the colors unfold and flow!

Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle key features include:
- 5 different modes: Point, Erase, Cut, Draw and Mix
- Daily Challenges
- 26 achievements to unlock
-250 smart levels
- Use your brain and logics to find the solutions
- Bronze, Silver and Gold medals for each level.
- Infinite fun!

Point Mode
Tap over a line to place a dot. Be smart and choose and strategic and logic position for the dots. Sometimes you need to place one, other two dots.

Eraser Mode
Tap over an opponent´s dot to erase it.

Draw Mode
Draw a line with your fingers to connect lines to your advantage. Use your brain!

Cut Mode
Cut a line to stop the flow of your opponent´s color.

Hope you all guys enjoy Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle! Created by our Dutch friends from Gamious!

description: Load you guns, saddle your horses and get ready for the wildest cowboy adventure out there. Bandits are trying to take over your town, and you - the sheriff - gotta show them some law and order with your trusty gun.Earn that sheriff star by gunning down all the bandits in this action packed side-scroller. Become the expert gunslinger in a matter of minutes with simple controls. Upgrade your arsenal, defeat bandit bosses and become the greatest cowboy out there. The wild wests feature:- Countless bandits and bosses just waiting to be wiped out by you.- Many different types of missions to not only challenge you, but also for you to get that sweet sweet loot.- Upgrades for your character: become the greatest sheriff by upgrading your arsenal.- Amazing retro graphics & music to take you back to the good old days.- Simple controls for any cowboy.- A survival mode for the most badass cowboys out there. Gotta earn it by completing the Campaign mode.
descriptionHTML:
Load you guns, saddle your horses and get ready for the wildest cowboy adventure out there. Bandits are trying to take over your town, and you - the sheriff - gotta show them some law and order with your trusty gun.

Earn that sheriff star by gunning down all the bandits in this action packed side-scroller. Become the expert gunslinger in a matter of minutes with simple controls. Upgrade your arsenal, defeat bandit bosses and become the greatest cowboy out there.

The wild wests feature:
- Countless bandits and bosses just waiting to be wiped out by you.
- Many different types of missions to not only challenge you, but also for you to get that sweet sweet loot.
- Upgrades for your character: become the greatest sheriff by upgrading your arsenal.
- Amazing retro graphics & music to take you back to the good old days.
- Simple controls for any cowboy.
- A survival mode for the most badass cowboys out there. Gotta earn it by completing the Campaign mode.

description: Children's doctor - we all love when people around us smile. We become well and happy when someone on the street gives us a smile. But for a smile to be beautiful, you need to take good care of your teeth. This applies to your pets, because in childhood they were for every kid. Like people, they also sometimes need to treat their teeth. This can be done by a special doctor - dentist. We present to your attention an exciting game for children - a dentist (vet clinic). In this entertaining game, your child is a real dentist, under the guidance of which there is a hospital for animals. The kid is entrusted with a very important and responsible task - the treatment of teeth of his four-footed pups, whose teeth began to ache heavily because of their love for sweets. You have to treat them in a real dental office, use various medical instruments, such as tongs, scalpels, Burmashin and many others, to clean your four-legged friends of teeth from plaque, align them, do operations, remove cavities and fill them. After all, they all just need your help. For her, the animals will be grateful to you and very grateful. Developing games for children, such as a veterinarian, contribute to the overall development of your child. They help to develop fine motor skills, coordination of movements, visual perception, attentiveness and observation, will show the baby how to treat animals, take care of them. Our games for kids, such as a dentist, will teach them not only to treat their pets with love and care, but also to protect their own teeth, do not forget to clean them several times a day, because going to the dentist is not the most pleasant pastime. For the purpose of comprehensive development of the child, we create applications and educational games for children that are aimed to help boys and girls develop basic motor and other skills, and also have fun, fun and useful to spend their free time. All you need is to download games, install and start playing, and in the future your child can choose one of the most needed professions in the world - the dentist Be sure to visit our http://yovogames.com and also we are at:Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZruadkJJTuD4Bgb1F6pa3ATwitter: https://twitter.com/YOVOstudioFacebook: https://facebook.com/yovogames

comments: I used to play this game a long time ago with my brother. I thought since after all these years so many new updates have come, the game must feel different. But it's the same. I love the tune that plays as you play it. It's so nostalgic. My brother isn't anymore with me but playing this game makes me really very happy. It's just like I am back in those old days. Specially for me, as it has so many memories, this game is the absolute best.

I have a problem with my account. My punk zombird was maxed out. Level 3. Then when I opened the game, my punk zombird was gone... I obtained that by waiting patiently and gathering 90 diamonds. I had to watch 3 15-30 sec long video for 2 diamonds each. After watching the 3 vids, I had to wait another 8 hours for it to be available again. It took me a month to obtain that bird and then all of a sudden it dissapears?! I obtained it again but I had to start all over again. I uninstalled this app because of that issue.

The game is really addictive. but repeated zombie birds are generated and diamonds are getting wasted. Please change that. One bird one time please. One bird should be at max 3 level not another set. It's wasting my internet to watch video to get diamonds for collecting birds

I personally loved this game. First off,  u cant jump for high periods of time cause u to run into the bombs. Secondly, whats sup with these prices? Thats ridiculous. You cant level up with prices that high and u have to buy 💎 gems and coins just to get a level up... But tum... Very great game overall.

I love this game cause it kills our time when were bored. Yep, we, my mom also is addicted to this game hahaha, shes always getting my phone and play this game whenever im sleeping. Love it, I recommend this game to everyone💖 you'll be definitely love this game. MobiGame you slaaaay hahaha

descriptionHTML:
ColorMinis Kids is a new kind of coloring and design app for boys and girls on Android. It’s like a 3D coloring book but with realistic figures instead of paper.

Coloring apps are proven to help kids build creativity and color combination skills: and it’s free so start coloring figures now!

Features:
- Color and design anime figures, animals, robots, dogs, castles, and more
- Create your own color combinations or use designer palettes in this new figure coloring book
- Combine color with Realistic 3D clay, gloss, shine, metal, glass, sparkle and more
- Collect Gems by watching Ads to get FREE Models
- Easy controls! Simply tap the materials and color, and pinch to zoom on the HD figure details
- Experiment with beautiful palette combinations
- Simply swipe the figure to view from different angles
- Add custom name tags and fill a collection shelf
- Create animated gifs and pictures of your creations
- Works offline! No wifi needed to relax on the best 3D coloring book.
- Variety of figure styles and themes created by artists from around the world

We regularly add new figures so keep an eye out for updates.

Please help us to make more ColorMinis Figures by rating 5 stars and sharing with your friends!

We’re working so that ColorMinis apps run well on all Android devices. Please report any issue you may have at http://www.figuromo.com.

comments: Just constant ads. Every time you go into a menu you haved to watch an ad. After awhile you need gems for every upgrade. P2P gameplay and ads filled. Gameplay is good, but this game seem to only be maded as a cash grab.
They begged me to rate. But i like it, Stop asking me to rate. I Only like GAMES with painting abilities. Okay?
Cute and delightful, the game is well worth some time. It's addictive gameplay is marred by the tap mechanics in so many other games.

The game is alright. What attracted me to this evolution game in particular was how the phoenixes looked. I killed a few hours on this game, and I decided it's not for me. The ads are also way too frequent. I get that you guys have bills to pay, but I literally get an ad each time I go to Mars. There are also a few grammatical errors here and there, as well as an audio error I noticed. When I go to change the colors of my phoenixes and get interrupted by an ad (everytime I might add), the menu music and the main page music overlap each other. This wouldn't be that big of a deal if it didn't happen every single time I opened up that menu. The game itself can get boring after a while as well, so I'd only recommend this game if you have absolutely nothing better to do. Overall, it's an okay game, but it's absolutely swamped with ads and that really kills it for me.
After 2 min in the game my first thought was: wow so nice and simple. No stress.

Compared to other versions of these games i've played, thus one is one of the best. I like the designs better than other versions. Gameplay is the same but that's fine, I don't mind it. Overall good game.
description: How do phoenixes always manage to rise from their own ashes? We don’t really know, but now YOU can play a role in their immortal legend!Combine different mutant phoenix species and create endless new mythical firebirds to promptly replace the ones that perish!No one will ever notice this smart trick, and the legend of the phoenix will live on forever!(...or at least as long as you keep playing).LEGENDARY FEATURES🔥Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery🔥Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the phoenixes.HOW TO PLAY🔥Drag and drop similar phoenixes to create and merge new mysterious creatures to get to the final and powerful god Phoenix🔥Use phoenix eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money🔥Alternatively, fiercely tap a phoenix to make coins pop from their eggsHIGHLIGHTS🔥Different stages and many phoenix species to discover and merge🔥A mind-blowing story with mythical twists in a fantasy world!🔥The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker games🔥Doodle-like illustrations🔥Open-ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!🔥No phoenixes were harmed in the making of this game, only developers (but they rose from the ashes, too)What is it called when a new phoenix is born? A phoenix dawn.If you like Phoenix Evolution, check our other evolution games. We have Dragon, Cow and even Unicorn Evolution.Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionHTML:
How do phoenixes always manage to rise from their own ashes? We don’t really know, but now YOU can play a role in their immortal legend!

Combine different mutant phoenix species and create endless new mythical firebirds to promptly replace the ones that perish!

No one will ever notice this smart trick, and the legend of the phoenix will live on forever!

(...or at least as long as you keep playing).

LEGENDARY FEATURES

🔥Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
🔥Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the phoenixes.

HOW TO PLAY

🔥Drag and drop similar phoenixes to create and merge new mysterious creatures to get to the final and powerful god Phoenix
🔥Use phoenix eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
🔥Alternatively, fiercely tap a phoenix to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS

🔥Different stages and many phoenix species to discover and merge
🔥A mind-blowing story with mythical twists in a fantasy world!
🔥The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker games
🔥Doodle-like illustrations
🔥Open-ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!
🔥No phoenixes were harmed in the making of this game, only developers (but they rose from the ashes, too)

What is it called when a new phoenix is born? A phoenix dawn.

If you like Phoenix Evolution, check our other evolution games. We have Dragon, Cow and even Unicorn Evolution.

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
developerAddress:
Tapps Tecnologia da Informação Ltda
PO Box 77836
São Paulo, SP - 05503-001

summary: 🔥Create new phoenix species to replace old ones and keep the legend going!🔥
title: Phoenix Evolution - Create & Merge Legendary Birds

description: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay. The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster- Unique gameplay based on free fall- High performance on any device- Convenient management of the game- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight- Fascinating drop down- Music that complements the gameplay- Realistic graphics- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving- Dynamic mapThis is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.Attention:Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
descriptionHTML:
Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay.

The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.
But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.

Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.

Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas
- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster
- Unique gameplay based on free fall
- High performance on any device
- Convenient management of the game
- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight
- Fascinating drop down
- Music that complements the gameplay
- Realistic graphics
- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving
- Dynamic map

This is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.

Attention:
Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
summary: The best simulator of falling real Gangster!
title: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

descriptionHTML:
Experience the speed and intensity of Ice Hockey with the return of the HOCKEY NATIONS franchise! Deliver those big hits, wind up a howitzer of a slap-shot and aim a well-timed wrister while playing in 7 thrilling tournaments in HOCKEY NATIONS 18.

HEATED RIVALRY
Some of the greatest hockey rivalries battle it out in the RIVALS SERIES. Take control of the game and earn those bragging rights with 50 intense challenges!

DREAM OF GOLD
What better way to enter the world of International Hockey than skating out for your team in the Winter Games! Go stick to stick with some of the greatest teams and come away with the gold medal!

3 ON 3 SUPER SERIES
Six club teams from USA, CANADA and RUSSIA will battle it out to be crowned the 3 ON 3 SUPER SERIES Champions. Which team will you guide to the finals?

LIVE GAMES
Join others and compete in regular LIVE GAMES. Earn points for your team and lead them to victory. Prove you're the one of the best as you climb to the top of the influencers leaderboard.

FACE-OFF
Choose from 40 North American Teams, 27 Russian League Teams, 19 International Teams or 2 All-Star teams and go head-to-head in a one-off battle on the ice.

PLAYOFFS
North America or Russian Playoffs, the choice is yours. Choose your team and lead them all the way to the Playoff Final. Will you take home the trophy?

OUTDOOR SERIES
See the game in a whole new light! Under the cold blue skies of ponds and stadiums, six teams will battle it out to be crowned the OUTDOOR SERIES CHAMPIONS!

Important
This game is free-to-play but does include optional in-app purchases to access some of the game modes, which can be purchased with real money.

Over 80 teams at club and international level.
7 exciting tournaments.
Motion captured animations.
Live Games.
Intuitive controls.

comments: A very fun and addictive game. I make bows all day, but it's nice to be able to shoot from my couch at night.  The influence of wind on the arrow is accurate when it comes to drift. A little costly on the upgrades for those that don't buy their way to the top, but all games are that way.

Starts off ok but completely rigged to deplete your coins and to get you to spend money. Bow repairs and inconsistent wind effects among a couple of tactics. Also payed to upgrade my bow and sights and it was gone next time I logged in.
Ok game, but bingo mode is a huge pain.  My shots filled out the opponent's card better than mine.  Stupid way to lose a lot of progress/coins.

Love the game, BUT there's a glitch in chest bow where it locks up for 1 shot, multiple times a day. After you shoot without being able to aim, the bow works normal until the next jam. Looked for a place to submit info for possible fix, BUT game doesn't provide a place for feedback. This is only place to air complaints :(

It's really pathetic that apps like this only allow Facebook login... At least provide Google login too.... Not everyone uses Facebook.... Google should make it mandatory on Google play store apps to provide Google login....

Just started playing a few days ago and never really been good at these style of games  .but this game is very fun and I have already made it to top 70 in my state a lil longer and I'll make my way higher I definitely recommend this game to anyone

comments: Good simple nd great stress buster but at higher levels there is glitch. I got to lvl 570+ and game hangs  and way too slow . Even number on cell exceeds its size.  I scored in advanced part. Hope developers do something about it

This has been my fav gameeee I swear this game you will love, and fun with.Its so easy to play, in the first time I play, i got of a score of, 131 how cool is thattt!!!. I cant even image what the new score would be in the future. I swear DOWNLOAD this game u wont regrett!!!!💕

Its a really great game and I really recommend it! The only problems I had was the controls are a little weird and there a little bit of too much ads but I dont mind it but I'd rather you fix it! Thanks for making me happy! ♡
Really good game to sit and relax but would be good if the balls could go faster than 2x speed. If you have high points then it takes a while for every turn to watch them bounce around.

Downloaded this game just to kill some time. It was fun at first but then once I started to play the challenge mode it would not let me see the whole screen during some challenges. So there is no way to win at the challenges that require you finish in a limited number of moves.

Should be an option to lock targeting  and then fire, many shots were messed up from lifting my fingure at a very slight angle.  Also check points should last longer than once. Making one mistake at lvl 190+ and then having to go back to zero was so frustrating it was the main reason i uninstalled.  Terrible shame honestly, the game could have been really fun and is an original idea

comments: Fastest uninstall ever. 15 seconds of gameplay, then 15 seconds of timed add. Can anyone spot the fake reviews? Really developer?, ya cant wait a tad longer to stop the game and make us stare at a cat puzzle? The worst. I didnt even play it long enough to appteciate the poor controlls. Shoulda known by the corny name that this was a bad game.

Certainly has some potential if developed a bit more.Only played 1st 2 missions which were over in less than 30 secs considering Its only a small game. The AI is not good nor control system that great. Still be nice to see what looks like improvements after a few updateds. Keeping a lazy eye on this:-)

I can see through the map in several places and the Enemy and the map itself is very Glitchy.   There is an Extremely annoying rooster crowing throughout the entire gameplay and yeah I could just mute it but why? I shouldn't have too!!   Then you can hear when an Enemy sneaks up behind you.  I had an alright time playing it but it's Definitely Not a game you'd wanna spend money on, at least not THIS Version anyway!!

Overall....Great Game, but with Controls of Shooting & Moving around....It's Not Exactly Easy to Around. And when it comes to Movement just in General....my Main Problem, But NOT the Only Problem was the Movement in Exactness of where I'm Trying to Move my Guy (My/the Shooter) just Stinks!! - The Game itself....I Love It!!!

Good game and all but the pictures shown for the view isn't what it seems, and this game has some flaws, such as inaccurate hitmarkers. When an enemy shoots from behind me, for some reason, it points to the front, I almost died one time, pressed medkits, I got back up, and I couldn't turn the camera for the rest of the game. Also, add the guns that are actually in the pictures... :/

Way way way to many ads. If you want to exit, you cant because an ad keeps popping up. After every mission or round an ad pops up. When you want to change a setting, an ad pops up. Could ne great, instead its the definition of a sellout
description: One Man. One War. Now You Are The Hot Sniper Killer.*There you play the game was the fantastic 3D FPS game .As the sole surviving special forces of a renegade attack against a ruthless terrorist organization, you are stranded on the battlefield and hell-bent on payback. You must use all of your specialized skills to survive the onslaught of the enemy forces and avenge your fallen soldiers.Faced with this situation of you have no choice but to grasp the nettle.From the M16 to AK47 and sniper guns, as you have access to a variety of light and heavy weapons, as well as powerful grenade too!In the battle you will be sent to different locations to perform the difficult task.Such as IceWorld,Desert,City.Game Features:**Fight in difficult terrainYou will face different environmental challenges spacing case.But nothing can stop you to destroy the enemy's confidence.**Providing advanced weaponryMany full power firearms will be available to give a fatal blow to terrorists for you.AK47,M16,WA2000,AWP,M400.**Experience the perfect touch operationThe awesome 1rd person shooter with stunning console quality visuals, precise controls, advanced physics and destructibles. descriptionHTML:
One Man. One War. Now You Are The Hot Sniper Killer.
*There you play the game was the fantastic 3D FPS game .As the sole surviving special forces of a renegade attack against a ruthless terrorist organization, you are stranded on the battlefield and hell-bent on payback.

You will face different environmental challenges spacing case.But nothing can stop you to destroy the enemy's confidence.

What are you waiting for, let's take a journey and start killing.

comments: The movement and the ability to delete structures for refund could be better. Trading HQ could be so much better, my main concern are the loading screens. Perhaps instead of loading the whole city a separate map viewer could be opened that shows general statistics and layout but not the entire city. That way trading could be done faster between cities and there would be more involvement with the trading community. As it stands its a real chore and is deterring me from trading as much as I'd like. Another idea is if the stock market could be integrated somehow. I think that would be cool, and it would add an element of realism.

Thanks for new upgrade . Even when the game was slow i didn't stop playing. I love this game. It's not only a game for me...i am a President of my club and i have to lead my members... in less than one year i reached level 50 and almost all land expanded...just  you have to understand how to play... be smart... some advice for beginners  start participate in mayor competition...this way you will grow faster

Great game. But what I miss are written below.   1. Direct search & contact any city.   2. Invite a city to be friend from within game.   3. Direct private message with a city from within Game.   4. Make a city tagged as favourite city or liked city.   5. Want a clean viewing mode of own city without those construction hats and other info symbols on top of  building being constructed.  I think they are massively missed. And if you can provide these facilities then it will be the best game of it's class.

Addictive & fun.  In a perfect world: more land expansion is needed. Also, variable prices at the GTHC based on scarcity would be better than fixed ones based on difficulty to produce.  One important thing.  There is premium currency in this game.  It's very easy to accidentally spent it, as there is no confirm button on premium currency purchases.  Fix this and will give 5-stars again

I love this game but I want to tell you. You Simcity global HQ building have a problem . And I think all through the world of simcity player face this problem . Your global HQ trade only  View u wanted things like if I want Cement than I searched one HQ building than HQ bulid view me More  And more same thing like burger and sugar and franch FRi and etc things  And few other things like glass and etc I want that the HQ building show one type. Of things like if cement 1 and 2 glass 3 matel 4 cap etc etc than like I want so sir please 😅 try

Game is basic in its features. The worst part of the game is the trade hq. Rather than letting you buy directly off the hq menue you have to load the other players city. If your phone doesnt load it as fast as someone else they can snipe the goods you need to buy.
description: Welcome, Mayor! Be the hero of your very own city as you design and create a beautiful, bustling metropolis. Every decision is yours as your city gets larger and more intricate. Make smart choices to keep your citizens happy and your skyline growing. Then trade, chat, compete, and join clubs with fellow Mayors. Build your way to extraordinary with the most popular city builder on mobile!BRING YOUR CITY TO LIFEBuild skyscrapers, parks, landmarks, factories, and much more! Place buildings strategically to keep the taxes flowing and your city growing. Solve real-life challenges like traffic, fires, and pollution. Provide services like power plants and police departments, and boost your population with parks and education. Keep traffic moving with grand avenues and streetcars. Take on fun challenges to shape your society.PUT YOUR IMAGINATION ON THE MAPExpand along the beach with a marina, waterpark, and luxury beachfront. Build a Tokyo-style neighborhood and unlock exclusive landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Statue of Liberty. Discover innovative technologies with Future Cities and get athletic with sports stadiums. Hit the town with Las Vegas buildings and go Hollywood with movie studios. There’s always something new and different to make your city unique.BATTLE YOUR WAY TO VICTORYCompete in real-time PvP with Club Wars, where you strategize with Mayor’s Club members and declare war on other cities. Once the battle is on, unleash crazy disasters on opponents, like the Disco Twister and Plant Monster, to do damage and watch the wreckage happen live. Earn disaster cards, SimCash, and other valuables to use in battle or to improve your city. Also, take on other players in the Contest of Mayors. Complete weekly challenges and climb the ranks to advance through Leagues. Become a top Mayor and get rewards that can upgrade and beautify your city.CONNECT AND TEAM UPJoin a Mayor’s Club to trade supplies with other members and chat about strategies and available resources. Collaborate to help someone complete their personal vision and get support to complete yours. Build big, work together, lead other Mayors, and watch your city come to life!-------User Agreement: terms.ea.com/enPrivacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/en Visit https://help.ea.com/en/ for assistance or inquiries. Important Consumer Information.  This app:  Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Contains advertisements for EA and its partners. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details).  Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. comments: This game is ok. The graphics are good. It's my favourite bowling game out there.  However I really don't know why this needs access to my phone contacts and other permissions.  As a result it's been removed. Apps and games need to sort out their permissions for what it needs to do. If it's not required I'm not installing it. Other than that complaint it's actually a nice game for a quick 5 minute time waster.

Needs to have better controls. Sensitivity to the roll, angles to throw while using curves. Maybe a power gauge for the roll, & moving your stylus or finger while giving it a curving flight on it's way down to the pins

I just installed it and played one game. Seems simple and entertaining but it's WAY too soon to give a fair rating. It's annoying when games are begging you for ratings  before you can even have a chance to explore the game.
I have this game on my note, iPad, and computer so it definitely should let you home much I love it.  Not including its wonderful to have when I'm always at the Dr. for hours.

Not working! Ball freezing during play!  Angry customer!  Going to uninstall! Ball freezing cannot play! If not fixed immediately going to uninstall!  Freezing ball makes it aggravating!  Game freezing during play! Angry!  Ball not rolling right sticking! Ball not rolling at all! Pissed off customer! Angry,
AWESOME!!! Crashes every once and a while but other than that it is the best game I have ever played in the world I love it it's so cool amazing

the game is really repetitive, after you complete level 5 u will have no problems with any other level in the game, nevertheless it's fun for what it is.

comments: First off, I'd like to say that this game was a great idea. The idea of taking a clicker game and turning it into an esports theme was amazing. However, once I downloaded it, I was flooded with ads. I understand that free games need a way to make money, but this is an example of what NOT to do. Every time you click to open a certain menu, you have a 50% chance of being shown an ad (or at least it felt that way). If there wasn't a crazy amount of ads, then I'd give this game a better rating, but, until ads are regulated, I am leaving a 1 star review and uninstalling.

I really enjoyed this game. The graphic were nice and the controls were clean. But i couldn't go 2 minutes without a ad. It constantly interrupted my tapping and would open the play store. I understand some ads comes with the territory of mobile games, but this was too much. 😔

It was fun but every time I went to do anything an ad popped up. If I was lucky it would be 10-20 seconds but on several occasions I got 1-3 minute ads and it made it really hard to progress. I also was unable to buy the ad thing so I see no more ads. Until that gets put in I'm not playing this game it is fun though but the ads are excessive

I am not a fake reviewer, I'll be honest all the way. This game is one of the best clickers I've ever played. But, be warned. Unless you plan on paying to remove ads, the ads will destroy your desire to play this game. Ads will pop up by just navigating your screens. Not sure yet if buying the cheapest diamonds package will remove ads. But after one more day I might try it.

Runs slow and freezes alot,  way to many ads,  barley get to play more ads then the game it's self and have to spend money to remove ads very very disappointed and very very annoying,  and it's not my phone for I just got this phone 4 days ago.  Reported the issues but I don't think they will fix the problem at least anytime soon.  Very disappointed for I use to love this game I play it 24/7 but I am getting to the point I want to uninstall this game because of the issues I'm having with this game app.

Game was a decent clicker. I couldn't enjoy it for more than two minutes without another awful ad popping up. I am all for watching an ad for bonuses and power ups but I was having ads randomly in the middle of clicking it between screens. Installed it after ten minutes.   They have an "ad free" option but when you click it it comes up with an error!
description: This is your origin story as the most legendary player in e-sport history! Rise from small local competitions to full-blown game-paloozas around the world, displaying your champion tapping talents like a real gaming pro! HIGHLIGHTS• WIN small competitions to rise through the E-Sports ranks and take on bigger challenges around the world!• PLAY and master genres like MOBA, FPS, Strategy and Sport and defend your ranking as Top Gamer!• BUILD a killer squad, recruiting only the best e-athletes to join you on your quest. Guide them to greatness and feel the rush of ganking on your competitors with a kickass team!• BUFF your setup to champion level, taking your computer and gaming gear to god-tier levels of awesomeness to keep your winning streak fired-up!• BOOST your e-sports prowess with different relics that will drive your foes to ragequit matches in frustration!• BATTLE squads and top pro gamers from all corners of the world and live the dream of every e-athlete ever: getting rich while gaming all day! Bring your best strategy to the fray and prepare the best builds of your mains: only your A-Game will do if you want to reach the top-tier tournaments! Don’t be afraid to crank up your squad’s aggro and gank your rivals with no mercy! There might be some vendetta-fueled “1v1 me bro” messages for you when you’re done, though, but the more battles, the better! After winning big competitions, you’ll have the cash to build that champion setup every e-sports fan dreams of, which will give you the power to take on world-level challenges in every game you wish to try! There will be videos shot and guides written about your gear of legends! There is no cooldown time for e-sports heroes. Power up your ultimate skills and join the League of Gamers now!You might also like some of our other clickers:Money Tree - http://bit.ly/MoneyTreeClicker - Grow your own legendary cash tree!So social - http://bit.ly/SoSocial - Take over the internet!Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: This is a great game... You should play it if you like gymnastics and if you are board,You   should download this game... Is very fun... I liked it... But it still needs a bit more to improve.. I would love it even more if you had more stuff.. And if you didnt had to pay for anything  at all.. Also, please just open the spa and the other stuff you cant get unless you pay!

I downloaded this game for my little sister and the first thing she said was that there are way too many adverts and I agree because whenever she clicked on say the dress up or nail salon or gym and adverts would always come up. The game also lags too much even though she has a brand new IPad. However at this time I would not recommend this game. My sister said that she would play the game again if you reduce and have a limited amount of adverts. As well as the advert problems the game keeps telling me to buy everything and it pops up every time I think when you press the 'X' button it shouldn't show again. Please fix this now. As much as my sister loves this game the adverts really annoy her. Would not recommend this game!!

This is from my daughter, "I like the game but there's some things about it I kind of don't understand. Some of the controls are a little difficult like the one where you have to tap 1 or tap 2 when she's practicing. And its fun. Some of it I like a lot."   This is from me, "the app is annoying until you buy it. It downloaded a ton of icons (ads for other games) to my picture gallery without informing me. My daughter likes the game a lot and it's fun, but a bit intrusive with the free version. The gameplay is good overall."

The main thing I didn't like about it is how little things you can do unless you spend like 10 bucks especially seeing as this is a game that looks like it's targeted towards children $10 is pretty expensive just to be able to play a gymnastics

It's a cool game, it just could be better and maybe there could be some other things in the update. Don't take it seriously! I'm not trying to be mean but maybe there could be some other leotards and the update and some more hair dues because all of those buns and people may not like that's just buns people may want the braids that you always have in your other games. I mean the French braids and they keep going down into a braid, all those things would be nice!

I love the game,but I don't know how to take off the tights or skirts if I don't want them on. The reason I downloaded this app is because I started gymnastics class and I love it and every time after school I get on my phone and play this game and  it makes me want to go to the gym.
description: All your hard work has finally paid off - you’ve made it to the Olympics! Now’s your chance to dress up in dazzling aerobic gymnast leotards and represent your country with pride! Work on your amazing gymnast moves until they're ready for the Olympics. Practice makes perfect! Compete your way to that shiny GOLD medal! Keep your eye on the prize!WOW. Your dream has come true. You’ve finally reached the Olympics, and you get to compete against world-class gymnasts to win gold for your country. Train with a famous coach who has helped other Olympic gold medalists reach the top. Perfect your aerobic gymnastics moves and win this year's major Gymnastics Competition in the Olympics! Get ready to dress up like a star - you’ll need a lot of practice and dedication, and you can even come up with your very own gymnastics routine, choreographed by YOU!Features:> Compete for your country in the Olympics & climb the world aerobic gymnastics ranks! Make that gold medal yours! > Perfect your uneven bar routine and floor exercises!  > Get ready for the biggest gymnastics competition of the year, with an Olympic "coach to the stars!"> Dress up is always fun, but gymnastics dress up is the best! Dress up in a glittery, fantastic gymnastics leotard that will make you stand out!> Get creative and come up with your very own aerobic gymnastics routine!> Look like a real star gymnast! descriptionHTML:
All your hard work has finally paid off - you’ve made it to the Olympics! Now’s your chance to dress up in dazzling aerobic gymnast leotards and represent your country with pride! Work on your amazing gymnast moves until they're ready for the Olympics. Practice makes perfect! Compete your way to that shiny GOLD medal! Keep your eye on the prize!

WOW. Your dream has come true. You’ve finally reached the Olympics, and you get to compete against world-class gymnasts to win gold for your country. Train with a famous coach who has helped other Olympic gold medalists reach the top. Perfect your aerobic gymnastics moves and win this year's major Gymnastics Competition in the Olympics! Get ready to dress up like a star - you’ll need a lot of practice and dedication, and you can even come up with your very own gymnastics routine, choreographed by YOU!

Features:
> Compete for your country in the Olympics & climb the world aerobic gymnastics ranks! Make that gold medal yours!
> Perfect your uneven bar routine and floor exercises!
> Get ready for the biggest gymnastics competition of the year, with an Olympic "coach to the stars!"
> Dress up is always fun, but gymnastics dress up is the best! Dress up in a glittery, fantastic gymnastics leotard that will make you stand out!
> Get creative and come up with your very own aerobic gymnastics routine!
> Look like a real star gymnast! Get a makeover, a manicure, and a new hairstyle!
> Hit the gym & get in shape before the competition!
> OMG! Golden Gymnast magazine just asked you to be on their cover! Photo shoot, here you come!
> Impress the judges with stellar aerobic gymnastics moves like side aerials, triple full layouts, triple pikes, backward rolls & more!
> Ugh - gymnastics injury. No worries - the doctor will treat you in time for the big competition!
> Relax at the spa before the big day. You deserve it after all that hard work!

comments: This game has highly disappointed me.  It was super fun and interactive at first then it gives you the option to pay to continue to play or to complete free offers to unlock the game for free.  I have found that you can complete as many offers ad you want but the game won't ever unlock and emailing the support web site doesn't do any good either. They don't ever respond and it is a complete waste of time.  Don't waste your time on this game.  Go out and find yourself something worth playing because this surely isn't it.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD CAN NOT BE COMPLETED DUE TO A BUG!!!!!!  After buying you eventually get to the accordion level just before leaving the prison roof only for one (or 2 on some phones) ball being outside the play area which makes the mini game impossible.  Many reviews all over the internet highlighting this bug but the developer has not bothered to fix it.  AVOID THIS DEVELOPER !!!!!!!!!!

It was super fun and interactive at first then it gives you the option to pay to continue to play or to complete free offers to unlock the game for free.I tried  to complete many offers such as surveys, installing a playing another game for certain level, but this game never unlocked no matter what! They don't ever respond and it is a complete waste of time. This game has highly disappointed me.

After you play it for a bit.You have to buy it which is dumb if you ask me. I like games a lot but really why, spend my time.Just to say don't get left behind .Would rate zero stars if could.plz fix NOW 😊😊😊☺

On a serious note, you need to give me this game for free. I downloaded and played two different games to get the game for free and 5 hours later I still don't have the full game. I've had to install 5 different games just to get this one for free and I STILL don't have the full game. I'm not impressed!!!

Game is ok.  Tasks are sometimes unclear.  After a few tasks you have to pay to keep going or complete some offer.  Tried several times, but never lets me continue.  Should say it's a trial version in description.  No clue how it got a 4+ star rating.
description: No one has ever escaped and lived to tell. At least that's the official story...Escape Alcatraz, the follow-up to Escape the Titanic delivers the next blockbuster adventure puzzler that puts you at the heart of an amazing true-life escape that remains unsolved to this day. Craft and assemble tools you’ll need, as you plan your high-stakes prison break. Can you devise an escape plan, fool the guards and find the right time to pull the trigger to freedom?Never a dull moment as you pinch, twist, tap & swipe your way through ingenious room-puzzle challenges.With nothing to lose, do you have the smarts and tenacity to solve every puzzle and make it off The Rock!  ....Good luck!  • 50+ clever puzzles - unlike anything you’ve ever seen.• Integrated Hint System, if you need a little help.• Find hidden tools to aid in your escape.•  Hints and Answers available as IAPEscape Alcatraz is a FREE-TO-TRY app. You can play the first chapter for free, if you want to unlock the epic FULL version, there is a one-time fee to purchase, plus a FREE option unlock the FULL version, too.
descriptionHTML:
No one has ever escaped and lived to tell. At least that's the official story...

Escape Alcatraz, the follow-up to Escape the Titanic delivers the next blockbuster adventure puzzler that puts you at the heart of an amazing true-life escape that remains unsolved to this day. Craft and assemble tools you’ll need, as you plan your high-stakes prison break. Can you devise an escape plan, fool the guards and find the right time to pull the trigger to freedom?

Never a dull moment as you pinch, twist, tap & swipe your way through ingenious room-puzzle challenges.

With nothing to lose, do you have the smarts and tenacity to solve every puzzle and make it off The Rock! ....Good luck!

• 50+ clever puzzles - unlike anything you’ve ever seen.
• Integrated Hint System, if you need a little help.
• Find hidden tools to aid in your escape.
• Hints and Answers available as IAP

Escape Alcatraz is a FREE-TO-TRY app. You can play the first chapter for free, if you want to unlock the epic FULL version, there is a one-time fee to purchase, plus a FREE option unlock the FULL version, too.

601 Union St. #4200
Seattle, WA 98101

comments: Definitely a game for car buffs. It requires using your "mind" to win. I'm not to sure about my rating yet. But, will definitely change if needed. It's unlike any game I've played & I like it! Someone wrote a review that this is a lazy person's game... LMAØ, I wish they would show me the games they play while they are running, swimming & mountain climbing "while" they play, smh HAHA!

First download crashed and wouldn't load. Had to reinstall the game and Hutch games couldn't recover my profile so had to start again from scratch. I've played through several updates and fixes but the same issues remain, car X beats car y when it shouldnt. Hutch in game support agree there is a problem and send to devs but nothing gets fixed. The whole game seems flawed. To be competitive to you will have to spend about £50 a month. I enjoy the premise but the game is poorly executed.

I love the concept and it's been great to see how far this game has come, but I've been playing since beta and nearly every update wipes my save data and forces me to restart. Luckily, I don't get too far into the game each time, but it is frustrating and enough of a buzz kill for me to drop two stars. If there was a cloud system implemented for saves this game would be a five star in my book

This is an amazing game and I think Hutch Games did an amazing job putting the collecting and racing features of the game together. Buying packs is very expensive, but in some ways it is a nice challenge to work hard to get the thrill of opening a pack. I love being able to collect and race so many real cars. For a suggestion however, I think it would add a lot to the game if Hutch Games made it so there was a section where you could put the cars that your keeping only for collecting. It would just be easier to get them away from the cards that your using to race.

Incredible game. Awesome concept. Two complaints to developers. High speed loop-when you win, it starts detracting points. And also certain mph based drag races,I run out of road but the challenging car gets like 60 miles of road. Besides these, fantastic game.

I think this game is amazing! And is perfectly good in every way!! I can't stop playing and look forward to getting new cars. There is just one tiny error that bugs me a bit but I can cope with it. The error is the color of the Ford fiesta xr2. When you race someone else and they have this vehicle on the card the car is black with a tiny red trim on the side but when it's on the track it is completely red. I do hope you can will fix this small mistake but apart from that this game is great!!! Thanks for reading :)
description: Think you know your cars? comments: Such a shame. The game is great, really enjoyed the concept however it is a prime example of how monetisation strategy can ruin a game. Gems too difficult to earn without buying them, and purposely easy to accidentally spend them. Too many ads too. I'd rather have paid for the game. Deleted it after a  day or so.

Not What It Used To Be  The second to last update I did for this app switched the aim of the ball to slightly off from where you point it. So now have to compensate (guess a bit) when you're aiming which makes play more challenging.  Likewise, levels beyond about 440 are becoming impossible to beat w/o saving like a weeks with of bonuses to use on each level. Beating one level a week is hardly fun anymore! I may be uninstalling this app soon.
Everything has been great till about 1 month ago when the graph is slowed downed. After you start off there's delays in the line of balls and very unsettling it's not continuous anymore.

Game has so much potential and is a blast. I'm giving it a bad rating because gems are insanely expensive and they have so many buttons to hit to "use 200 gems to remove 3 lines" as one example or another to lose 200 by placing the button right above the back button on a phone. Super lame move on devs to intentionally take insanely expensive gems from us by mistake. No confirmation or anything, just boom, gone. Lacks ethics to say the least rinow
Games fine. I refuse to rate a game well when it's annoying ads start pushing political agenda against gun owners. Will go elsewhere
Great game.   But one of the adverts is a virus.   The IG Academy advert wrecked my game and now my phone's being a pain in the ass

description: Cute baby panda Lu goes to an amusement park with adorable animal friends! Ride a carousel and fun carnival rides, visit a spooky haunted house, eat sweet treats and take photos with the cutest owl, penguin, bear and turtle!Enjoy the magic of the colorful unicorn themed Carousel and take an exciting ride on the Ferris Wheel. It is so high you can reach the stars! Ride the park’s famous Roller Coaster and see what the highest speed you can handle is! The faster, the more fun, right?Visit a mysterious witch’s house full of spiders, ghosts and pumpkin lanterns! Find your animal friends: they are hiding in unexpected places to scare you. Play Space Defender at the Arcade: fight with aliens and protect your spaceship! Spin the Lucky Wheel to win toys, tasty treats and other surprises!Take a break: enjoy yummy candy apples with your friends! Choose glitter frostings and decorate them with colorful sprinkles. Time to take some cool pictures at the Photo Booth! descriptionHTML:
Cute baby panda Lu goes to an amusement park with adorable animal friends! Ride a carousel and fun carnival rides, visit a spooky haunted house, eat sweet treats and take photos with the cutest owl, penguin, bear and turtle!

Enjoy the magic of the colorful unicorn themed Carousel and take an exciting ride on the Ferris Wheel. It is so high you can reach the stars! Ride the park’s famous Roller Coaster and see what the highest speed you can handle is! The faster, the more fun, right?

Visit a mysterious witch’s house full of spiders, ghosts and pumpkin lanterns! Find your animal friends: they are hiding in unexpected places to scare you. Play Space Defender at the Arcade: fight with aliens and protect your spaceship! Spin the Lucky Wheel to win toys, tasty treats and other surprises!

Take a break: enjoy yummy candy apples with your friends! Choose glitter frostings and decorate them with colorful sprinkles. Time to take some cool pictures at the Photo Booth! Dress up panda Lu in adorable outfits, add fun accessories and choose a background.

Enjoy the most fun amusement park adventures with baby panda Lu:
· Have fun at the Carousel!
· Ride the super fast Roller Coaster!
· Enjoy the view from the Ferris Wheel!
· Visit the spooky Haunted House!
· Spin the Lucky Wheel to win exciting prizes!
· Decorate yummy candy apples!
· Visit the Photo Booth: dress up panda Lu in cute outfits and choose a background!
· Watch funny videos for kids to collect bonus coins!
· Explore the fun park every day, get rewards and unlock exciting items!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

IMPORTANT message to parents
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

comments: Well, I loved the looks of it. Seemed really fun so I downloaded it. Then I spent 30 min downloading the patches, to find out at the very end I didnt have enough space on my phone. Uninstalled as much as I could, and still didn't have enough space... Could have said in details of the game how much space it REALLY takes up... Would have been really nice to know.  -a not so happy consumer

So, far really love to play. I only just started though. The controls are hard but that's probably because I'm playing on a tablet and I got small hands. Unfortunately, I don't think I'll be able to continue playing this. For some reason it makes my tablet terrifyingly hot to the point I'm concerned. I'll hold on to the app for now in case it gets better in the future.

An amazing mmo that really does a great job of handling farming, the game play although has an auto feature still utilizes the controls. The depth of all the items and armor and weapons is awesome. I've been really happy playing this game. The clans are great. The 30 vs 30 opensiege is a nice feature. This game is super fun even for the people that want to play for free. Netmarble does a great job with daily rewards, login bonuses, and events that all allow for players to get great items for free!! Best game I've played in a long while. Only thing is constant crashes and bad story line. The game keeps me turning it back on and I haven't went one day without logging in.

Addicting game with auto-questing and battling. You can choose to do it manually, which I do for boss fights. I don't have to buy anything from the shop, in fact, you get free gear every day! The graphics are amazing for a mobile game with it being an MMO. I have a Note 8, so it does run really well. I play with my monitor using SideSync for full screen awesomeness. There is a lot to do for all types of players, being in a guild doing dungeons reminds me of the old-school MMORPGs of sieging and doing weekly raids.

The game had me hooked as I spent a week trying to find a character and job class I liked. Keep in mind that you will be doing a lot of grinding, but leveling is not surprisingly unreasonable.  There are some aspects that will make you believe you have to pay to win, but it is not necessary. Although it would be cool to help the devs or too. All in all love the game and can't seem to put it down ( I let it auto-grind while I live my life. Haha).

Everything about this game is really good, but since this update today I can't even open the game it keeps closes and sending me to my home screen on my phone... Doesn't give me a error report or any messages just closes the app. Id really like to continue playing please fix . Galaxy S8+

descriptionHTML:
"...a must-have for MMORPG fans. 8/10" - PocketGamer


About

Venture into a breathtaking new fantasy world with stunning visuals powered by the Unreal Engine 4. Experience large scale, open-world combat where up to 200 players can battle in real time on a single screen! Party up with strangers or form clans with friends to conquer epic raid dungeons, take down fearsome boss monsters, or compete with thousands of other players around the world in competitive battles.

Lineage 2: Revolution is a groundbreaking, new online role-playing game that brings top-quality visuals, a massive open-world, and large-scale PvP battles to life on mobile devices. Players can finally experience what it truly means to have a gorgeous, fully-featured, persistent world MMORPG that can be enjoyed alongside millions around the world, all within the palm of your hands!

The time has now come for new heroes to rise, to begin a new chapter in history, and to save the world from eternal darkness.

Join the revolution!


※KEY FEATURES※

▶REAL-TIME MASSIVE BATTLES
Battle other players in thrilling real-time, open-field PvP battles or wage war on an epic scale through competitive 50-vs-50 Fortress Siege matches!

▶STUNNING VISUALS
Powered by the Unreal Engine 4, Lineage 2: Revolution pushes the boundaries of what’s graphically possible. Witness never-before-seen graphics on your mobile device!

▶SEAMLESS OPEN-WORLD
Explore a vast, stunning, and lush open-world that allows thousands of players to simultaneously explore, discover, and conquer.

▶CLANS & GUILDS
Group up with friends and guildmates, or party up with thousands of other players around the world to take down epic bosses, engage in mass-scale PvP combat, and uncover loot in epic raid dungeons.

recentChanges: 1) The level cap has been increased from 120 to 180.
2) A new area, "Giran Territory" has been added. With it comes new quests, a new Field Boss, and more!
3) Open Siege and Fortress Siege regular season begins.
4) 8 new Fortresses have been added for Fortress Siege.
5) A new mount, the Steam Beetle, has been added. Players can acquire this mount by participating in Open Siege.
6) New Elite Dungeons have been added to challenge players.

comments: If there is anything that would make me quit playing this game, it would be ads. I don't mind ads but ads are just way too much and take away the fun of this game.  Apart from that game also freezes sometimes and there are some glitches too.

I liked the older versions of this game, but this one is horrible. There's ads constantly, any time you resume playing from the screen going to sleep, or if you wreck there's one right across the middle of the screen!  Every time it connects to the server, it takes whole minutes to load. Sometimes I set my phone down, the screen goes to sleep and then i have to watch another ad! If I was waiting for it to load an ad in the first place, I have to watch that one first, then a second one as punishment for the screen time out. 😒😒 Not cool Loading times plus ad videos constantly, equates to more than time spent playing. It's miserable. LG V20 on Tmo and 100Mbps wifi
Great game. Only after the latest update, it stopped registering my race wins and best times and although I did win many, they're not marked with a star and I can't move any level up.

Really fun game. Lots of levels. Really like tournament and duels. I feel like there's some cheating in the tournaments. When I watch the videos some people seem to not be touching the ground. That's pretty lame. Other than that great game
That's crazy you allow hackers to have the highest score and also show the video. Say that person isn't cheating and I'll show you a video where he shows how he does it. A-hole.
Fun...until you had to beat an opponent to proceed to next level. These opponents are too much of a jump up on the difficulty of that level. So can't pass...no longer fun...uninstalling

I thought this game was fun UNTIL it said you had to WAIT FOR MORE QUESTS!  This happened after each completion of an enclosure...very frustrating!  Have been waiting two days, so far, for a new enclosure quest:(  Not very professional!

I like this game because it's fun and addictive. I have had 1or2 moments were it froze and I couldn't play it for a week or two. Also there when the tiger got out of his habitat and it's not ment to get out and it destroyed everything I've done and I had to start from the very first level

descriptionHTML:
Build a zoo, play with cute animals and solve match 3 puzzles - all in one game!

Switch between the challenge of the match 3 levels, and the joy of welcoming a new furry friend to the zoo you built with your hands.

The Family Zoo was once the gem of the neighborhood. Now, the city wants to build a huge supermarket instead. It’s time to burst their bubble!

Solve casual match three puzzles to earn tickets and materials. Then, restore the zoo and decorate the animal habitats and surrounding gardens.

Meet new and old friends, and work together to make sure all the animals have a place to live. They are counting on you - can you save their home?

Game Features
✿ Swap between match 3 levels and building your own zoo!
✿ Hundreds of delicious and challenging match 3 puzzles
✿ Choose from thousands of decorations to make your family zoo unique!
✿ Interact with exotic and cute animals
✿ Develop your business with stands, cafes and other attractions to draw visitors and earn coins!
✿ Complete quests for more rewards and advancing the story
✿ Make friends with characters that will help you save the zoo
✿ Enhance your fun with exploding watermelons and other wacky boosters

comments: So I'm changing my review. After the past few updates I have won more special dice!! They lowered the level from extra impossible to meduim on the dice Masters, so it's a tad bit more fair! The only problem need, is the daily challenge is too much for the app to stay open. It force closes due to over processing or something, and I'd rather not have the daily challenge and the game work lol. But definitely gaining more stars each update from me!!

This game is fun but I don't know if it's a bug or they're doing it on purpose but it seems like you can never win the extra challenges they do to win prizes.  I have watched the game say I lost when there's no way the computer opponent could have gotten enough points to be me. I messaged the game creators about it and never got a response. I'm about to uninstall this game.

I have downloaded and uninstalled it and did the same process over again and I still can't play it. It keeps telling me that it needs an active internet connection to play. Well, I can play my other internet based mobile games and I am writing this review from the same mobile device and everything else that requires internet is working so it is a fault in the game itself. It's a shame because I really wanted to play this but now I am going to uninstall it and not bother with it again because it is frustrating me. If the issue gets fixed somehow then I may think about playing it.

GAME CODE reveals ROLLS ARE NOT RANDOM - they're pulled from a table of predertirmined outcomes, designed to MILK YOU FOR MONEY at a set rate, based on PvP, reg. Game, Event, Boss, etc.  Just like slot machines & video poker (which i programme).  You must 'assemble' high scoring games, like a puzzle, with majority of yahtzees sitting after 4 or 8 rolls (1 or 7 bonus 'dice'(money) spent)... Like a choose your own adventure book that can cost Hundreds of Dollars.

I'll give this game more than one star once the showdowns are less about the computer clearing and more about real challenge.  Once you start a showdown the computer conveniently never gets a bad roll.  Which wouldn't be a big deal except you have to wait to challenge them again unless you want to pay for extra dice which is used to unlock everything else.  Kinda cheap.

Why am I losing over half of my games? This has happened twice! I have to forfeit several games and when I do all the people start a new game with me. Sorta suspicious. The game has been lagging and freezing also. Otherwise it's a great time passer!

comments: So I LOVE THIS GAME. I beat it once and had to uninstall it due to space issues. I couldn't find it until now. It is a very nice game controls graphics everything on point. Overall my review is 4 stars. ONLY because it needs more levels as the difficulties aren't extra levels but just harder  versions of those so maybe more levels and islands if possible and more stick warriors and it can even go into the skies or galaxy or so although I don't know if that sounds like too much but more levels. If it had multiplayer (online as optional) also, so u can play offline but if u want multiplayer u get online. I'm not trying to be picky. Such an awesome game finished too quickly.

Great game. Seriously like my fav app. One minor glitch they needed to patch though is that, at least for me, it's not giving me the achievements for the zombie mode. Like I've survived 24 nights but I don't even have the achievements for"survive 5 nights". I should have all the achievements unlocked but I don't because some of the zombie achievements I'm not receiving for some reason. But besides that minor annoyance, it really is a sweet app.i used to play the classic version back in the day and I was so happy when I found out they made it into an app. Right now my goal is to win the tournament mode on insaine 100 times, I'm currently at 59. GG!
Its a good game up until you play on anything other than normal. The upper difficulties make it impossible to progress past spartans unless you buy gems and get power ups, smh

I wish there were more commands. Like maybe you could command the miners to garrison while the rest of the troops guard. Also, redesign the swordwrath helmet. It looks like someone spray painted their hair gold and then glued jewels on it. I also wish there could be more types of zombies. The idea of endless is cool but please add the zombies to the campaign.

It's nice how you've mashed together Stick War and Stick Empires together to make this masterpiece. I know its only meant to be a remake of the original Stick War, so I shouldn't expect too much updates, but it would be cool if there was multiplayer on Legacy. Keep the games coming!!!

This is one of the most awesome game of all time and thanks to the creators you can play it on mobile too. But it still lack some awesome components, 1. Add Chaos Empire, 2. Add multiplayer!!! Overall still AWESOME!!!
description: One of the most popular and highest rated web games of all time now comes to mobile!Play the game Stick War, one of the biggest, most fun, challenging and addicting stick figure games. Control your army in formations or play each unit, you have total control of every stickman. Build units, mine gold, learn the way of the Sword, Spear, Archer, Mage, and even Giant. Destroy the enemy statue, and capture all Territories!New Features:●	Endless Deads zombie survival mode! How many nights can you last?●	Comic book style cinematic intro for Endless Deads! ●	Tournament mode! Battle your way through dozens of Ai challengers to win the "Crown of Inamorta!"Campaign Mode:In a world called Inamorta, you're surrounded by discriminate nations devoted to their individual nations technology and struggle for dominance. Each nation has developed its own unique way to defend and attack. Proud of their unique craft they have become obsessed to the point of worship, turning weapons to religion. Each believe that their way of life is the only way, and are dedicated to teaching their polices to all other nations through what there leaders claim as divine intervention, or as you will know it... war. The others are known as: "Archidons" the way of the archer, "Swordwrath" the way of the sword, "Magikill" the way of the mage, and "Speartons" the way of the Spear. You are the leader of the nation called "Order", your way is of peace and knowledge, your people do not worship their weapons as gods. This makes you a mark for infiltration by the surrounding nations. Your only chance to defend is to attack first, and obtain the technology's from each nation along the way.
descriptionHTML:
One of the most popular and highest rated web games of all time now comes to mobile!

Play the game Stick War, one of the biggest, most fun, challenging and addicting stick figure games. Control your army in formations or play each unit, you have total control of every stickman. Build units, mine gold, learn the way of the Sword, Spear, Archer, Mage, and even Giant. Destroy the enemy statue, and capture all Territories!

New Features:
● Endless Deads zombie survival mode! How many nights can you last?
● Comic book style cinematic intro for Endless Deads!
● Tournament mode! Battle your way through dozens of Ai challengers to win the "Crown of Inamorta!"

Campaign Mode:
In a world called Inamorta, you're surrounded by discriminate nations devoted to their individual nations technology and struggle for dominance. Each nation has developed its own unique way to defend and attack. Proud of their unique craft they have become obsessed to the point of worship, turning weapons to religion. Each believe that their way of life is the only way, and are dedicated to teaching their polices to all other nations through what there leaders claim as divine intervention, or as you will know it... war.

The others are known as: "Archidons" the way of the archer, "Swordwrath" the way of the sword, "Magikill" the way of the mage, and "Speartons" the way of the Spear.

You are the leader of the nation called "Order", your way is of peace and knowledge, your people do not worship their weapons as gods. This makes you a mark for infiltration by the surrounding nations. Your only chance to defend is to attack first, and obtain the technology's from each nation along the way.

comments: I'm incredibly thankful for this game. Finally there is a game that is enjoyable, relaxing, calming and the best way to take my mind off of the worries all around us. Words cannot fully express what this game means to me! Thanks to the developers I look forward to playing everytime. The music is wonderful! I highly recommend this game. Thanks again ♡

As much as I understand that you want to make a few bucks, the amount of advertising and the way the advertising is being presented has gradually become quite intrusive and annoying. I would much rather pay a one time license fee that this crabby implementation of user annoyance  / advertising. The other problem is that on the high end phones (read pixel 2) the board are so big that the tiles as a consequence are made very small so they fit with a final result that makes it very difficult to see/read

I absolutely love this game! It's not all that noisy kids stuff! I start my day off with my tea and M.J.! It's a great way to get the Brain up and running! 💜 I've deleted the game 3 times. Alas, I just can't give up! Here I am again! And thoe I've tried alot of other similar games, it's this one that is the most satisfying! 💜

Does not even lay tiles down in a solvable fashion. Had no repeats thus shud be solvable in any order, wasn't, what's the point? Sort ur algorithm out.  Also, non stop ads and u want us to pay monthly for ad free? £8 one off fee wud b highest I went for an app I'd want to keep
Was a fun game until  after the recent update. Used to be able to close the ads, but now they just keep playing instead of closing. Will find a better version somewhere else.
The latest update places advertising banners in the play area. You can't move them or play around them and I don't want to install the advertisement app.  They suck out loud.
