comments: Fun take on turn base card games. Loved all the characters and combos UPDATE: I have been playing frequently for a year now and honestly this game is a second tier time killer(not much time though, as game seems to crash regularly) very pay to play and EXTREMELY repetitive.

It's a lot of fun! I've been playing for a few months now. There are some bugs with ads and it stopped giving daily bonuses for logging in every day.. not sure why that is. I would suggest fixing that or else I'll never build up enough gold gems to get a gold card.

I really enjoyed the game when I could play it. It took a very long time for the game to load, and a lot of the time it would freeze at 32% or freeze in the middle of me playing the game. Please fix the glitches and it will be my favorite game.

Login bonuses gone? Great job guys. PVP too punishing now. Win a game it's +50pts, lose a game -50pts when it used to be -35. Now your effort is meaningless. Take it from me, don't spend your money here, it won't pay off.

It was fun for a while, but you never get mythical cards. There is no player trading. This game could have been one of the best but they didn't put alot into it. Unless you got alot of money your not going to get the best cards.

Fun game, but only loads half the time. It can load in a few seconds, few minutes, or not at all. No way to tell how it'll feel today. I've paid money for daily rewards. I can't login to the game again. Thanks daily rewards that I paid for are wasted. Seriously?
description: FAMILY GUY! BOB’S BURGERS! FUTURAMA! AMERICAN DAD! KING OF THE HILL!  It’s Animation Throwdown: The Quest for Cards! For the first time ever, five of your favorite animated shows are together in one amazing collectible card game. Featuring hundreds of your favorite characters and moments from your favorite episodes. Collect character cards, optimize your deck, and create new combos as you fight in an epic card battle bacchanal. The game may be digital, but the stakes are real!* The fate of the world rests in your hands!** (*Stakes are not real) (**The fate of the world does not rest in your hands.)STEWIE, BENDER, TINA BELCHER, HANK HILL & ROGER THE ALIEN are all waiting for you! Download ANIMATION THROWDOWN now and start kicking and/or touching butts!GAME FEATURES:*Collectible card battle game.*Five of your favorite cartoons together for the first time ever!*Hundreds of cards and combos featuring characters from each show.*25 Chapters featuring moments and locations from your favorite episodes.*Endless hours of play, provided you never stop playing.*Challenge other players from all over the globe in the multiplayer Arena.*Collect, upgrade, and fuse your cards to victory.*Laugh till you drop your phone or tablet into the toilet!PLEASE NOTE: Animation Throwdown: The Quest for Cards is free to play, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. comments: This game is perfect for anyone who loves magic, fantasy, collecting, and a whole new level of adorable! Dragonvale takes everything to the next level! I highly recommend it, as it is a amazing game, my most played, and I hope everyone else enjoys it just as much as I do. Five stars! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 Edit 2: I was re-organizing my islands by Element the other day, and I had just finished the Plant Island. I put down a Oversized Oak Tree, and immediately, a image flashed through my mind: a young girl, sitting on a branch of the oak tree, a book in one hand, a baby Plant dragon sitting next to her. Stretched out in front of them was my Plant Island, the dragons freely soaring, the other islands in the distance. And that sparked a inspiration in my head. I just wanted to ask; can I write a Dragonvale book, which takes place at my park? Please let me know !  :)

Cmon Backflip! Okay look I love Dragonvale, I've been playing it forever. First off I lost my amazing park a while back and that really sucked. But now I am restarting and I go to buy the beginners pack for 9.99 and it says there was an error and i wont be charged...come to find out it did charge me and i didnt receive anything! Please help

I have been playing for a while. After events you get a day to turn in your event specific currency for the prizes, even though the event has ended. Well for Gardenia's event, it turned in all my roses before I could exchange them. I had over 25,000 and was so pumped to get the new dragons. Now I don't have any roses and 25,000,000 extra coins i don't need. Please help. This is a very frustrating bug.

I really love collecting all of the dragons and the fact that you can theme/decorate your park too. But the amount of types of decorations are unbalanced, the majority that you can currently buy in the market are just plant and earth type while there are very few decorations of the other types (such as air, cold, etc).

When I first had it it was super fun. Then I saw a game I wanted so I deleted it I did that before and got it back I could log into facebook and go to my old island. But this time I could not. I was so far and looking forward to seeimg my dragons but it did not let me go to my old island. It left me im tears that I had to do what I did all over again. So I deleted this stupid game and gave this. If I could rate 0 I would

its ok, and you might think you cant li e without it, but trust me.... after a while year of playing, which is what i have waited to wrote this review, the game play becomes very repetitive. sure try it out, its fun, but not something for the rest of your life. dont put money into it, you will regret ir later.
description: Discover the most popular Dragon collecting game in the world! Can you hatch them all? Your Dragon-filled destiny awaits in DragonVale!★ Breed and raise 250+ different dragons. Match, hatch, and show off your stash! ★ Build and decorate beautiful floating islands in the sky to create your ultimate park. Your park, your dragons, your DragonVale!  ★ Harvest dragon treats, then feed your dragons so they can grow and achieve their Dragonly greatness★ Enter your dragons in fun races, quests, and contests to win epic prizes. Let the Dragoning begin!★ Discover new dragons, decorations and activities during special seasonal events.  ★ Browse the Dragonarium to keep track of all the dragons you’ve collected and which you’ve yet to breed.   ★ Impress your family and friends by displaying your park and sharing your favorite dragons for cooperative breeding! ★ Visit friends’ parks and give each other gifts. ★ Spectacular visuals and sparkling animations accompanied by an original soundtrack written by our award-winning composer. ★Play DragonVale today! It’s free.PLEASE NOTE! Some game items can be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, you may control in-app purchases made within this app using the password settings explained in the Google Play help center. DragonVale is brought to you by Backflip Studios, makers of absurdly fun mobile games and a proud partner of Hasbro, Inc.

comments: Installed this a week ago and totally hooked. Don't understand reviews saying it's a money pit, I'm doing fine with patience and voluntarily watching an ad when I choose, appreciate not having ads forced on me all the time. Seems a good balance to me of fun for player and income generation for devs. Love the bits of humour throughout.

It's an amazing game, I have only had for a day and am already hooked. My mom actually played it and loved it as well. Definitely recommend it to people from any ages. I could play it all day. But it is snowing hard core right now soooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo...................................................... Bye 😝
My daughter have this game I was boring and I play.... Omg my daughter scream at me give me my phone lol and I grab my phone and I downloaded... Hahaha is amazing I love this game 💋💗😜🤣👍🤜
Its a fun little game that is fun and challenging. I do appreciate the fact that if you lose a level you still get to keep what you collected. And you have a chance to win some other things
Money trap.  It gets so hard that the only way to win is to spend money.  It's games like this that have ruined mobile gaming due to greed.
I love this game but I am so mad right now some how all of my progress was deleted. I don't know why this happened.

comments: Great app. Would really like a tab of all the puzzles you've completed in one place. Please add!! That would be great! Unfortunately last 2 times I've started a puzzle it doesn't save my progress. I've gotten to 80% and 40% complete on the same puzzles & it didn't save my progress. Had to restart the same puzzle twice now. I haven't started a new puzzle since. Don't want to waste my time redoing puzzles I've already done just because my progress wasn't saved. Very frustrating. Before this it was a great app!

You guys did a wonderful job on this game. The only thing I don't like is how expensive it is to unlock everything. But I'll settle for the 5 dollar make my own jigsaw puzzles out of my own pictures. And I'll add in closing the pictures you already have available is excellent! Keep up the good work!

Since the latest update game keeps freezing up so have to uninstall and reinstall constantly. Or an ad pops up freezes game and same thing. Also points I've earned keep disappearing. It will say 3 when I open the game. Play 1 game and go back to select another and it says I have 0 points when it should say 2. This happens way too often. I love this game but very frustrated with it right now. I love the pictures, ther game layout, ease of play and all the options. Please fix these problems. Thanks!!
The game is great, I love the tools it gives you like being able to see a ghost image of the finished puzzle.  BUT the advertisements make it lag so bad I have to turn my phone to airplain mode.

It's fun and addictive. However, lately I've been getting flashing after working on a puzzle for a few minutes and have to shut it down it's so distracting. Also, lately the ads go in a loop; after watching the video, it goes to the game to add, then back and forth, endlessly sometimes.

comments: Can we have free piggy banks every now and again
Everyone should play it
Some levels to hard
Just awesome

This is a wonderful, well made, fun game!  Also highly addictive.    Really enjoy it a lot.      With that said, the biggest downside, IMO, is that rewards are few, & far between, and there is no way to get gold bars without paying for them.  These become rather needed the further you get and for certain individual, and more difficult, "puzzles".  It can become too expensive to play (if one really want to get somewhere in this game).

I love the game, but i liked it more when the piggy bank had 100 gold bars. It was a fair price-amount report. Also, i would love to see more often the trick or treat and the win 14 challanges event. And yes, the new owl look is awful. Please change it back :-))
description: Bubble Witch 3 Saga – A magical bubble shooting puzzle game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga.The newest game in the popular Bubble Witch series. Stella the Witch is back and she needs your help to defeat Wilbur in this exciting puzzle blasting adventure! Wilbur may look cute, but he's full of magical mischief! Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this bubble shooting puzzle game.Help Stella, Nero and Violet restore piece to the realm by matching bubbles with the unique aiming line that allows you and Stella to blast and pop with magical precision! Solve the puzzles to reunite the ghosts, save the owls and rescue the important fairy queen in this explosive bubble shooting adventure. Cast spells and power ups with Nero and blast your way through those extra tough levels to keep up with the mischievous Wilbur!Blast! Stella needs to rebuild her home all thanks to the evil Wilbur. Take aim and pop your way through the levels to find the magic star dust Stella needs in order to rebuild, customize and style her new home!The only bubble shooter you will ever need! Take on this magical Saga alone or pop with friends, burst their bubble by setting an all new high-score.Bubble Witch 3 Saga features: • Match 3 bubbles to pop them in this magical puzzle shooting adventure • Spellbinding game modes and cute characters!• Release the owls, free the ghosts and save the Fairy Queen from Wilbur!• Rebuild Stella’s house and visit your friends to get rewards • Special boosters to help you pass those tricky levels• Easily sync the game between devices when connected to the Internet• Leader boards to watch your friends and competitors!• A free & easy to play bubble shooter, challenging to master! • Available to play on Android phone and tablet devicesBubble Witch 3 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!Follow us to get news and updates:https://www.facebook.com/bubblewitch3sagahttp://www.youtube.com/c/Bubble_Witchhttps://www.instagram.com/bubblewitchsagaofficial/http://www.twitter.com/Bubble_WitchStart the bubble bursting experience today!Have fun playing Bubble Witch 3 Saga!
descriptionHTML:
Bubble Witch 3 Saga – A magical bubble shooting puzzle game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga.

The newest game in the popular Bubble Witch series. Stella the Witch is back and she needs your help to defeat Wilbur in this exciting puzzle blasting adventure! Wilbur may look cute, but he's full of magical mischief! Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this bubble shooting puzzle game.

Help Stella, Nero and Violet restore piece to the realm by matching bubbles with the unique aiming line that allows you and Stella to blast and pop with magical precision! Solve the puzzles to reunite the ghosts, save the owls and rescue the important fairy queen in this explosive bubble shooting adventure. Cast spells and power ups with Nero and blast your way through those extra tough levels to keep up with the mischievous Wilbur!

Blast! Stella needs to rebuild her home all thanks to the evil Wilbur. Take aim and pop your way through the levels to find the magic star dust Stella needs in order to rebuild, customize and style her new home!

The only bubble shooter you will ever need! Take on this magical Saga alone or pop with friends, burst their bubble by setting an all new high-score.

Bubble Witch 3 Saga features:
• Match 3 bubbles to pop them in this magical puzzle shooting adventure
• Spellbinding game modes and cute characters!
• Release the owls, free the ghosts and save the Fairy Queen from Wilbur!
• Rebuild Stella’s house and visit your friends to get rewards
• Special boosters to help you pass those tricky levels
• Easily sync the game between devices when connected to the Internet
• Leader boards to watch your friends and competitors!
• A free & easy to play bubble shooter, challenging to master!
• Available to play on Android phone and tablet devices

Bubble Witch 3 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.
You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!

Follow us to get news and updates:
https://www.facebook.com/bubblewitch3saga
http://www.youtube.com/c/Bubble_Witch
https://www.instagram.com/bubblewitchsagaofficial/
http://www.twitter.com/Bubble_Witch

Start the bubble bursting experience today!

Have fun playing Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

I'm playing up to the 16K range, and it has these issues usually after I've gotten the 4K blocks. 2/6/2018

I enjoy 2048 alot. I play it alot and I would consider myself pretty good, my high score is 250,000. When i was building on that high score, the screen glitched and swiped a number of times, ruining the order of the numbers. This has happened on multiple occasions only in this app. It's not such a big problem for people that are newer, but when you've got big numbers, such as 8192, it makes the game unplayable.

Awesome game I have basically mastered this game. Got a high score of 2,892,204. I made the highest tile which is 131,072. This game is amazing and requires intense focus. I lost focus for a second and a 4 appeared and I didn't notice. Messed me up when I was about to make the 65k tile
best beain adict game. but 9 grid stage doesnt fulfill. not enough grid box. the Creator cheated. i m going to lodge a complaint against you. you ve to answer my brain😀 anyway superr game excellent

The game is great, but the leaderboards are seriously messed up.  The top high scores are literally orders of magnitude higher than it is physically possible to get.  I would assume that they have been "hacked" somehow to display these fake scores.  The developer should cap the high score at the number that is literally the highest possible score (based on the size of the board)
description: - The classic 2048 puzzle is a fun, addictive and a very simple number puzzle game. You join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! - This 2048 game is an upgraded version of the current popular 2048 game. This is a super 2048 puzzle, it supports classic (4x4), big (5x5), bigger (6x6) and huge (8x8) board sizes. Be ready for a new challenge! HOW TO PLAY: Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins! 8 .. 16 ... 1024 .. 2048. To access Leaderboard, you will have to sign in using google plus account.FEATURES- Classic (4x4), big (5x5), bigger (6x6) and huge (8x8) board options!- Super 2048 Plus puzzle game- Keep playing for High-score after collected 2048 tile- Game is automatically saved- One Undo move support- Beautiful and simple UI- High score- Leaderboard- Completely native implementation
descriptionHTML:
- The classic 2048 puzzle is a fun, addictive and a very simple number puzzle game. You join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!
- This 2048 game is an upgraded version of the current popular 2048 game. This is a super 2048 puzzle, it supports classic (4x4), big (5x5), bigger (6x6) and huge (8x8) board sizes. Be ready for a new challenge!

HOW TO PLAY:
Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins! 8 .. 16 ... 1024 .. 2048. To access Leaderboard, you will have to sign in using google plus account.

FEATURES
- Classic (4x4), big (5x5), bigger (6x6) and huge (8x8) board options!
- Super 2048 Plus puzzle game
- Keep playing for High-score after collected 2048 tile
- Game is automatically saved
- One Undo move support
- Beautiful and simple UI
- High score
- Leaderboard
- Completely native implementation

This is just a game that already has inconsistencies with reality. Otherwise I love the game

Just loved it... I am at council level 18 now... Weapon upgrade xp cost should be reduced or just remove workshop. No use of WORKSHOP with such high xp cost because its REASONABLE to upgrade your SURVIVOR than their WEAPONS.... Please for next update reduce weapon upgrade cost....

Great game, been playing for five months now and have managed to get all but 5 hero's unlocked. Lots of chances to save up radios for hero calls and love the different types of game especially the guild.  Haven't spent a penny on it and don't think you need to if you have a little patience and use your resources wisely.

I've been playing this game for two years now and I can never put it down. It's such an amazing game. I'd like it even more though if the characters we originally fell in love with were available. Like Andrea, T-Dog, Lori, etc.

Great time waster. Wish the gas would increase quicker. Hero's are pretty easy to get after a while. Freemium aspects of the game not shoved down your throat they are there but not essential (So far) LVL 25

description: Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle. • FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead • JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - GamezeboFor more, please visit:http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomanslandhttp://twitter.com/twdnomanslandhttp://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.comhttp://www.youtube.com/nxtgmsFor player support, please visit:nextgames.helpshift.com

description: Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans! It brings together traditional drawing tools and some magical surprises that little ones will love. description: Paper Toss Boss: more papery, tossy, and bossy than ever before! (It’s cool, tossy is a word now, don’t worry about it.) There are tons of things to throw and oodles of things to throw them at! Score.-16 unique items to toss, from classic wads of paper to the epic rubber band ball-10 dynamic environments of varying difficulty in which to toss around -Break, blow up, and burn the objects found around the office-Toss stuff at the Boss and other co-workers to annoy them (in game, not real life — but we won’t tell if you pretend it’s real life)-Missions offer challenges to show off your paper (and non-paper) tossing skills in exchange for awesome rewards-Moving targets, bank shots, and bunches of baskets will test the true prowess of your paper tossing skills -Power-ups boost your scores and mix up the gameplay for a variety of fun ways to toss -Google Play leaderboards and achievements so you can challenge your friends and smite your adversariesRemember those pesky “Hey, you hit me!” co-workers from the original Paper Toss? Well now you can throw right at them! (You devil, you.) You’ll still score points for flicking wads of paper into the office trash can, now with a handsome new ergonomic design! Plus, try your skills with flaming paper balls, tossable bananas, tomatoes, grenades, and other fun stuff to hurl in classic office settings and more. What are you waiting for?! Get tossing!Install Paper Toss Boss for FREE today!PLEASE NOTE! Paper Toss Boss is completely free to play, but some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.______________________________Paper Toss Boss is brought to you by Backflip Studios, makers of absurdly fun mobile games like DragonVale, NinJump, and Transformers: Earth Wars, and is a proud partner of Hasbro, Inc.

descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!

comments: This a great game all around. The controls are tight and the gameplay is fast paced, and the music  and art style are both incredible.  All that being said, the best part about this game is the narrative. I can't remember the last time I played a mobile game that told an actual story. Data Wing really goes above and beyond to deliver a full fledged experience for the player.  Thanks Dan! You've set the bar high for the rest of the mobile  gaming community and I can't wait to see what you've got in store.

This game is ingenious and amazing, and the script is beautiful and gameplay is simple and straightforward, timeless, and fun, with increasing difficulty, but also, able to go back and compete against yourself for more Rewards. The user interface is spot-on, and the graphics are perfect. They scale well to any resolution and any aspect ratio, taking up the entire screen without any letterboxing. The actual gameplay is simply a 2 button gameplay, left and right, and yet, this game kept me busy for hours. It's addicting, but doesn't require you to consistently visit the app. It does not nag you in any way.  I have not seen a single advertisement, and the developer does not have any big paywall or reward system for paying. You will not need to spend any money on this.

I think it is a good idea done well. I havent had any problems so far and the game os more than i expected. I thought the game would just be full of mindless levels but it is not. It even has a cool story and i cant wait to see how it plays out. There ia a cool mechanic wherd you get a speed boost the closer you are to the walls. I really enjoyed the game and i think it deserves 5 stars. This is the only mobile game i loved so much i actually made a review for.

This is the best game ever, that I have ever played 1. I loved the story (You will know what I mean when you have played) 2. The controls are very strange and frustrate some people. But I think that's what make the game challenging 3. THE MUSIC. I loved the choices they have made with the music. It's really good love it 4. The graphics are really good couldn't ask for more 5. Really like the secrets   PS. Would like if you could at some kind of multiplayer when you have beaten the game  - Love Ln'TCore

Vey cool! Haven't finished it yet, though. The only thing that would make this better would be if the controls were a little bit better and more responsive  (which I know is hard to do on mobile or tablets), and some of the levels are nearly impossible  (at least for me). Nonetheless, I like it! Keep it up with the good work!

Saw this before and saw 4.9 out of 5 with over 80,000 reviews. That's... unheard of on the store. So I came back to try it out. Completely worth it. Gameplay is flawless, visuals are gorgeously retro and vaporwave, the soundtrack is all retrowave from various artists, and the story is really good too. It's not often I rate games, and even then I'm not excited when writing them. For this one I can't praise this game enough. Perfect retro-styled racing gem on Google Play.

descriptionHTML:
Game of Warriors is a Strategy TD (Tower Defense) game with a unique style in its genre. Set in a magical world you will have to upgrade your defenses and mighty soldiers to survive and siege enemy territories to conquer them.

The rival alliance of the evil kingdoms has pushed what remains of the human civilization to a corner of the world, isolated and forgotten, plunged into misery and trying to survive harshly.

Ready the horses, hire your warriors and prepare the spears for battle, the war horn will sound again and our titans will destroy the enemy walls and towers.

The age of dark empires have come to an end, it's time to recover what rightfully belongs to us, it's time for revolt, war and revenge!

The warriors claim your name, lord!

Command your gladiators into a battle for eternal glory in this epic clash of warriors.

Features:

- Tower Defense (TD) and Strategy game style.
- +1500 defensive waves.
- 4 Heroes to unlock.
- +100 territories to conquer.
- +30 soldiers to upgrade.
- +1000 building upgrades.
- 4 different races to conquer (Goblins, Skeletons, Worgens and Orcs).
- 15 passive and 3 active skills for your general.

description: This is by far the most flexible word search app on the market. Multiple configuration options create a game that exactly corresponds to your device and your expertise.Play with an English word list or choose one of 23 other languages.Designed for fun games from the smallest mobile phones up to the largest tablets.Bored of seeing the same words appear repeatedly? Frustrated at looking for bizarre words that are not even English? Struggled with grids that are inappropriate for your device or difficult to read? Word Search Ultimate solves all these problems. You can configure:1) Grid size    Specify exactly how many columns and rows to use (from 3 to 20). Even non square grids (e.g. 12x15) are possible.2) Screen layout    Choose how much screen space for the grid and how much for the word list, using our unique movable split bar.3) Difficulty of the game    Specify approximate proportion of words that are written diagonally, backwards or vertically (e.g. allow no diagonal or backwards words, ideal for introducing children to Word Search).4) Difficulty of the words    Specify the size of the dictionary to generate a game, from the 500 most common words (good for kids and language students), up to 80,000 words.5) Maximum # of words    Choose the maximum number of words to find in one game, from 1 to 150. This will provide enough words to fill a 20x20 grid.6) Minimum & Maximum word length    This helps avoid searching for many small words (a common problem in word apps). Also useful for specifying really difficult games (e.g. set both minimum and maximum word length to three).7) Highlighting    Mark the already found words, or keep the grid unmarked and easy to read.8) Word list layout    The word list can be arranged in columns for easy reading, or close to each other to minimize screen space.9) Language    Choose the language of the word list, from a large range of downloadable dictionaries.  24 languages are currently available (see below).10) Orientation    Can be played in portrait or landscape mode. Just rotate your device and the display adjusts automatically.11) Word categories    Choose the words to find from a range of categories; e.g. animals, food etc.This app gives you the ultimate power to play the game just the way you want.Each game is assigned a difficulty level from 0 (easy) to 9 (very hard). The difficulty level is determined by the settings. Each difficulty level maintains the high scores (measured by fastest time to complete the game). The game displays the best 20 scores for each difficulty level.Compare your high scores with others around the world by using Google Play's "Game Services".Other features unique to this app:1) Two methods of selecting words: (i) the classic swipe (ii) by touching the first and last letter of the word from the grid.2) Game aid if you are having difficulty. You can choose to reveal a word that you cannot find.3) View the definition of the word from an online source (e.g. Wiktionary), optimized for viewing on a small screen.4) When you play with a word list in a foreign language, the word definition will (where possible) be in your own language. This is great for language learning!Additional Features planned for a future version of this app:1) Blind mode.  The word list is hidden. Instead you must find the words within the grid. Useful in combination with word categories.2) Play against others.3) Give us feedback on other features you would like to see.Dictionaries available are English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, French, German, Italian, Indonesian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Greek, Hungarian, Polish, Romanian, Serbian(Latin), Serbian(Cyrillic), Slovak, Slovene, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian and more coming later
descriptionHTML:
This is by far the most flexible word search app on the market. Multiple configuration options create a game that exactly corresponds to your device and your expertise.
Play with an English word list or choose one of 23 other languages.
Designed for fun games from the smallest mobile phones up to the largest tablets.
Bored of seeing the same words appear repeatedly? Frustrated at looking for bizarre words that are not even English? Struggled with grids that are inappropriate for your device or difficult to read? Word Search Ultimate solves all these problems.

You can configure:

1) Grid size
Specify exactly how many columns and rows to use (from 3 to 20). Even non square grids (e.g. 12x15) are possible.
2) Screen layout
Choose how much screen space for the grid and how much for the word list, using our unique movable split bar.
3) Difficulty of the game
Specify approximate proportion of words that are written diagonally, backwards or vertically (e.g. allow no diagonal or backwards words, ideal for introducing children to Word Search).
4) Difficulty of the words
Specify the size of the dictionary to generate a game, from the 500 most common words (good for kids and language students), up to 80,000 words.
5) Maximum # of words
Choose the maximum number of words to find in one game, from 1 to 150. This will provide enough words to fill a 20x20 grid.
6) Minimum & Maximum word length
This helps avoid searching for many small words (a common problem in word apps). Also useful for specifying really difficult games (e.g. set both minimum and maximum word length to three).
7) Highlighting
Mark the already found words, or keep the grid unmarked and easy to read.
8) Word list layout
The word list can be arranged in columns for easy reading, or close to each other to minimize screen space.
9) Language
Choose the language of the word list, from a large range of downloadable dictionaries. 24 languages are currently available (see below).
10) Orientation
Can be played in portrait or landscape mode. Just rotate your device and the display adjusts automatically.
11) Word categories
Choose the words to find from a range of categories; e.g. animals, food etc.

This app gives you the ultimate power to play the game just the way you want.

Each game is assigned a difficulty level from 0 (easy) to 9 (very hard). The difficulty level is determined by the settings. Each difficulty level maintains the high scores (measured by fastest time to complete the game). The game displays the best 20 scores for each difficulty level.
Compare your high scores with others around the world by using Google Play's "Game Services".

Other features unique to this app:

1) Two methods of selecting words: (i) the classic swipe (ii) by touching the first and last letter of the word from the grid.
2) Game aid if you are having difficulty. You can choose to reveal a word that you cannot find.
3) View the definition of the word from an online source (e.g. Wiktionary), optimized for viewing on a small screen.
4) When you play with a word list in a foreign language, the word definition will (where possible) be in your own language. This is great for language learning!

Additional Features planned for a future version of this app:

1) Blind mode. The word list is hidden. Instead you must find the words within the grid. Useful in combination with word categories.
2) Play against others.
3) Give us feedback on other features you would like to see.

Dictionaries available are English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, French, German, Italian, Indonesian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Greek, Hungarian, Polish, Romanian, Serbian(Latin), Serbian(Cyrillic), Slovak, Slovene, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian and more coming later

description: Pixel Swordfish.io is a game about cute creatures piercing each other. Dash to your enemy and kill them!Your goal is become the creature with biggest nose in the world.If your nose touches another player, he will explode and you will get another point. But if others run into YOU, then you are defeated and game is over.In Pixel Sword fish .io game, you have a chance to win even if you have tiny nose. descriptionHTML:
Pixel Swordfish.io is a game about cute creatures piercing each other.
Dash to your enemy and kill them!
Your goal is become the creature with biggest nose in the world.If your nose touches another player, he will explode and you will get another point. But if others run into YOU, then you are defeated and game is over.
In Pixel Sword fish .io game, you have a chance to win even if you have tiny nose. You can attack from sides or rear of a much larger and bigger nose player to defeat them, no matter how big your nose are!

HOW TO PLAY:
Control with Joystick your direction.
Using a boost button (the lower right corner of the screen) can make your worm creature to run faster with higher speed but running fast will reduce your energy! (need time to fill it up).
Dash into opponents like a arrow and Kill enemies to rise your nose and get stars. Popup the balloons to get more stars. Get characters with different noses in shop.

Pixel Sword Fish io game have 6 modes:
* Classic --- you are fight with other worms collecting stars, rise and evolve your tusk, trying to earn trophy to unlock next Arena.
* Team play --- players dived on and each team have a ticket count so when there is no more ticket you can't revive until game over.
* Survival --- 50 crazy players in one room! The rule is simple one life, you don't have another chance !
* Kill the king -- in this little rom one is a king with big tusk and body and other players trying to kill him to became the new king so defend yourself or attack depends who you are on that time.
* Smash --- overcrowded tiny room with angry players you should be very fast with good reactions to survive in that insanity, no escape from this place .
* One sword pro --- only true masters who are really fast (who craft more than 1200 trophies) are allowed to play in that room only one sword characters are allowed no slither movements are welcome here.

So, what are you waiting for? get this cool new app now!
Develop your battle skills start the war and try to survive in crowded and dangerous water world.

*Attention this app requires good internet connection!
* If you have any idea or suggestion please contact us on Facebook
developerAddress: Suit 14, Park Lane 55, London, W1K1NA
recentChanges: Fixed bugs
summary: Dash to your enemy and kill them! Pixel cute creatures piercing each other.
title: Pixel Sword Fish io

comments: A good app which helps you understand the location and names of countries. Hoewever there are a few mistakes. Also very small countries like Monaco, Vatican city and a few others are not included. Please include them in the future versions

When highlighting Australia, I have options for various African countries. Very, very simple game that would be great for children. Rather boring an repetitive with some graphics issues to iron out (like highlight Lesotho and South Africa together)

Only using the basic game, but there are several errors in the select(?) process for game 2 because i get maps and no valid option from the select list. Also cant get game 1 to move passed 1/6. Otherwise, a brilliant game

It's worth the $2.99 I really wanted to master my world geography. I love it. I does cover the entire world with the $2.99 purchase. I'm up to Level 37. I can't seem to get past level 37 though so it may be the last level, but you can still repeat levels to master the world.
Showed me a country and a list of choices but the correct answer was not listed...got it wrong of course. Quiz is very repetitive.

(ATTENTION DEVELOPERS) It would be great, except on the intermediate level of "name the country", frequently it highlights a  country which is NOT on the list you're supposed to pick from. So whatever you choose as an answer, will be guaranteed uncorrect.
description: Treefort's Geography Brain Trainer is ideal for students of any age looking to learn and master country names and locations. Become a geography pro in your spare time!Brain TrainingWith an interactive 3d globe, challenging quizzes, and a trophy reward system, the Geography Brain Trainer is a fun yet addictive way to train your brain and build up your geographical knowledge of the world's countries. Working through each difficulty of the Geography Brain Trainer will help you to both easily name a country and pinpoint any country on the globe!The Geography Brain Trainer has two learning challenges:(1)	Name the CountryName the Country will quiz you with different country locations and challenge you to select the correct country. (2)	Find the CountryFind the Country will test your ability to pinpoint a country on the Geography Brain Trainer's interactive globe.TrophiesTrophies are given for each level difficulty in the Geography Brain Trainer: beginner, intermediate, and advanced. To earn a trophy you will first need to work through the world's continents and geographic regions:- Europe- Asia- North and South America- Africa- Oceania Along with a global 'all' challenge to test your mental ability to move between regions. The Geography Brain Trainer is free and can be used offline, with a single one-time purchase to unlock the 'advanced' difficulty setting.Master the Geography Brain Trainer and master the globe!
descriptionHTML:
Treefort's Geography Brain Trainer is ideal for students of any age looking to learn and master country names and locations. Become a geography pro in your spare time!

Brain Training

With an interactive 3d globe, challenging quizzes, and a trophy reward system, the Geography Brain Trainer is a fun yet addictive way to train your brain and build up your geographical knowledge of the world's countries. Working through each difficulty of the Geography Brain Trainer will help you to both easily name a country and pinpoint any country on the globe!

The Geography Brain Trainer has two learning challenges:

(1) Name the Country

Name the Country will quiz you with different country locations and challenge you to select the correct country.

(2) Find the Country

Find the Country will test your ability to pinpoint a country on the Geography Brain Trainer's interactive globe.

Trophies

Trophies are given for each level difficulty in the Geography Brain Trainer: beginner, intermediate, and advanced. To earn a trophy you will first need to work through the world's continents and geographic regions:

- Europe
- Asia
- North and South America
- Africa
- Oceania

Along with a global 'all' challenge to test your mental ability to move between regions. The Geography Brain Trainer is free and can be used offline, with a single one-time purchase to unlock the 'advanced' difficulty setting.

Master the Geography Brain Trainer and master the globe!

comments: I love this game. Its and absolute tome waster and lovely to play. However, I had set my phone to the side to let it play out (as I was over 1400) and it reset on its own. I had cleared the screen the round previously so there was no chance of me losing to that. It was behind me and I never would have reset it. Is this some sort of glitch? If it is, please fix it soon. Aside from this, this is amazing.

I really, really love this game, but, I keep losing my ball count and I don't understand why this is happening. For instance, I have 90 balls and I'm supposed to have 92, I don't get the 92. I will give 5 stars until the bug is fixed. The ads I don't care about because that only happens at the end of each game which is ok. Please fix this so I can give you 5 stars.  Update- I figured out why I keep losing my count with my balls. Everytime I get the balls by the number blocks, it wouldn't count them😐 I could get a lot further if this was fixed. If this keeps on happening, I'm going to uninstall this game. I hope it doesn't come to that because I really love this game. Please fix asap!!

If I could give zero (0) stars for controls, that would be too high. The game is fun and addictive. But there is a restart button that there is NO REASON FOR. I have lost my progress three times with scores over 1000, which takes weeks to achieve. THE DEVELOPER DOES NOT RESPOND EVER. Uninstalling.

It's good at first but you'll lose returning customers. Where are the power ups? Maybe an ultra bull that acts as 2 hits each turn. Nothing is drawing me back to and having me for higher school. In fact high score just means waiting longer. Could potentially be a great game.

Best ever! Addicted to it. Cute graphics and fun color make it great! The aim-and-fire technique makes it original! Installed it 2 days ago, top score 72 average score 50!  P.S. If you like this app (which you probably do) try Amazing Thief! Great and another Ketchapp marvel! I'm not spoiling it, but I will tell you it's a lot like Flappy Bird. If you don't know what Flappy Bird is, well then look it up.  P.P.S.  Anyone here would probably have at least SEEN Flappy Bird, but seriously. It is like an Aztec-age game.

Both my husband and I have this game.  I opted to pay for the no ads though, he did not.  DO NOT do this!  He is able to get "continues" for watching adds and can keep climbing up the levels.  I cannot since I purchased no adds.  I get to continue once and that's all since I have stopped ads from allowing me to get the extra chances.  I wish I would have known this beforehand. Otherwise, this game is seriously fun and addicting.

comments: I would have bought the ad free Version eventually, but it was so annoying even to get used to the game, that I gave up. If you want more people to buy the game you have to give them the opportunity to play without being interrupted every death. Your game can be the best ever but still no one will play it if they have to invest the same time in watching ads that they invest in playing the game.
Game is good. Ads are bloody appalling. I have to waste 30 seconds each time I die? No thank you
Alright if you like ads more than gameplay. Stuck with 30 second ads after 20 secs of play. Don't mind some ads, but this is overkill. Pass.

Edit: Ruined it because if the ads. I understand why you have them, but I was willing to watch them IF I felt like doing another round or not. Having the choice to watch one or not was nice. Now you're just forced to after death. Sorry, that's never a good idea. And no, save your copy pasted response, I don't want it. It's not genuine, and it's just a plead for us to buy the ad removal thing.  Original: The core gameplay loop is cool. It's fun, I'll keep booting it up. But it would benefit greatly by a better tutorial. As someone else said before, the ball tends to fly off and lose momentum in ways I can't seem to figure out. Might be a failing on my part, but at times it feels like gravity changes the rules at random and I'm left floating hopelessly as the void swallows me up. I'm not really sure what the optimal way to survive is
It's a great game, for users complaining about ads, it's called ad blocker. When devs force a billion ads and make it unplayable, I use adaway, game is great after, but without adaway, don't bother!

The game itself is a lot of fun, it's challenging and addictive but with ads this game is a nightmare, they massively hinder your ability to progress and learn the game which is very frustrating. I made the in app purchase to remove the ads and without them the game is flawless. I think if the ads were reworked to be slightly less regular (i.e. not every time you lose) more people would be able to appreciate the game and might be more inclined to make the in aop purchase to remove them rather than getting annoyed at them before they've had a chance to enjoy the game.

descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.


Thank you for downloading this game from everyone at Rogue Games.

I've been crushing the ai and want to try real people. But all in all it is very fun. Best badminton game I've played yet. And most realistic too. I've played badminton for about 15 years so it's nice to finally find a good badminton game.

It lags everytime we use the multiplayer and the developer needs to look on the Bluetooth connection as well. Super lag. :( please update this coz I love this game a lot!  Update:  Wow! Thanks for giving me heads up! I seriously appreciate for looking into this. :) keep up the good work!

decent minimalist animation, so game is smooth since u are against ai/bot. pretty much wont lose, when u have unlock all item and stats. need an update for tournament against real player. and additional moves or trick to create a bit complexity and thrill to the game. if u like something easy and relaxing this is the game.

Game was too easy. 99.4% winrate and just passed 6500 trophies. I was expecting more but unlocking elite level tournament was all. Even after winning elite tournament nothing happened. Its a bottomless pit, there is no more progression after reaching 6500 trophies and winning elite level. Basic games nowadays have at least a multiplayer mode with leaderboard for trophies. That would be a big game changer for this but for now, no purpose in this game at all

descriptionHTML:
The most competitive badminton games ever! Take on your friends in 1 vs 1 mode, or win the Badminton League trophy🏆 in Tournament Mode!

Customizing your character with tons of items. And level up your ability to do stronger smash and jump!

Now grab your racket to smash, hit the shuttlecock, do a crazy smash to your opponent like badminton star!

Features:
- Multiple game modes available, play with sports fans in local
- Create your very own character, and level - up
- Easy to control, challenging to win
- Simple and elegant UI design
- Cool stunts and realistic hitting shuttlecock experience
- Numerous gorgeous badminton outfits

How to play with friends in 1 vs 1 Mode:
1. Connect the same WiFi or Personal Hotspot with your friends
2. Open "Badminton League" and select 1 vs 1 Mode together
3. Bet with coins, tap "HOST" to create a room, then waiting for your friend to join
4. Check the name which shows on the board, then tap to join
5. Now you will know who is the Newbie

Remind your friends to download Badminton League before above operation :)

This game needs an internet connection to play.
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Badminton-League-203729826806154/

comments: Love playing but have 2 suggestions. We need another mill.  When we have large orders to fill it takes forever to complete those orders because the mull is tied up all the time. Maybe every 40 levels add a mill purchase option. When selling on the market, we need an option for a blind add or a neighborhood only sell or trade.. make these upgrades and so far game would be perfect!

It's great to be able to buy from other farms in theory. But there are WAY too many times that you click on something and it's either sold or not even in the roadside stand at all. The for sale paper needs to update quicker.  Also, it's very hard to accumulate any 'west bucks' in this game and you need them to do almost anything, so the game is a big money suck too. I'm deleting it.

I love these type of games just like hayday. I have noticed it freezes and takes ages to load the newspaper. Also would be helpful if it could tell you who needs help in the newspaper would help filling orders quicker. Also I have noticed alot of people selling the same parts and harder to get others and it's extremely rare to get the land parts without paying

The game doesnt give enough case vs things to buy or fix.  Also have issues with getting product into the alloted spaces.  I thought it was my screen but had it cleaned thoroughly and it still happens.  It takes several attempts!!!  The story is cute.  The graphics are cute as well.  Ive noticed it has a couple of choices from other games Ive played on older phones. I would suggest the game to others but get the issues fixed and itll be a 5star game.

I love playing these games. I'm not sure why we are rating gameplay they offer apps not a game. It's crazy how they ask us to rate game at the beginning of game. We haven't learned the bad points. This game makes us pay for treasure chest instead of giving us to them free like most games. Which means we have to pay for everything. Totally not fair. Takes the fun out of game.

Was totally looking forward to playing this game, the graphics were so cute that I couldnt help but download, but I havent even gotten past the tutorial and its frozen? The game started panning to the billboard right after you sell your first visitor the cream and then it just froze and now it won't let me continue on.

description: Fit words into a grid in this popular game, often seen in puzzle magazines as fill-ins. The grid looks like a crossword, but there are no normal clues. Instead you must find the right place in the grid for each word from a given list. The game has an easy to use interface. Either drag-and-drop the words to their correct position, or tap the grid and then the word.Play with an English word list or choose one of 23 other languages.• Play an unlimited number of different puzzles!!• Multiple difficulty options. Start with easy puzzles. Then change the settings to play more challenging puzzles.• Game contains achievements integrated into Google Play's "Game Services".Designed for fun games from the smallest mobile phones up to the largest tablets.You can configure:1) Grid size    Specify exactly how many columns and rows to use (from 3 to 20). Even non square grids (e.g. 12x15) are possible.2) Screen layout    Choose how much screen space for the grid and how much for the word list, using our unique movable split bar.3) Minimum & Maximum word length     This helps avoid searching for many small words (a common problem in word apps). Also useful for specifying really difficult games (e.g. set both minimum and maximum word length to three).4) Starting letters     The game can start with one or more letters already placed in the grid, in order to help you get started.5) Language     Choose the language of the word list, from a large range of downloadable dictionaries.  24 languages are currently available (see below).6) Orientation    Can be played in portrait or landscape mode. Just rotate your device and the display adjusts automatically.This app gives you the ultimate power to play the game just the way you want.Each game is assigned a difficulty level from 0 (easy) to 9 (very hard). The difficulty level is determined by the settings. Each difficulty level maintains the high scores (measured by fastest time to complete the game). The game displays the best 20 scores for each difficulty level.Compare your high scores with others around the world by using Google Play's "Game Services".Other features unique to this app:1) View the definition of the word from an online source (e.g. Wiktionary), optimized for viewing on a small screen.2) When you play with a word list in a foreign language, the word definition will (where possible) be in your own language. This is great for language learning!3) Your can also play and fit with numbers and symbols in addition to wordsDictionaries available are English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, French, German, Italian, Indonesian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Greek, Hungarian, Polish, Romanian, Serbian(Latin), Serbian(Cyrillic), Slovak, Slovene, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian and more coming later
descriptionHTML:
Fit words into a grid in this popular game, often seen in puzzle magazines as fill-ins. The grid looks like a crossword, but there are no normal clues. Instead you must find the right place in the grid for each word from a given list. The game has an easy to use interface. Either drag-and-drop the words to their correct position, or tap the grid and then the word.
Play with an English word list or choose one of 23 other languages.

• Play an unlimited number of different puzzles!!
• Multiple difficulty options. Start with easy puzzles. Then change the settings to play more challenging puzzles.
• Game contains achievements integrated into Google Play's "Game Services".

Designed for fun games from the smallest mobile phones up to the largest tablets.

You can configure:

1) Grid size
Specify exactly how many columns and rows to use (from 3 to 20). Even non square grids (e.g. 12x15) are possible.
2) Screen layout
Choose how much screen space for the grid and how much for the word list, using our unique movable split bar.
3) Minimum & Maximum word length
This helps avoid searching for many small words (a common problem in word apps). Also useful for specifying really difficult games (e.g. set both minimum and maximum word length to three).
4) Starting letters
The game can start with one or more letters already placed in the grid, in order to help you get started.
5) Language
Choose the language of the word list, from a large range of downloadable dictionaries. 24 languages are currently available (see below).
6) Orientation
Can be played in portrait or landscape mode. Just rotate your device and the display adjusts automatically.

This app gives you the ultimate power to play the game just the way you want.

Each game is assigned a difficulty level from 0 (easy) to 9 (very hard). The difficulty level is determined by the settings. Each difficulty level maintains the high scores (measured by fastest time to complete the game). The game displays the best 20 scores for each difficulty level.
Compare your high scores with others around the world by using Google Play's "Game Services".

Other features unique to this app:

1) View the definition of the word from an online source (e.g. Wiktionary), optimized for viewing on a small screen.
2) When you play with a word list in a foreign language, the word definition will (where possible) be in your own language. This is great for language learning!
3) Your can also play and fit with numbers and symbols in addition to words

Dictionaries available are English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, French, German, Italian, Indonesian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Greek, Hungarian, Polish, Romanian, Serbian(Latin), Serbian(Cyrillic), Slovak, Slovene, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian and more coming later

comments: If you don't continue to buy skills or bags in the game they will cheat you and make you lose. But constantly asking me to buy something is annoying. Also, good graphics but control are not good enough. It malfunctions and player with bad connection has advantage and wins game and money.  That's problematic.

Well... sometimes when I play some people I think mite be hacking the game or cheating. they don't miss one shot and I make none or sometimes one or two, that is the only down side but other than that it's a good game (suggesten have people by gold or game coins with the money in the game)

The game would be better if you could do anything with the cash you win besides just play in different courts.  Making the player use gold bars for EVERYthing is lame.  I'd rather watch an occasional add and be able to buy cool gear with my cash..

The new bags won after a win are meant to get you to spend real money to open them up quicker by using gold. It's so obvious a money grab for mini games, it's sad. Also, the more real money you pay to get a better in game basketball, the more skills you'll have to beat anyone. That's why so many people scream about cheaters. There aren't any cheaters, just those who paid real money to pad the pockets of miniclip and make the game a true pay-to-win clustermuck.

comments: It started great and I was so looking forward to exploring all the rooms in the mansion. Unfortunately, after a short period of good progress it started putting in lots of delaying features: Read a letter, meet the neighbors, give the neighbors tea, read a book, look for another book. At this rate I'll never get to see another room. So now that I reached the level where I would have to pay them if I want to win any more games, I'm just going to uninstall.

I really like the game but some of the tasks are so annoying (take a nap, read letter, open book and stuff like this). Still playing it and still enjoying it. Will suggest more options for the furniture and definitely options if we don't want to put some of the things, to can take it away. Because the game is obligating us to put things yes or yes even if you don't want it. So for me would be nice to have the option for "new" one or "take it away".

I have not been able to play for 3 days now. Everytime I log on I can not click the play button even after I go into the app and force stop. It is hard to level up and the power ups don't always work. I have also lost items after winning them. I do not recommend this game sadly because I did find it fun at first.

I really like this game.  I would give it five stars if you change a couple of things.  We should be able to create our own character,  there should be a player code that we could type in to go to a friends mansion.  But other than those things this is a great game that is a lot of fun for all ages!

Haven't been able to log in to play for two days now. It's like the game is stuck. I've tried to force stop, restart my phone. Nothing works. I'd hate to uninstall because I've put a lot into this game. Please help!!

Finally found a game I enjoy  so I thought.  I like each level is competitive until you get to levels that are impossible.  Like an idiot spent real money for extras guess what still stuck at same level, has been over a week same level.  Just another game will be deleted.

comments: I Personally would like to have the ability to upgrade stars on heroes easier without spending real money. Get 2 to 3 stars on the characters for free leaves me wanting, and im just not spending money on a game like this. Otherwise it is a fun game. Even though it basically can be a full time job you dont make money on and have to spend money on. So if you dont mind commiting months to barely make it to do the late game stuff amd still have to spend months to progress. This game will be great. This review is for those who play ftp games without actually paying to win.

So it's kinda fun but I'm rating it low based on the cost of purchasing character shards versus how many you get. I tested it out and purchased a ton of purple diamond things and purchased character shards that gives between 5 and 330. Out of 7 purchases at 1299 each, I got a total of 41 shards. So for roughly 9100 diamonds, I get 41 shards. You do the math. This game apparently enjoys taking your money. I've mentioned this to the developers with no reply. DC Legends knows what they're doing when it comes to purchases of character shards. At least they make it easier

Very addictive. I started playing casually, and 4 weeks later I find myself checking it all the time. It's best played with at least a minor investment, but reasonably ftp...if you got patience.  Add: it's been six months, and I'm still hammering away at it. It has a huge base of fans,and I've only needed customer support once (and they handled my issue very well and quickly).  Still a bit grind-y, but great little bit of clicky gaming.

The game is fun enough but to sync it with your Google account to have to give your phone and all its abilities to EA. Why is there a need for the game to access my photos and make and answer calls? How 'bout I play a game on my phone with cool light sabers and fun music and when I need to make a call I'll stop for a bit. Just let people play and EA can make bank with their microtransactions. GTFO of people's personal info.

Great way to spend down time at work or at home. Really enjoy playing as characters from both light and dark side teaming up and defeating others. It does take awhile to get charcters leveled up. However can spend some money if you don't want to grind. However I find it rewarding grinding each day to get what i want.

Good game but be warned to really get any good characters you're either going to have to pay lots of real money or you'll find yourself grinding forever the same nodes to upgrade the characters that you have. With that said this game is a big improvement over heroes of dragon age of which in many ways this game is modeled after . It seems very clear that some of the devs from that game migrated to this game to start it up. The last update at 02-26-18 freezes at loading screen and then force closes come on devs get on this!
description: “Visually striking and with adrenaline-pumping Star Wars™ music, Galaxy of Heroes is a must-play for fans for the franchise.” – USA Today"The best Star Wars™ game to release for mobile devices in recent memory." – GamezeboLive your Star Wars™ dreams as you fight with your favorite dark and light side heroes across iconic locations to become master of the galaxy. Create and customize your dream squad using characters from every era, including new characters from Star Wars™: The Force Awakens, Rogue One™: A Star Wars™ Story and Star Wars™: The Last Jedi™. Engage in epic turn-based war, confront giant bosses, progress your characters, and take your game to the next level!CREATE THE ULTIMATE TEAMRebel leaders? Empire stalwarts? It’s your choice as you construct elite light and dark side teams while collecting heroes and other characters from the Star Wars™ universe. Make key strategic moves and pick teammates with complementary abilities to go to war with unbeatable squads!BECOME MASTER OF THE GALAXYDefeat opponents and rise to the top as you dominate the galactic hologames in a far-off cantina. Upgrade your heroes’ abilities as you play for even more powerful attacks and bigger wins. Then fight other players in Squad Cantina Battles, PvP Squad Arena, and Squad Tournaments to achieve greatness.PLAY WITH POWERFUL CHAMPIONSMake smart, tactical decisions and equip your heroes with the ultimate gear to enhance their damage in galactic war. Unlock fun abilities to make your team unstoppable as you unleash commanding moves like Luke Skywalker’s Bullseye, Jedi Knight Anakin’s Reckless Assault, and others.ENGAGE IN EPIC SHIP BATTLESCollect iconic starships and massive Capital Ships to construct your war fleets. Attack all-new challenges, fight through space, and compete in the Fleet Arena to test your prowess. Gather unique upgrade materials for characters, available only as rewards for Ship battles. Each vessel also has its own crew, adding special powers to individual Ships. Recruit powerful characters to create the strongest armada!RISE TO THE TOP IN GUILDSLead Raids with friends and fight against bosses like the Rancor and AAT Tank when you create a customizable Guild. Collaborate with your Guild in Territory Battles where members unleash their entire arsenal of characters and ships against a progressively evolving battlefield. Show your dominance when you face off against other Guilds to conquer territories and top global leaderboards in Territory War.Terms of Service: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.comGame EULA: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/OTHER/Visit http://help.ea.com/en/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/ for assistance or inquiries.EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates.
descriptionHTML:
“Visually striking and with adrenaline-pumping Star Wars™ music, Galaxy of Heroes is a must-play for fans for the franchise.” – USA Today

"The best Star Wars™ game to release for mobile devices in recent memory." – Gamezebo

Live your Star Wars™ dreams as you fight with your favorite dark and light side heroes across iconic locations to become master of the galaxy. Create and customize your dream squad using characters from every era, including new characters from Star Wars™: The Force Awakens, Rogue One™: A Star Wars™ Story and Star Wars™: The Last Jedi™. Engage in epic turn-based war, confront giant bosses, progress your characters, and take your game to the next level!

CREATE THE ULTIMATE TEAM
Rebel leaders? Empire stalwarts? It’s your choice as you construct elite light and dark side teams while collecting heroes and other characters from the Star Wars™ universe. Make key strategic moves and pick teammates with complementary abilities to go to war with unbeatable squads!

BECOME MASTER OF THE GALAXY
Defeat opponents and rise to the top as you dominate the galactic hologames in a far-off cantina. Upgrade your heroes’ abilities as you play for even more powerful attacks and bigger wins. Then fight other players in Squad Cantina Battles, PvP Squad Arena, and Squad Tournaments to achieve greatness.

PLAY WITH POWERFUL CHAMPIONS
Make smart, tactical decisions and equip your heroes with the ultimate gear to enhance their damage in galactic war. Unlock fun abilities to make your team unstoppable as you unleash commanding moves like Luke Skywalker’s Bullseye, Jedi Knight Anakin’s Reckless Assault, and others.

ENGAGE IN EPIC SHIP BATTLES
Collect iconic starships and massive Capital Ships to construct your war fleets. Attack all-new challenges, fight through space, and compete in the Fleet Arena to test your prowess. Gather unique upgrade materials for characters, available only as rewards for Ship battles. Each vessel also has its own crew, adding special powers to individual Ships. Recruit powerful characters to create the strongest armada!

RISE TO THE TOP IN GUILDS
Lead Raids with friends and fight against bosses like the Rancor and AAT Tank when you create a customizable Guild. Collaborate with your Guild in Territory Battles where members unleash their entire arsenal of characters and ships against a progressively evolving battlefield. Show your dominance when you face off against other Guilds to conquer territories and top global leaderboards in Territory War.

Terms of Service: http://terms.ea.com

Privacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.com

Game EULA: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/OTHER/

Visit http://help.ea.com/en/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/ for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates.
developerAddress: Geneva, Switzerland
recentChanges: Get excited – everything you love just got better! Now you can:
• Earn the right to multi-sim Galactic War and Ship Challenges
• Receive bonus banners based on combat performance in Territory Wars
• View which Territory War defensive squads were most successful
• Search for units by name when selecting your squad
• Set inactive units as favorites and search favorites easier
• Link accounts to play between Android and iOS devices
• View an improved “Raids Ticket (Daily)” leaderboard
summary: Collect and battle with iconic heroes to become the top hologamer in the galaxy!
title: Star Wars™: Galaxy of Heroes

comments: Purchasing the other ponies is worth it. Don't know why other people are complaining. It's only 5 dollars, you could get a DQ lunch for 5 dollars. Anyways, game is amazing. What's cool is that you can reset your progress so you can have fun all over again. Amazing work Budge Studios!

This game is my 5 yr olds favorite thing to do during trips. She loves the music and animation, and the gameplay is entertaining enough to keep her engaged. It's definitely worth the few bucks to get the add free version.

Installed it, launched it, after the bungie screen was presented by a full screen ad for some game involving a woman + handcuffs + panties. Not a good look for a game aimed at children, my 6 year old was standing behind me.
Ads popped up every 45 seconds. I timed it. Made the game useless for my son (4). And he really wanted to play it too.

My daughter loves this game so much! Good job guys. However we need your help, i made a purchase to unlock all ponies, however, somehow they got locked again and we needed to purchase again to unlock everyone. It was kinda disappointing, please help us on this matter.
Was a favourite of my daughter's until she finished all the levels and now it does nothing. You can't replay once completed. So buying the up grade was a waste of money. Such a shame was a great app
