comments: The original sonic dash is better imo. had a better atmosphere, maps looks better gameplay also better. the original was a masterpiece. also, I don't like that they introduce scenes that requires you to tilt your phone. since i played sonic dash i didn't expect it to be there. it's annoying when you're laying down and play the game and you got that scene just ruins the gameplay.

Way too many advertisements. I actually downloaded this game because subway surfer makes start over everytime you download it but after my next tech upgrade I'm going back to that, atleast the game not flooded with ads.

The responsiveness of the controls I  this game make it unplayable... it's slightly more responsive than the original sonic dash but it's still no where near good enough for such a fast paced game.  I tested this on other devices before I posted this review and it's the same on all of them

I would give it 5 stars, I made an in app purchase to remove ads, but after the game updated non Sega ads started showing again and it asked me to make another purchase in order to remove the non Sega ads AGAIN... love the game, hate the ads...

Ads are back. I paid for a red ring bundle, which did remove them for a while, but they're back. The only reason I made a real purchase was so that I wouldn't have ads, so can someone please remove the ads from my account. On another note, I really like this, and nice to see Shadow playable again.

comments: Very very addicting game. I have both 1 and 2 that I play daily. Loving it! Only problem is sometimes when I win a lot of Coral Eggs I can not get them because it says my hero bag is too full. So if I do not get rid of objects in my bag right away I lose all of my hard earned work.

I've never had this problem untill tonight. When I start a guild boss battle. It starts off fine. About 15-20 seconds into the battle. It goes super fast. Almost like a battle fast forward. Making me miss my skills useage etc. What the hell?

The game is completely different to COC, the game has an original idea, and I have even seen some nockoffs of this game. I highly recommend.  Note: this game has a free to play model that advertises microtransactons but they are not required to have fun in the game.

descriptionHTML:
A top 10 strategy game all around the world!
4.5 stars! A top-rated game!

Are you ready to step into the pit and punch someone? Your favorite Clash of Lords 2 Heroes are fighting in a free-for-all frenzy against a force of frightening fiends! Control the action and become the greatest warlord in all the land. To survive you’ll need wit, will, and we couldn't think of a word for strength but you get the picture. It's time to Clash!

Clash of Lords 2 is a strategy game with fun and innovative twists on the genre. Recruit over 50 Heroes and their mercenaries, build and defend a base, and fight alongside your friends in over 10 PvE and PvP modes! Get ready to Clash!

Game Features:
✔ You control the action! Activate Heroes’ skills in real time!
✔ Pair Heroes and Troops with our unique Mercenary system!
✔ Play it Your Way! With over 10 PvE and PvP modes, there's always something fun and different to do!
✔ Fight alongside your friends! Join a Guild, and clash with players from all over the world! You can even battle against players from different countries!
✔ Free to Play! Log in every day to win free Heroes and Jewels!

Note: This game requires an internet connection to play.
Visit our Facebook Fanpage at: https://www.facebook.com/clashoflords2

comments: Play this game if you have all kinds of money and just want to pay to win. There is little fun to be had outside of that.  Update: the developers listened to feedback and have been adding numerous ways to get advantages for free. Here is some respect for listening to your users. Rating increased!

I overall enjoy the game.  I did the tavern and did a volley for rewards. It showed I won one thing and it gave me another. I took a screen shot of it, sent it to customer service to be compensated.  They say, sorry it was a display error you got the correct rewards. Ummm, no I didn't! It showed I won a valor stone and they gave me a champion stone.  I even had the screen shots to prove it!!  Very unhappy with it and the customer service.  It's not my fault the game glitched, and I should be compensated with what it showed I won. It is NOT my fault the game had a display error.  I have spent money on this game ( more than I will admit) but after the way this was handled,  I will not spend another dime.  Although they probably don't care, as they have shown me already, it is just very disappointing. The way they treat the folks that put the money in their pockets....

I maintain my stance that this game is pay to win. Peaceful, nonpaying lords are punished harshly by higher level lords that just teleport next to you and raid your city until you have nothing left. This problem has been made even worse with the killing event. It lasts 4 whole days and invites so much violence and destruction that small peaceful cities are completely set back to square one by larger more powerful lords. I appreciated the hours I spent into this game, but I cannot support what the developers are doing at this time.
Great game. New problem with update. I can't enter the magic spire. Every time I try, game crashes.

This is the most addictive game I ever played.  Super cool and really fun to play every moment is worth the play. Plus you get to meet so many people all over the world. You become great friends or earth rivals. Thank you for an awesome game and for the interaction with the developers.
Can get expensive... and be sure to keep track of purchases because on numerous occasions i have been double sometimes tripple billed.
description: Do you play war games? Enjoy free online games? Then prepare yourself! The hottest free to play multiplayer war game of 2017 is here! King Arthur’s death has left an empty throne. Raise your dragon and build your army in the quest to lift Excalibur and become the next King of Avalon. In this dragon war, your mighty dragon is the key to ruling your kingdom. Stay alive by forging alliances with your friends and build an empire together. This is a game of kings entangled in a game of war. Who will be victorious in this clash of kings? FEATURES :War! Everywhere. You and your allies need to be prepared for a clash of clans. Build up your bases and bulk up your armies - you're not the only ones with eyes on the throne! Alliances! No man is an island. Whether you’re rallying against a GvE Barbarian leader or marching at a PvP bully, you’ll need allies you can trust. Dragons! A legendary weapon of mass destruction. How will you train yours? Chat! Easy-translation feature brings thousands of players from around the world together in realtime. Strategy! Get the edge through research and master devastating skills. Know when to be invisible and when to order an invasion! Building! Build the foundations of an Empire strong enough to survive in a dragon fire warzone! Epic Fantasy! The Camelot Legend lives. Awesome monsters and HD graphics to drool over. Now play the King of online games, King of Avalon!SUPPORTAre you having problems? https://funplus.helpshift.com/a/king-of-avalon/Privacy Policy: http://www.funplus.com/privacy_policy/Facebook fanpage:https://www.facebook.com/koadwPLEASE NOTE: King of Avalon is completely free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. comments: It's a fun relaxing game. Its so addictive that every device I have, must have this game. I have it on my phone, ipad and tablet. Except my laptop cuz then I would get no work done. About the ads, one pops out each time you finish a game, so I'm not to bothered by it. Also, theres no videos too watch in order to earn coins or diamonds because none are needed. I just love it. Its stress free.

I really enjoy playing this game. It helps me to relax while I am watching TV, or even using in split mode while watching a video or something. It's a bit different then the way I originally used to play Klondike, but still a great game and easy to get used to quickly! I don't mind the 5 second or so ads between games. It's the price you pay to get a good, free game. It's not like they play constantly and during a game there is usually an ad on the bottom screen but it will quickly move if you go to start a new game or need to access the other options.

I would have scored higher except there is suddenly super annoying music being played that there is no option to turn off. The ads also now autoplay loud music. I agree with another poster who said it starting to seem like you lose more so you see more ads. I liked this because it was good for a quick game while getting ready to sleep. The music ruins this. I'm going to try another app now.

I love the game solitaire played it on many different computers over the years. Downloaded three other version on my phone. All of which I deleted almost straight away because they were finicky and I didn't like the format. This one is easy to use and no glitches. So far so good.

It won't allow me to add my own pic for background. Maybe too big of a file but I know other solitare let me. I also wish there wasn't commercials after the win or lose because they interrupt my music but I hear you guys make money that way so let it be. I'll continue to play because I like solitare and the commercials only pause my music and don't cut it completely off to play the commercial, like other apps.

Terrible ads. So bad they hid the menu bar behind an ad banner so you click the ads just to access settings. Pretty sure they recently increased losing deal rate to make more ad videos play. So many other solitaire aps available so skip this one.

comments: Enjoying the game with the new bonuses and rewards (especially since I had to start over after getting a new phone).  However, players should not have to pay to get gold bars from piggy bank especially since the player has already "paid for them" by earning them on levels. Players should be able to use them once earned.

I think Candy Crush as well as Jelly and Soda crush are very entertaining games with literally thousands of levels to play. The levels are imaginative with different scenarios so they don't become boring. So as an avid player of these games I would give them a 4 out of 5 stars because there are some levels that can freeze your progress and become frustrating. All in all, keep up the great ideas for future games.

I'm uninstalling this game today because I've been stuck on the 532 for 6 months. It's hard and boring and the way the jellies drop so slowly annoys the hell out of me. Used to like it before the update that changed the speed of the drops but this level is so dull.
The jelly concept kind of grosses me out. Also, these levels are too difficult. It's not right that I'm on level 15 and am spending 4 or more tries to beat the level.
The level where you have to remove the queen's jelly is horrible. Candy Crush Jelly actually cheats you to prevent you from winning.   Two years later and the game still cheats you.
I really love playing Candy Crush Jelly & it's one of my favorite games to play out of all the other Candy Crush games!!!
description: There's a new player in town, the wiggling, jiggling Jelly Queen and she's here to challenge you to a game of Candy Crush Jelly Saga!  Whatever your favorite moves, you better hope they're Jellylicious enough to take on the mighty Jelly Queen. The unstoppably spreadable game!  New Candy Crush Jelly Saga is full of delightful new game modes, features and boss battles featuring the Jelly Queen!  Playing as Jenny, show off your Jellylicious moves and take turns switching Candies against the jiggling Jelly Queen. Every sweet move will spread more Jelly and whoever spreads the most will win the level! Have you got the moves? There are splendid new Candies, a marvelous new booster and a dreamy treetop world to explore in the Candy Kingdom too! Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!Candy Crush Jelly Saga is completely free to play but in-game currency, to buy items such as extra moves or lives, will require payment with real money.By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/termsCandy Crush Jelly Saga features:• Over 700 Jellylicious Levels       • New  Boss Modes       • Marvelous game modes including: Spread the Jelly & Release the Pufflers      • Tasty new Color Bomb Lollipop booster    • Mesmerizing new Candies      • Dreamy new treetop world and a host of quirky characters led by the Jelly Queen and her stooges.• Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master      • For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Jellylicious scores• Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internetAlready a fan of Candy Crush Jelly Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:https://www.facebook.com/CandyCrushJellySaga/https://twitter.com/candycrushjellyLast but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Jelly Saga!

comments: Revised review: the computer should not be able to play! How in the world is that even competitive. The AI moves the tiles so quickly. How do you go from 24 tiles to being out in 2 rounds. It's consistently happened the last 9 rounds I've tried to play.

The AI is just too fast. Even when u are playing other humans, the AI will take over when a person wits and then win the game in 2 turns.  Humans just can't physically make that many moves during a turn with only 30 seconds and so many bugs.  Worst game ever!

Not ready for use. Good try tho. For those who like to play this for a couple of hours, it gets annoying real fast.   When players leave the table, the Ai will take over and basicly beat everybody there. Instead of the Ai playing, just return the tiles to the group and we play with one player less.   Also, there is a 30 second time limit, which works mostly great, however, sometimes you need more time to move all the tiles arround. It would be nice to use your unused time (up to 2 minutes max or so) for those times you need a few extra seconds.  Also, when moving tiles on the board, sometimes the tiles wont stay in place and wont snap to the right spot. This happens mostly when the board is pretty full.  This could have been an awesome game...
Ridiculous how the computer players play. Somehow they are able to move almost every tile on the board to win in less than 30sec. Not possible for humans and very frustrating
It would be nice if u could chat while u play. Alot of people cheat by holding chips and unload. There should be something if u have a move then u have to play it.
I love the game but there have been times when I have tried to move ties and they will not move or will not connect. 3 times in a row in one game!

comments: This game is really fun, challenging at times & exercises and has a great variety of important brain exercises. My only qualm with this game is that everytime you level up a full screen ad gets in the way. Usually they can be closed out easily but not always. Regardless, it's the best free brain training app I have used and it really keeps you sharp!😀

Its rlly a good game for brain training!! Idk why but i didnt find any bug, glitch, or smthing like they all saying. It works well in my device. This is the best app for training your brain. Ofc its not easy, its so challenging, in a good way. I rlly struggle in quick searching and some stages, but its just so addicting and so great!! I recommend you to download it!!!

Additive and helpful. Its not an over night cure so people expecting that need help instead lol. It doesn't deserve a low rating. Yes theres add but it's to be expected with a free game. Having adult a.d.d and huge memory issues.. i can i liked this game. 100 doors is anther good one.

It's fun. My problem is on the attention one we are suppose to click stop once the red dot is on the brain and I do. There is plenty of time to click it  but it tells me i missed it. No matter how many times I click it while the red dot is still on the brain. If I press it 10 times then the screen that tells me I've failed comes up 10 times. Driving me insane.

I love it!!! The games are interesting. Now I am on "memory match" game which was initially locked and it keeps on freezing and promotes me to next level without me completing the level well. Besides that, I would highly recommended it to others, it's worth installing.

There's a glitch in "Quick Decision Skill" game. It is based on whether the previous and current object is same or not. When I click on the peach-moon-type object as same, it gives error, though I click on Same when two moons appear consecutively in the game. This way I'll not be able to clear the levels.
description: Brain Trainer app to quick exercise to your brain short term memory, concentration, focus , speed & accuracy.it has 15 type of brain training games. ◆  Multitasking brain training . ◆  Quick Search brain training . ◆  Math brain training . ◆  Focus brain training . ◆  Colors Vs Brain ◆  Memory Power Training ◆  Left Brain Vs Right Brain  ◆  Remember Faces  ◆  Concentration ◆  Quick Decision ◆  Grid Memory Challenge ◆  Listening Memory ◆  Word Memory Challenge ◆  Concentration Plus 1) Multitasking skill: -  Increase your brain multitasking capability by playing this.Questions will be displayed at a time in 2 panels. You have to get target score to finish the level by managing not to loose 3 chances on any panel and with in 1 minute..  Try to get max score on each level.. 2) Quick Search skill :   Increase your brain searching skills by playing this.Blast the balls from high number to low number with in time limit. 5 seconds penalty on each wrong click. 3) Math Skill : Add,subtract,multiply numbers fast in balloon solver. The objective of the game is to pop the balloons with correct answer.     4) Focus Skill:  Increase your focus by controlling your attention. Number will be displayed with rapid pace. Tap the screen after every number except do not tap on withhold number.5) Color Vs BrainColor List will be displayed for few seconds and colors will be be shuffled, remember the colors by putting full concentration before shuffle and arrange them in same order by dragging the items6) Memory Power    Remember the objects which displays only few seconds and reenter them in same sequence.This exercise defiantly challenges you memory power 7) Left Vs Right Brain  Balancing Left and Right brains are very important, playing this game will train your brain on balancing activities   If you are not satisfied with your results, Play this game daily 5-10 min. You may see better results.
descriptionHTML:

it has 15 type of brain training games.

◆ Multitasking brain training .

◆ Memory Power Training

◆ Concentration Plus

1) Multitasking skill: -

Increase your brain multitasking capability by playing this.Questions will be displayed at a time in 2 panels. You have to get target score to finish the level by managing not to loose 3 chances on any panel and with in 1 minute.. Try to get max score on each level..

2) Quick Search skill :

Increase your brain searching skills by playing this.Blast the balls from high number to low number with in time limit. 5 seconds penalty on each wrong click.

3) Math Skill : Add,subtract,multiply numbers fast in balloon solver. The objective of the game is to pop the balloons with correct answer.

4) Focus Skill:
Increase your focus by controlling your attention. Number will be displayed with rapid pace. Tap the screen after every number except do not tap on withhold number.

5) Color Vs Brain
Color List will be displayed for few seconds and colors will be be shuffled, remember the colors by putting full concentration before shuffle and arrange them in same order by dragging the items

6) Memory Power
Remember the objects which displays only few seconds and reenter them in same sequence.
This exercise defiantly challenges you memory power

7) Left Vs Right Brain
Balancing Left and Right brains are very important, playing this game will train your brain on balancing activities


If you are not satisfied with your results, Play this game daily 5-10 min. You may see better results.
developerAddress:
601 Union St. #4200
Seattle, WA 98101
summary: Train your brain for memory,concentration,focus,speed & accuracy. Download now!
title: Brain Training

comments: I got to level 7 on big fish casino to get 60 gold. yet when I went back to reap my rewards I was startled! then my feeling of "startled-ness" changed to one of despair. For when I went back I realized I wasted all that time going to level 7 on big fish games and instead of having 60 gems I have 60 minutes of wasted time. Great game. Horrible reward system. I will rate the game 5 like it should be when I receive 60 gold. Unfortunately I like the game so I will continue to playing. I am level 27 after all.

prices in the game are not well distributed. you can unlock new players only with gold but gold is obtained so hard. on the other hand, money is useless after some point. you can only use upgrading players but it also requires gold. you can obtain golds with watching ads and playing every tournament over and over again to level up and gain gold but after some point you cannot unlock new players (therefore cannot unlock new tournaments) because it requires so much gold. the game forces you to buy golds. fun game but only a short period of time

It is the best game I have played so far but I wish the creator adds that you can fight people online in this game because it doesn't make sense that in  basketball PVP you can go against people online . Why not add online in this game and creator if you are reading this comment can you please add more bags add like a legendary you buy the legendary bag it has like 1,00000000000000 gold .bag for 1,00000 cash and in the legendary bag add like 1,00000000000gold like this game so much

comments: I DONT LIKE THE UPDATE THAT GIVES YOU MORE TIME AFTER FORCE OF CARDS . IT ALLOWS PEOPLE WAYY!!!!! TO MUCH TIME TO COMPLETE THE BOARD. AND IT WAS MORE COMPETETIVE B4. I DONT WANT MY RANKING TO SUFFER BECAUSE OF LUCK.  +Ima a REAL RISK FAN. I have purchased everymap package available. Its fair priced and affordable.The new maps are too easy in my opinion. MAKE MORE MAPS I'LL PAY idc jus MAKE them MORE Challenging

This game is great but it could be so much better.   1. The expert AI is too easy to beat. Risk players normally gang up on an opponent, if they are dominating. There should be a legendary option.  2. It would be nice to have a match summary and timeline at the end of a game.    3. There should be an auto-save game feature when playing against the AI, in case the game drops out.  Edit: They seem to have addressed my third point.

This is a very frustrating game. Every single time I play my turn (in a multi-player game that is) I get disconnected! .. and I've to replay it again .. only to get disconnected again! and so on and so on till my time runs out. Sometimes in the middle of all this 'replaying' I even lose my troops to other players .. VERY FRUSTRATING! And No .. I've both a very good data and wifi connections.

Was fine for a couple weeks.... Then it started freezing up in the middle of my games.... All of them. I'm using a LG V30+ with 128g ram so it's definitely not a lack of storage issue.   I wouldn't recommend this app to anyone who likes uninterrupted gameplay.

I joined to get the one free game per day. Be aware, that if you do not subscribe (like me), the dice are loaded...  I actually had an army of 9 or 10 roll over against an army of 1 on quite a few occasions... statistically highly improbable.

Its just a very slow moving game.  I could only play won game and I had enough. Got bored of it.  They don't really teach you how to play either. I know how to play the real version.  Just got to learn to strategize on your own, obviously.  And lastly, you need to play when you have lots of down time. I am uninstalling it now.

comments: Works. Music and SFX are imo top notch. Keeps my attention for 5-10 minutes every few hours. Diamonds are a tad pricey. Overall from me, a solid 4 out of five.  Would like to see sales for diamonds... I don't mind throwing a few bucks here and there for a game/app on a phone. Prices are a little steep IMO.....

It's a good time killer. The thing that makes me think about deleting this app is how it keeps overriding my phone. I keep turning notifications off for this app, but the game will turn them back on again. It's so annoying to have my phone buzz just to find out its just this stupid game telling me my scientists are done or waiting for a task.

Good fun until you figure out that you only need to build area 52 up. At level 500 it jumps by 5000000% or something stupid. Meaning can clear a planet in just hours. Needs a different hook to it. After a few planets it's a bit stale.  The choices to buy in multiples of needs moving. With fat fingers I've caught the research aswel as hitting Max a few times

Usual game where numbers get ridiculous and good at killing time. Very good features and well balanced - so far. Like with many of these games nearer the later stages the completion time can be calculated and nobody wants to tap for 211 years to complete the next round. Hopefully this game sidesteps that.

Update to previous review: Devs seem on it. After the last update there seemed to be a bug or two. A couple of us let them know and they fixed it within a week. Good game, come and go on your own time, well maintained. Thanks guys!  --------- I'd have to agree about the slow down for the red bacteria after the update. It used to come between 1.5 and 3 mins. Now I can go 10 minutes looking at the screen before one comes. It makes the game more of a waste of time than fun. Other than that, I was really liking it. Played it more than most games.

Yes it's a tapper buy done is a very unique way and totally worth your time. The fact that your goal is to destroy planets and that you are sending all your energy to the planet makes sense that you have to start back up. Been playing for almost 3 months and I keep checking back in to destroy planets.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome, Doctor! We've been waiting for you. Everything is prepared for you to take over and start cultivating bacteria to initiate BACTERIAL TAKEOVER!

We will start by taking over the smallest planets and move on to more difficult ones with a larger population and stronger infection resistance. We will need billions, trillions, quadrillion and even more bacteria to attack these planets. Which means your expertise in expanding and upgrading our bacterial colonies will be irreplaceable!

Build colonies, buy upgrades and generate bacteria on your own till you have enough to destroy planets and discover new powerful mutations! Remember that Plague is caused by the bacteria and it is our strength.

Bacterial Takeover is a mobile clicker and also idle game which allows you to become an evil genius that is set out to use biological weapons to destroy the whole Universe.

Main Features

- Explore universe and Destroy Planets
- Produce Nanobots and Bacteria
- Research Black Holes and Planets
- Evolve, Irradiate, and Mutate new Bacteria, overcome bacterial resistance
- Choose your Playstyle, a Tapping (clicking) or Idling
- Hoard Minerals, Gene Strands, Dark Matter and much more…

Join the community
https://www.facebook.com/bacterialTakeover/

Learn more
http://wiki.bacterialtakeover.com

comments: Good timekiller. BUT as always... You have to pay up for the cool stuff... If you're going for F2P, you only get the basic stuff... And well it's getting really boring after some time. After some good hours it get's really repetitive... Right know it feels like nobody takes care about rhis game anymore. No more patches, updates, no new stuff. It's a shame. This game has some potential but it's getting wasted here.

Very Relaxing! Just watching the acid mix with water, then the black hole making it disappear is sooo satisfying! Definitely recommended! But the stuff you pay for.. Its kinda dumb. Like, pay for this and this and not satisfied, yeah, just get rid of that. <3

What a wonderful little way to give your boredom a time out. Developer, great job for what I read as a cool way to give back to the world freely! I have wondered if more pictures are an upcoming addition...? Back to my sand box! 😃

Great sandbox! People expect programmers to work for free to entertain us, its a dollar kids! Im confused as to why when I put a fire tap on metal or stone and there is wood underneath that and I sprinkle some sawdust the fire seems to travel through the metal to the wood when I was careful not to overrlap?

This is such a good game to do experiments with lots of different things like you can evaporate water to make steam and then have it fall down as rain. You can also do loads of other things so if you like that kind of stuff you will love this game!

Fantastic game that my kid really loves! Totally worth paying a dollar to unlock all the features! People who complain about that aren't appreciating how much the adds and endless re-charges and in-app purchases hurt good game design and make a game worse. It's only a single purchase, not an endless string of them.

description: Escape to an island getaway filled with adventure, mystery, and fun new mini games in this colorful free-to-play game from the makers of FarmVille, the number one farming franchise! Adventure unfolds all around your island! ESCAPE TO THE TROPICS - Seek adventures on your very own tropical island - Farm unique fruits and veggies, craft fun drinks and meet adorable animals - Discover all of the tropical crops and exotic animals that call your island home - Run a beachside inn and start a new life in paradise - Play mini games and have fun with new characters like Ting UNCOVER MYSTERY, SECRETS AND TREASURES - Complete story-based quests with island guides like the archaeologist and surfing expert - Explore the bubbling volcano and ancient monkey temple - Discover hidden treasures and rare goods in the secret chamber - Investigate uncharted areas to find even more island secrets BUILD AMENITIES FOR YOUR GUESTS - Fix up island workshops and create your own personal paradise - Buy a Tiki Bar, Sushi Stand, Artisan Workshop and more - Expand your inn and hire guides to help your guests enjoy the island DISCOVER AND PHOTOGRAPH ADORABLE ANIMALS FOR REWARDS - Build a Wildlife Center on your island with the help of Ting, the wildlife guide - Attract rare and exotic animals to your island like the colorful Iguana by feeding them treats - Earn rewards by snapping photos of the animals as souvenirs for your guests TRADE WITH OTHER ISLANDS - Trade with other players using the trade boat - Short on eggs? Buy the goods you need from neighboring islands - Have too many pineapples? comments: I wish I could post pictures, but the game is too easy. I beat the first 2 levels both on one attempt. Though I am an experienced geometry dash player. But if I can beat a level first try, not knowing the course at all, that's some easy stuff. I highly recommend geometry dash sub zero though.

I think this game was made because with new levels in original version they added new effects, but the levels were very hard for normal players and they were designed for pro players, so they decided to make easy levels with new effects (like wave...). The goal has been met and this is very good game.
Great fun but needs more levels. I laughed when I saw a review made by an idiot because he said this was a copy of the Impossible Game LOL it's the other way around, dumbass.

THIS GAME IS AWESOME PLZ MAKE THE COMING SOON Levels Music kind of more like the seven seas music THANKS and also I rated 5 stars on every thing on this game and P.S. could you please make the coming soon levels more faster dear fellows, thanks

I love every Geometry Dash version! And this one might be the best. But my only downfall is that the music, which is freaking awesome,gets ahead of the actual gameplay and I miss my jumps. Plz fix and I'll rate 5 stars! But keep up the good work!

comments: Fun game, good time killer, great graphics. Unfortunately,  like with many other games, they sucker you in with rewards at the start only for you to soon hit a paywall. It's  either grind and hope you get lucky or give into the many game ads promoting cash purchases. Anything involving actually online play (co-op, PvP etc) seems to freeze or have crazy lag. Good game, definitely has room for improvement.

It's a good cover-based shooter, with some pretty creative characters and a good pace for quick battles. The unlock system is more than fair, with the ability to save currencies for that one big purchase. I enjoy the ability to play at my own pace without sacrificing my life to the game (cough*Kabam*cough) and I'm having a lot of fun. I've noticed that PVP tends to favor Savage, when he activates Spray and Pray once, half the opposing team dies. Twice, and the round is over. Otherwise a very well done and enjoyable game.

I really enjoy the action this game brings along with good looks and simple controls. Too many times development teams get caught up in the visuals or complex control schemes and forget about what gamers really love and that's not having a complex control panel with nice smooth transition from level to level. Thank you for making this game a joy to play every time I turn it on.

Nice game ...the only problem  I say would be its pay to win philosophy. Yeah it's easy in the beginning but the gear gets really scarce to if your really trying to win it'll be next to impossible to do so with out swiping that good 'ol debit card. Otherwise it's a fun and awesome game. That is in the beginning....

Good concept. Good game. Many glitches. For a game that's touted for and based on pvp it makes no sense that %80 of the time the game freezes going into a pvp battle. It's okay though, you can close it and then immediately reopen it to a message that tells you that you died. Fix your freezing problems and I'd give you 4 stars.

Really solid graphics and game play for mobile. Doesn't want to work with my Bluetooth controller. As a free game they have really doubled down on the shards and multiple currencies to try to get you to spend. You really need to grind if you want to unlock anything without paying.
